I spent months debating and researching which TV I wanted for my needs, and finally came to the decision on purchasing this unit.I was thinking about buying a TV from a major retail chain here locally since this is what I was used to over the years, and I have yet to make a considerable purchase from an online store. In the end though, seeing the price here on Amazon compared to the local stores, I just couldn't pass on the deal. Here it was nearly $1000 less then your Best Buy.Anyway, regarding the important stuff, the TV itself, I ordered the TV on a Monday night. I had scheduled the delivery date though the check out process to be nearly about a week and half away. I was disappointed as it showed this was the earliest time for delivery. Well 2 days after I ordered the TV online, I get a call from CEVA saying they would like to schedule a delivery for the next day. I was totally shocked that the TV was already in my city (Minneapolis, MN) that quick.Well the delivery guys came and I have to say their delivery was on time and prompt. They came right at the scheduled time, met me at the front door of my apartment complex, and even carried the TV in. After talking to them a little bit, they opened the box up and even plugged the unit in to test it. Once everything checked out, I signed the slip and they were on their way.After setting everything up (cable, DVD, Xbox...etc) I have to admit I was blown away with the picture quality. Standard channels look great which might be due to having a strong cable signal. HD content looks amazing. I simply cannot describe how great they look. I have the Planet Earth series on Bluray and never before have I seen such amazing detail. I can see blades of grass, whiskers on animals; dirt on their fur, cracks in rocks...etc. Amazing, indeed.The black levels are probably the best I have seen on any LCD TV. They compare in quality to plasma, and tubes. This set has very little bleed through, and the back lighting is perfect. I can't really notice any lights in the corners like most lower line LCD TV's. Colors are bright and vibrant without being lost in the blackness of some pictures. AMZING indeed.Gaming on the TV looks great. I am not taking full advantage of the 120hz for gaming since that feature is not supported though the VGA input. I currently have my Xbox hooked up that way in order for me to get 1080p since I have a pre-HDMI Xbox 360. Oh well I can live. The picture quality is amazing regardless, and completely blows my old LCD TV out of the water in that department.Since I mentioned the 120hz feature, I would like to say a few things about it myself. First of all I am glad the TV offers 4 different levels of 120hz conversion. Low, Med, High and off. At times, the 120hz can look a bit too fake, but other times it looks great. I think the best setting  for TV shows and movies and not having to lose that "cinema feel" is to have the 120hz set at Low to Medium. The High setting just looks too unnatural for my taste. In the end though, I like how the TV gives you the option to set it to suit your taste. I have read that some people here think the red frame was too much, and others who love it. In all honesty, I really can't even notice the dark red border as it blends in well with the TV, yet if you have any type of matching décor, it accents it well.Also, some people here have complained about the remote, and how awkward it may be. The remote itself really isn't that bad. I actually love it. It has a nice smooth flow to it that feels good and give it a nice wrap around feeling in your hands. It isn't rigid, square or heavy. The remote is very comfortable to say the least. It has the option to give backlighting as soon as it's picked up, and turns off when the remote is idle on the table for a few seconds. The remote itself isn't a multipurpose remote, but it does have the standard Play, Pause, Rewind...etc buttons. Maybe it's just me, but I haven't found out what those buttons are meant to do. I didn't really read the instruction book anyway. The scroll wheel on the remote is a little quirky and unresponsive at times, but you don't have to use it as a scroll only, it can be used as a direction pad as well. So if you want to scroll up or down, just push up on the wheel and it goes up, and so on for the other directions (Down, Left, Right...)The TV itself has a ton of inputs, HDMI's in the back and the side, S video, standard video, components, the works. It also has an optical audio out for those of us who have digital audio receivers. A great feature to have.Overall this is an amazing TV. I constantly get compliments from all my friends about how nice it looks in the living room, to how breathtaking the image is. It's simply so good that I just really don't know how to describe it. It's just something you really need to see for yourself.Con wise, I really can't think of anything bad with this TV. The TV itself does take a few seconds to boot up when you power it on. But with such complex electronics, its really should be expected. Also, when you power on, or off the TV, it makes a little music type chime which although cool and neat at first, it does get a little annoying over time. Thankfully there is an option in the menus to turn this off.The only real issue I have with the TV to be honest are the buttons on the TV. They are not really buttons so to speak, more like touch sensors. You don't have to push anything, just simply place your finger on what you want and it will sense your touch and activate. Sounds good, and it works in theory, but first the buttons are very hard to see in a naturally lighted room and are very hard to distinguish between each other. Many times I have hit the wrong buttons because it's just very hard to see. They are not back lighted which further compounds the problem. But this to me is a minor issue as usually I am not near the TV itself unless I am changing games, or putting in a DVD.Overall I am very pleased with this TV. (as if you couldn't tell by now, ha!)

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Television
Reviews.Author: Steveb "Steveb"
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful television and a great value for the product that you receive.  I wanted to write this less for adding my ditto to the long list of reviews on this site but more to speak to the few who mark this product down because of "missing features" etc.  I read one review that stated "I was dissapointed to find out that there was no "S-Video on the back of the television" another said that pc games didn't look good, etc.  These reviews might be valid if the specifications were not posted for anyone with half an inclination to look at them.  Also, this is a large screen and the poor picture quality from your PC is that your cheap video card does not support the native resolution and 16:9 format of the screen.BUY THIS TV WHILE YOU CAN!!!

Reviews.Title: Worth the premium. Picture quality is second to none.
Reviews.Author: Number2Pencil
Reviews.Content: I researched 3 straight weeks before deciding on a 46" lcd tv. Although you will pay a premium over equivalent Sharp and some Sony models, there's a reason that Amazon.com alone has 840+ reviews of this TV. The picture and color quality is simply amazing.Turn off all the lights, pop in a Blu-ray and set your TV to "Movie Mode".  Right out of the box, the default TV settings blew me away.Pros:Vibrant and accurate colors (place it next to a Vizio and you'll see the difference)Deep blacksPlenty of HDMI and other source connectorsAgain, picture quality will blow you awaySWIVLES ON THE BASE!Cons:Speakers suck. Get yourself a receiver and a decent 5.1 systemToo heavy to lift on your own (but I guess most 46"+ tvs would be)A magnet for fingerprints and dust particlesShipping:Amazon shipped this TV through their CEVA carrier. These guys were on time, knowledgable and didn't leave a mess.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Satisfied
Reviews.Author: B. Hunter
Reviews.Content: First of all, I ordered the TV on  Thursday morning and it was delivered the following afternoon.  The "White Glove Delivery" leaves a lot to be desired.  The delivery man was nice, but once we go the TV into the basement, he had me sign the delivery confirmation and he was on his way.  Fine with me because it saved me from tipping him and it was easy to hookup.  Thus far, that is the only complaint I have.I have very little natural light in my basement and have recess lighting so the glare issue has been a non issue as I figured it would be.  I think it is funny that previous reviewers have complained about the remote control.  It is fine, and easy to work with.  Also, the sound is better than I had been led to believe.  I will be hooking up surround sound when the stand arrives.Now to the good stuff.  I am an avid sports fan, so I watch a lot of sports and sportcenter.  This TV is for those who truly enjoy watching sports.  The combination of the 120 hz and 50,000:1 contrast ratio makes live action sports so crisp.  The refresher rate I believe is less than 4 ms which makes the movements seem fluent.  I was amazed watching the Big East basketball tournament this past weekend.  My wife caught me grinning as I was watching it on a few occasions.  The colors are extremely vivid and the black colors are so defined and sharp.  Gaming is unbelievable too.The factory settings are good.  I'm sure they could be adjusted better, but then I would be missing out on time spent enjoying the TV.  It's great because you can set the 120 Hz to low, medium, high or off.  Setting it to high with sports optimizes the smothness of motion. When you're watching your favorite shows on HD, you can set the 120Hz level to low or off and then you get more of a natural look.  When it is set on high it makes people seem very unatural, almost like a soap opera look to it.I have been researching LCD TV's for a couple of years and have always been partial to Samsung.  The only other brand I narrowed it down to was Sony's XBR.  However, with the 2009 models coming out now, the Samsung price was way better.  I am extremely happy with my purchase and look forward to many happy years with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Another great product from Amazon!
Reviews.Author: James C. Leavens
Reviews.Content: We live in a remote section of Tucson and have found Amazon.com to be invaluable to us since moving here 3 years ago.The new home is large and we wanted to up our screen size, so went to our favorite website sales store and checked out what they provided and what the buyers thought.  We watched the prices for several months as well as the reviews, which grew in number each visit.  Everyone was pleased with this HDTV and when we thought the price was what we could afford, we ordered it.The delivery was flawless...white glove setup and great suggestions from the installer too.  When I returned home and expected to have to set it up, it was already done and running...what a pleasant surprise!  Sometimes setting up a tv with all the options can be overwhelming!The HDTV is great and we love it...nice and crisp and couldn't be happier with the product or with Amazon.com!!

Reviews.Title: sony bravia vs. samsung
Reviews.Author: Eugen Berlickij "trouter"
Reviews.Content: recently purchased the Sony 46z4100-twice,  returned both to Amazon because of the dark picture screen.  Could not get highlights, picture looked as if you were in a drive-in -no contrtast, muted tones, very dark screen etc.  Ordered the Samsung LN46A650-TOTALLY AMAZING,IN AWE OF THE PICTURE, DID NOT ADJUST ANY SETTINGS-BEST TV EVER. Do not waste you time on Sony until they figure out what is going on with their sets.  A friend bought the Sony 40z4100-same problem, only Sears will not take it back..

Reviews.Title: Great visuals . . .
Reviews.Author: J. Train
Reviews.Content: We've had this TV for about 2 months now.  We buy tons of things from Amazon, however we got this one locally at a crazy-good deal.  I agonized and nit-picked for a couple months prior to pulling the trigger on this one.  This unit dominates its price point in quality, features, and stellar reviews.  A great bang for the buck to be had, especially when it can be found as low as under $1500.It is an amazing experience watching a good movie on our Blu-Ray player pumped through the reciever/surround sound.  Watching HD cable-tv is equally beautiful when filmed at a good quality.The colors are vivid, rich and sharp.  A truly gorgeous picture!The touch of red is ever-so-slight and adds some dimension thats only really noticed when up close to it for a bit of interest.  I was skeptical of this until I saw it in person.The only real con that comes to mind is the native sound of the TV itself.If Im just watching plain-jane TV like the news (not through the audio reciever, baby alseep, etc.) it frankly sounds pretty poor.  We've got an older LG 1080i we've had a few years that the TV speaker sound itself blows this Samsung away completely.However, its likely you'll be listening through a reciever/soundbar anyhow.  If not... spank yourself immediately and get it hooked up that way for the full HD effect.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: rick
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LB-N46a650 HDTV that we purchased from Amazon is a great TV. We have a DLP samsung HDTV and I am amazed at the increased resolution and clarity with the new set. I was sceptical of the value of 120hz at first but would now reccomend this feature to everyone. This set has very true color and great contrast. Installation is simple. I was up and running in minutes. A bonus was the remote for direct TV it did not have to be reprogrammed! The two systems recognized each other right away.The only area that needs improvement is sound. The sound system is okay but I will add an amplifier and speakers.Buying a television online at first made me nervous but the proccess was simple and reliable. Delivery from Amazon was fast and the delivery people didn't just drop off at the door they took the set upstairs for us. Amazon beat everyone else's prices with no sales tax or delivery charge.

Reviews.Title: This is an awesome television
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: This is my second Samsung television.  My first one was a 32" 720p LCD for my bedroom.  It provides very very good quality for a bedroom environment.  It made my family room tv look horrible.  I had a 42" Toshiba projection HDTV.  It really looked bad compared to the Samsung.I decided to replace it and Samsung already had me hooked.  Their TV's look so much better than any Sony or Panasonic I have seen.  I mounted it to the wall with a third-party mount.  Easy to hang.  I use Directv HD and local over-the-air HD channels.  The 1080p resolution is absolutely stunning.  In my opinion, this TV has the best picture of any 46" LCD.  There are lots of ways to personalize how you want the picture to render.I do not use the remote only because I am used to using my Directv remote with my TV and DVD players.  Only one thing falls slightly short of first class:  the sound.  The speakers aren't bad but with such stunning picture you feel a need for deep, rich sound.  I will have to get a surround sound system next.I highly recommend this TV to anyone.  Good job Samsung!

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV - delivered with ease
Reviews.Author: James M. Murphy "coach"
Reviews.Content: I finally pulled the trigger after watching this item since Tgiving and when it dropped below $1,400 I made the move. Had Time Warner HD installed Friday and this unit really rocks. I have had it for one week and regret I didn't purchase it earlier for the NFL playoffs/SuperB.Delivery was within one week and CEVA Freight Management "white glove" service was perfect. The unit came from Indy and was shipped in one day to Cincinnati/Hebron,Ky. They called to schedule delivery, showed up "on time" and it took two guys 10 min to get it unboxed, on the stand and tested the unit to make sure it was working.I am glad I got the 650 because it swivels and the picture is way better than expected. This is my first flat screen.Go ahead and buy this TV when the price drops below $1,400 but do it through Amazon and not one of the other vendors.

Reviews.Title: Great TV and a great price
Reviews.Author: M. Agnello
Reviews.Content: I replaced a Samsung rear projection DLP TV with this and the difference in picture quality is striking.  My room is well lit with natural sunlight and the LN46A650 does not have problems with the high level of ambient light.  Recessed lamps in the ceiling cause reflections on the glossy screen but I just turn those off for most viewing.  A huge improvement over my DLP unit at almost half the price.  Can't beat that!I caution you about buying from Amazon however.  I thought I followed proper procedure to purchase this with an Amazon store card and get 24 months interest free.  It turns out that Amazon offers two financing options - one with Chase Bank for a VISA card that does not offer interest free promotions and one with GE Bank which does offer 24 months interest free.  The difference was not clear to me and I ended up purchasing with credit offered by Chase Bank.  They are now charging me 16.25% interest.  Amazon customer service has been terrible in their refusal to discuss this intelligently or try to do anything to correct the situation.  Calls and emails to customer service resulted in speaking to offshore people with a poor command of the English language.  The first two attempts resulted in responses from people that clearly did not understand what I was saying.  The third woman did communicate well but still refused to offer any alternatives to paying the balance now to avoid finance charges.  It was still a great price but I am not happy with customer service.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650 46inch LCD HDTV with Red Touch of Color
Reviews.Author: Owl Lady "Louise G"
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. I took a long time to decide, and bought this one because of the positive comments for this model. It has lived up to every comment and performed perfectly from day one, with no glitches at all.The touch of red gives the frame a beautiful and classy look. The free shipping white glove delivery service was one of the main reasons I bought it here, rather than locally. The service was free, and impeccable. The delivery service called me when they left, and were here right on schedule. The delivery man brought the big box upstairs, unpacked, lifted the TV (with help from me)onto the 4'high media stand, hooked it up, got the remote set up and working, showed me some of the features of the TV, and hauled off all the packing. It was a wonderful experience, and is a wonderful TV.

Reviews.Title: Best Buy!!!
Reviews.Author: S. Lee
Reviews.Content: What a great buy!!!we watched the Superbowl on this TV and was just amazing. Money well spent. The white glove delivery was excellent as well. I got the TV in just 1 week. Good job Amazon!!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung46
Reviews.Author: TV_Home
Reviews.Content: This TV is a good size and the picture was wonderful! Shipping was within a reasonable time frame so was the delivery/set up.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: D. M. Schwartz
Reviews.Content: So far everything about this TV is great. The picture is fabulous and the remote control has a nice light so you can see it in the dark. I'm happy we bought this TV.

Reviews.Title: Best 46" LCD on the market with plasma-like blacks and features galore.
Reviews.Author: Ant Banks "A.Burwell"
Reviews.Content: Purchased back in mid-December 2008 after returning a Sony KDL46V3000(60hz, not 120hz) that was plagued with motion-blur. Before purchasing, I took a trip to my local electronics store, to compare the new Sony and Samsung line.[Picture quality/performance]This Sammy(Samsung) blew the Sony away on HD stations with deep, rich colors. As I stated above, the blacks are awesome, it can pass for a plasma any day. There are tons of customizable options that can be set towards the perfect calibration of your liking[....]. However, no matter what you do...it is not the best performer on SD(standard definition) channels, like most LCDs (Sony is king here), but the Sammy is a very close 2nd.[All about 120hz]Also, one of the most popular options on the 120-hz line of TVs is the 'Auto Motion', 'Motion Plus', cartoon-like, dramatization-effects...well, Samsung does a fine job on their Low/Medium setting, as the fast motion looks very natural.[Lasting appeal]This Sammy is aces, period. If you are reading this,along with the other hundreds of reviews...then you already know that it is popular by demand. Plus, the ToC red bezel is a nice touch (women love it). Samsung also did an excellent job with the remote, as it has a wheel. Plenty of inputs...4 HDMI, 1 VGA/PC, S-video, composites, components. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

Reviews.Title: Another slam dunk purchase from Amazon and don't throw the box!
Reviews.Author: Gigi "Savvy Mom"
Reviews.Content: I did research for a month, read hundreds of reviews and joined forums, before finally deciding on  purchasing LN46A650.  Then I spend 3 weeks doing price comparisons.  I could've saved $150 or so by going with a couple of other on-line vendors (and free shipping), but, in the end, for such a pricey purchase, I decided to go with a proven vendor Amazon, and here's why.  Day 1: ordered the TV, Day 2: received e-mail that the TV was shipped, Day 3: received a call from CEVA to schedule delivery, Day 4: two men from CEVA delivered the TV, unwrapped it, placed it on the TV stand, and plugged it in to make sure it worked.  The whole process was like clock-work.It's been a week, and I'm still very satisfied with my purchase.  I don't usually watch much TV, but, in the spirit of research, I logged in hours and hours glued to the TV, and, so far, I haven't detected any flaws.  The red touch of color acts as a subtle highlight to the black, and it truly lends a touch of class.  The picture is simply striking.  When watching the Presidential Inauguration, I thought Obama was standing literally in front of me.  I could go on and on...A word on the NFL gift card claim.  You need to  mail off the  UPS code that's on the box (it's 12 digit, all numbers), along with your receipt, so don't throw out the box or have CEVA take it with them until you get the invoice and the UPS code from the box.Another thing: I know that I lucked out with the transaction, delivery and the product, but I also know that I could rely on Amazon customer service, if I had a problem or concern.  I have yet to have a less than satisfactory service from them and that is worth $150 that I could have saved on the TV by ordering through a third party.

Reviews.Title: Pull the Trigger
Reviews.Author: klgfx "Kindle lover"
Reviews.Content: If you have been on the fence about whether to buy a high definition tv or not this tv will alleviate all doubts. Superb picture, features and settings too numerous to count. It took me a few days to get the picture adjusted for best quality(to my liking) but once I did, it's out of the ballpark. Don't be afraid to use Amazon.com. The set arrived when it was supposed to delivered by CEVA. No problems whatsoever! I was a little hesitant to spend the money but I'm glad I did. You may find it a little cheaper(very little) somewhere else but the flawless service and delivery negate the difference. I wouldn't hesitate to purchase from Amazon again.

Reviews.Title: Mostly spectacular
Reviews.Author: D. Barrett
Reviews.Content: This is a spectacular TV with a beautiful picture. It has one flaw, however: you cannot use the internal speaker together with external speakers. The sound will be out of sync.  Some stereo receivers have a delay adjustment so you can fix this. Shame on Samsung for building a TV that cannot sync its own sound.Buyer's tip: if you hang this on the wall and get tired at looking at the big, obnoxious "SAMSUNG" logo on the front, simply cover the logo with black "P-Touch" label tape. Use black tape with white ink, 3/4" (18mm) width.  (Brother TZ345 P-TOUCH White On Black.)  Just cut a piece long enough to cover the logo.  Works great, and the tape peels off harmlessly.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Carol A. Zwigart
Reviews.Content: This TV lived up to all reviews. Great picture. Best price I could find. Will search Amazon for other electronics. Great service and Fast shipping.

Reviews.Title: Amazing set
Reviews.Author: D. Whicker "Anderson Actor"
Reviews.Content: I love my Samsung LN46A650. The picture is amazing. It is so clear and sharp. I upgraded from a 32 inch Vizio. I had no problems with that set, I just wanted something bigger. I read lots of reviews and looked at lots of TVs in stores. It is beautiful. I've had it for about a month now. I haven't tried tweaking the settings, because so far, I am totally satisfied. If you are looking for a great set, this one may be the one for you, too. My video games look amazing on this set. Blu-ray movies are fantastic. I watched Wall-e, and it was like looking through a window at this wonderful movie (one of my favorites from 2008). Wow, wow, wow!

Reviews.Title: Wow! Beautiful picture, great service
Reviews.Author: The Redhead
Reviews.Content: This is my first LCD tv so I can't compare, but I couldn't ask for a better picture. I've found myself watching football just because the picture is so beautiful and clear. A PPV HD broadcast of an action movie was just incredible. Amazon shipped the tv 2 days after I ordered it and I got three status updates before it was delivered to my home, unpacked and plugged in just as the white glove service was advertised. I had considered a smaller set but I find the 46" to be just the right size for my viewing distance of 9-10'.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: S. Baumann
Reviews.Content: I have read over and over about how good this tv is and was really hoping that I could be another one to brag about how great this tv is and after about 2 weeks of use, I still cannot say enough about how great the picture truly is. The difference b/w this tv and the other lcd's in the house is unreal.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful TV, Incredible installation service
Reviews.Author: Peter Cox
Reviews.Content: TV has incredible picture.  No issues that I have seen in the month it has been installed.  Very slight glare issue, tv is opposite South facing picture window, that is easily mitigated by tilting tv up or down slightly on wall mount.Free shipping and CEVA white glove installation service was amazing.  TV ordered evening of 12/1 and shipped Tuesday 12/2 with delivery scheduled for the following week.  Saturday afternoon recived phone call form CEVA saying they had the TV and would I like it installed the next day, Sunday.  I agreed so they said installer would be there between 12 and 2.  2 installers arrived next day at 12.01, carried tv up steps to installation room, unpacked, set up, tested successfully with directv sat box and left with packaging by 12.10 - incredibly good service.

Reviews.Title: awesome TV
Reviews.Author: P. Fusco
Reviews.Content: This is a beautiful TV with a fantastic display. CEVA shipping was fast and on time, and they even made a delivery on Saturday which was so helpful and got us our TV even faster. Amazon had the best price for this TV and I tracked it for months before I actually made the purchase. No tax and free shipping - it was just a no brainer to order from Amazon.I would highly recommend this TV

Reviews.Title: Did a ton of research...
Reviews.Author: Brent Medearis
Reviews.Content: I love this TV!!!  After reading a ton of reviews, I settled on the 46A650 over the 46A550.  The 120HZ is noticeably superior to the 60 Hertz 46A550.  Even watching this TV with standard cable (I don't have digital cable,) the picture is wonderful! If there is one thing I would improve.. it is making the black frame a little less reflective.  I have not noticed much reflectivity on the screen which is a good thing. The red "touch of color" is barely noticeable once it was mounted on the wall.  I was afraid it would clash with my furniture... but it is fine. Sound quality is better than I expected since the speakers are actually under the bottom frame.

Reviews.Title: Plain and Simple
Reviews.Author: Peter Major
Reviews.Content: After researching HD TVs for about a year and reading Consumer Reports, I decided on this set. I  purchased this TV on Dec. 2, 2008. CEVA delivered and placed the set on my stand. They insured it had a picture, but I decided to hook it up with my sound surround system along with my DVD player and  FIOS cable. I used three HDMI cables, not the "Monster" cables. When I turned everything on I was blown away with the picture quality both on the HD and regular TV channels. My DVD player wasn't HD, but the picture was agin, simply amazing

Reviews.Title: Great TV with Blu Ray Player
Reviews.Author: Kev77
Reviews.Content: I just bought this TV with a Samsung Blu Ray Player 1500. I have the HDMI cable running directly from the Blu Ray Player to the TV. Picture is awesome and sound is great too. Regular DVD's look pretty good with the upconvert as well. I would recommend this TV. Have had no issues. The delivery was good. Overall good experience.

Reviews.Title: Great Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Tom "Hasenpfeffer"
Reviews.Content: Great service from the Amazon shopping site.  Will do it again.The set met all of my expectations at a price that still cannot be beat by the pre-Christmas sales going on elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: M. Paulsen
Reviews.Content: I spent several months reading about and looking at HDTV's - plasma vs LCD vs DLP and finally decided it would be the LN46A650.  A lot of that decision was based on reading reviews on Amazon.  I watched the prices for awhile and pulled the trigger when Amazon offered the tv and blue-ray player package - still haven't seen as good a deal anywhere else.The blue-ray arrived early and was a snap to set up.  The tv arrived a day late but was also easy to set up.  Initially I was very upset about the day late delivery, but after getting the set and being amazed by the picture quality, I've gotten over it.  The picture is fantastic.  The "touch of color" is subtle and fits in nicely in our home.  I'm running the sound through a stereo system so tv speakers not an issue.I would highly recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Pleased owner
Reviews.Author: Older Point-of-view "Louise"
Reviews.Content: We have had this TV for about one month. Other positive reviews of this TV did not mislead us, we are very happy with our choice.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PICTURE, GREAT PICTURE, GREAT PICTURE
Reviews.Author: Turner
Reviews.Content: Wow!! All I have to say is this LCD looks great. I did a lot of research before purchasing this TV. I analyzed plasma vs lcd and also analyzed every feature and brand there was. It eventually came down to samsung and sony (lcd). After much consideration I decided to go with this Samsung! This TV does have a glossy finish to the screen and can still display some reflections. There is still less glare than on a plasma screen. The gloss does add some extra color depth and makes the blacks richer. Another reason I went with the LCD is power consumption and weight. Plasmas of this same size weigh close to 100lbs vs this LCD that comes in at about 49lbs. This comes in handy when trying to move the TV or mount it by yourself! The plasma will also run hotter and use a lot more energy. This model has the 120hz which the 550 model doesn't. If you want a good deal without the 120hz refresh rate, the 550 has gotten great reviews! Overall you can get a Samsung lcd that is just as good if not better than Sony but for a lot less money. I think Sony is still adding a surcharge because of their long standing reputation in the industry. And by the way the delivery service went great. CEVA delivered my LCD and were very helpful. I was going to be out of town on the estimated delivery date, so I contacted them and they were able to expedite the shipment to that Saturday (no charge)! I was very happy with them!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV-Great price.
Reviews.Author: O. Farrell "Happy Camper"
Reviews.Content: After reading consumer reports rave reviews on the 46a550 and their high rating for Amazon, I decided to check both out.Upgraded to the 46a650 for the 120hz and ordered.I could not be more satisfied by both the TV and Amazon. The set arrived in four days and when I set it up with hdmi cables (also ordered from Amazon at extremely reasonable prices) the picture was stunning to say  the least.For price and service I give them 5 stars. Go for it.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Set
Reviews.Author: Dale in Denver
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of ColorI've had this set for about two weeks now.  I bought from ServiceNet Solutions LLC thru Amazon.  The delivery people brought the set into the house, unpacked it, plugged it in to insure that it worked, then cleaned up the trash.  Can't beat that for service.  The "touch of color" looks really nice.  It's a subtle red top & bottom and I think most people wouldn't have a problem with it clashing with their decor.  I've mounted the set up off the floor so that its slightly above my level line of site, kinda on the same order as a theater setting and I have no reflection issues.  Just a beautiful picture, that we're quite pleased with.  You can see an obvious difference in picture quality between an HD picture and a non-HD picture.  That is to be expected, but its still an excellent quality picture.  I'm pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD 46" 120 hz 1080p
Reviews.Author: Randall R. Jones
Reviews.Content: Good price, great service at delivery.  They took out of the box, set it in place, hooked it up and showed me how to use the remote.  Picture is terrific.  Anything in HD is spectacular, especially sports, football.  Worth every penny.  This model consistently ranked superior to others.Very strong recommendation.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650 46" LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: J. Clark
Reviews.Content: Best price found overall on net or store. Free delivery and installation went great. Fast.

Reviews.Title: Red, what Red?
Reviews.Author: R. M. Watt
Reviews.Content: I was afraid that the Touch of Color would look too bright and garish and this was a great concern of mine since I really don't like red. Well, it was delivered today and the red is just a hint and hardly noticeable. Matter of fact, I don't think I would have even noticed the red color had I not been scared of it and on the look out for it. I really like the "hint" of the color.As mentioned in most of all the other reviews, it has a fantastic picture. The reason for my review is to make sure that nobody "rejects" this fantastic HDTV out of fear of the Touch of Color.

Reviews.Title: The best TV I've ever owned period
Reviews.Author: Demishadow
Reviews.Content: Let me just say first that I'm blown away by Amazon.  I've never bought a TV online before and I was very apprehensive but Amazon has so impressed me that I'll never feel that way again.  The TV was delivered promptly and with expert care.  The shipping company were amazing. Amazon offered the best value and price. Tax free and free shipping.  Now onto the TV.I researched TV's for over 6 months.  I also was contemplating upgrading to an HDTV for over 2 years.  Every review I read said that the Samsung LCD's offered the most features and the best picture quality for the price and then THIS TV came out.  The 650 Series.  A product model will come out once in a blue moon from a company that obviously was a labor of love and this is it.  It's nearly flawless (Actually its perfect to me. I can't find a flaw but i'm sure there is one somewhere)  and offers the best picture the best look and the most features compared to any competitor.  The overall package of the 650 series surpasses the 7 and 8 series.  This is the sweet spot of all the 2008 Samsung models.  Don't bother with the 5, 7 or 8 series.The color's are perfect and explode off the screen.  The Black Levels are Plasma quality.  You'd have to pay 2500 - 3000 Dollars to get a Plasma with better Blacks.  Think about that.  Yes Plasma's surpass LCD's on Black Levels but this TV Blows every Plasma away on Black Levels except the high end 2008 Plasmas.  So if you go to your friend's house who has a Plasma from a couple years ago, this TV will destroy it.  Within 5 years LCD's will overtake Plasma's completely.  The viewing angle quality is superb.  I stood on the side of the TV where NO ONE would ever attempt to watch TV and there was NO loss of quality in the picture.  The Touch of Red is beautiful.  I was very very unsure I'd like it.  When I first saw it online I thought it was neat that they took a bold approach to go with a radically different aesthetic then everyone else's TV's but I was afraid in my living room it would look garish or cheap.  My fears were gone when I saw the TV in person at Best Buy one day. In normal lighting (as it's meant to be seen in a room) the red  accents and blends into a deep burgundy and black on the frame.  Samsung knew what they were doing.  The Red would only stand out if you had spot lights shining on this TV.  Who is going to do that?  They really knew what they were doing.  The Red is gorgeous.I was a die hard Plasma fanatic and was dead set on getting a Panasonic until I saw this TV which in my opinion blows it away.Samsung has a long reputation for going above and beyond in the quality they deliver in a TV.  Believe me I know.  My last TV which I bought 8 years ago was a Samsung Flat Screen CRT with progressive scan native resolution and the ability to display 1080I resolution.  I bought it for 800 dollars.  Those features on a CRT at that price were unheard of 8 years ago.The last thing I expected to do was to come back to Samsung.  When I first started doing my research into HDTV's I figured it was a different playing field then CRT's.  I was wrong.  Samsung is just as committed to delivering the very best now as they were 8 years ago.  I didn't expect it. I wasn't looking for it but here I am and very happy about it.  Get this TV.  You'll never regret it.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV
Reviews.Author: J. Thomas
Reviews.Content: After a few days of reading reviews and researching different TVs, I decided to purchase the Samsung LN46A650. Once I knew what I was looking for, I began pricing the item at different stores. Amazon's price was signifigantly lower than any of the local stores that I checked, and having ordered from them in the past, I knew I could expect good customer service from Amazon.  The TV arrived earlier than the date promised and the "White Glove Delivery" was also as promised.When the TV arrived, I did not yet have the HD service hooked up, I only had the basic Directv service.  I was not impressed with picture of the TV with the basic Directv service, which I expected would be the case prior to purchasing the TV. A few days later, I recieved HD service from Directv and the difference in the picture is amazing. The picture is very clear and what really strikes me is how people's skin looks, you can see every pore and line in thier face, it's very life like. The TV also provides excellent picture quality when viewing DVDs and Blurays.Prior to purchasing the TV, I was unsure of how the "RED Touch Of Color" would look. I would describe it as a thin red line around the outer edge of the TV's frame which fades into the black portion of the frame. I find it to be very subtle and I don't notice it much of the time, except at certain angles it seems to be more visible. My wife and I both like the "RED Touch Of Color".The TV is very user friendly and the remote control is very easy to use as well.  The number of input and output connections makes it very easy to connect all of my audio/video components. Also, I like the way the TV swivels on it's base so you can turn the TV to face you if you are sitting off center. I have my TV hooked up to external speakers, so I cannot vouche for the TV's speaker sound.I am very happy with the Samsung LN46A650 and I am once again happy with my purchase from Amazon.com. I would surely recommend both to a friend. I hope you find this review helpful, and happy holidays.

Reviews.Title: Truely The Best Picture & Remote
Reviews.Author: Terry Bredeau "Terry B"
Reviews.Content: Well to begin with, I wanted to say that the people who delivered mine had it here within 3 days after I ordered it.  It was perfect for them to have it here just before thanksgiving. (The mount showed up a few hrs later from another vendor).  Anyway, right out of the box the picture was perfect, I didn't have to adjust anything.  Once you go through the setup process (very short) It was just a matter of putting it up on the wall.  The only way I can describe the picture is to say it looked like the old "LIVE" tv shows.  I had the movie "African Queen" on, and even though I was standing right next to the screen, I felt like I was standing on the boat itself.  It's been that way with almost every show I watch on it.  It has tons of inputs though I don't need that many in my bedroom but the features are way beyond my expectations. The "Touch of Red" is awesome, but you'll have to see it to believe it. I've heard many reviewers complain about the remote being cumbersome and hard to work.  I've had no such problems with mine.  It's a breeze to use and the "backlight" key is super when you're using it in the dark. The USB feature works great and it shows a great looking slideshow of pics if you have them on your flash drive, camera, etc. (flash drives that require a password will NOT work, so you might want to disable that on your flash drive)I can't be happier with my purchase.  I recommend this LCD to anyone who wants a great TV.Terry B

Reviews.Title: Happy with purchase but some drawbacks
Reviews.Author: Humble Consumer
Reviews.Content: Great picture.  Absolutely amazing but regard your source before you purchase this TV.  Comcast cable in my area only provides 720p output.  On this Samsung it comes through as 1080i so is it really worth it if you're only going to use it to watch cable TV?Using an HDMI cable, I was able to get 1080p picture but only 60 Hz using the Samsung Blu-Ray DVD player. Picture is still amazing.The sound system on this set SUCKS!!!!  The speakers are on the bottom of the TV so it sounds like you're listening thru a filter.  The TV instruction interface and remote control is also pretty lousy--pretty typical for Samsung. They just have not caught up with Sony or Sharp when it comes to the small finishing touches on their products.Makes me wonder if I should have waited for the Sharp Aquos limited edition.  I was very happy with the first generation Sharp Aquos. But I have to say when it comes to the picture on this Samsung, it is AMAZING!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent LCD
Reviews.Author: L. Sands "GEOSOCIALISM"
Reviews.Content: This LCD looks great on our wall and it performs well.  Great space saver, resolution, colour, sound and brightness.  The red frame matches the colour of the wall and adds some style to the TV.  I haven't found any limits with this TV.  The series 7 from Samsung doesn't offer much more in features and performance.  The problem with the firmware was easily solved in less than 15 minutes.  I comprehensively researched this TV and couldn't find another TV to better it.  Samsung definitely wins on price and quality.  We have had it 8 months running most days without a problem.  I am yet to buy a 1080p player to realise the full potential in movies.  I have connected an Apple TV Apple TV with 160GB Hard Drive - MB189LL/A which produces the 1080p resolution and I can say it is impressive.  I have setup the TV as a hub through which all inputs (players, stereo & ATV) are played.  The sound quality is good and the signal improvement on analog cable TV is very good.  I have connected my desktop PC to it without any problems and it produces and interesting format for game play, however, not an option for harden gamers.  I don't regret the money spent on this one.

Reviews.Title: Finally pleased
Reviews.Author: RSHOK
Reviews.Content: I received my first TV just as advertised.  Great picture and everything was good for a couple of days.  Then I started having problems.  TV would turn off and on.  I upgraded the firmware, but that did not solve the problem.  The problem got worse with the picture locking up and making a loud buzzing noise, then turning off and on.  Called Samsung and they said they would get back to me in 3 business days with a repair.  They did not call back, so I called them.  They were unable to find anyone in my area to make the repair so their rep. said I would get a refund.  Called them back and they had no record of that conversation and still wanted me to wait on repair man.  I called Amazon and they were great. They sent me a new TV quicker than I got the first one.  I have had it for a couple of weeks now and everything seems fine with it.The picture is great and everyone comments on how clear it is.  I would recommend this TV and I have.  I am skeptical of Samsung service.  A repair man did finally call me back...the same day I got the new TV.  I will do business with Amazon again.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV!
Reviews.Author: Dan Gallenti
Reviews.Content: This is a great quality TV with an amazing picture quality. My only warning is that if the tv with be in a room with alot of light you may see alot of glare. The bezel touch of color is very subtle and barely noticeable while viewing. Overall, I am very satisfied and happy with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46" LCD HDTV Model LN46A650
Reviews.Author: Leonard M. Light
Reviews.Content: I have this set a month now and find it to be excellent.  Great picture quality. The only negative I find is that the imprinting for the manual controls, located on the front lower right of the frame of the set, are virually impossible to see....making them practically useless. Since I use the remote just about all the time, this is not a mojor problem.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD TV
Reviews.Author: CC "CC"
Reviews.Content: Consumer Reports recently rated the Samsung 46 inch LCD number 1 out of 9 tested. It was far better than the lowest rated TV which I had purchased and returned. The Samsung had a sound disruption problem when a Motorola cable box is connected to the TV with an HDMI cable. I called Samsung customer service. They quickly sent a flash drive to install a software update which solved the problem. It is an awesome TV.

Reviews.Title: Sick TV
Reviews.Author: R. Brown "Rob"
Reviews.Content: I bought a 52" Sharp D64U model and returned it for this TV.  The 650 has a perfect picture, it was well worth going down in size.  Some people complain about the glossy screen.  I have lights behind and on top of my TV as well as windows on the side and there is no problem.  With the deals going on right now at Amazon there is no reason to look at any other model.  This was also rate #1 in consumer reports.  Bought it on a Sunday and it was delivered that Friday.1

Reviews.Title: nice hdtv
Reviews.Author: Ikihi
Reviews.Content: what else can i say, this is one of the nicest tv's i've ever seenI love the red touch of color, it adds a nice "touch"The tv also is 120hz refresh rate so you don't miss a thing.46 inches is awesome! looks great in my living roomand the remote is stylish...(but i ended up just using the cable dvr remote )overall if you need a hdtv, this is the tv to buy!

Reviews.Title: WOW INCREDIBLE PICTURE!!! SAMSUNG'S THE BEST!
Reviews.Author: Arnold Cabal
Reviews.Content: This is the best tv I've ever had and is worth every penny!!! I got this tv for $1510 and comes with a free bluray player, plus free shipping in amazon! This Samsung Ln650 series has a better picture quality than the sony's. Watching Bluray movies is Jaw Dropping because picture is so clear.This tv has  very deep blacks and I mean DEEP blacks. Colors are so vivid and lifelike ,and the 120hz is amazing and makes motion very real. I turn 120hz on high when watching documentary, sports, CNN, and live shows. The motion is so smooth and crisp. I turn the 120hz down to "low" or "off" when watching bluray movies, dvd, and regular programs. This tv also an awesome computer monitor and displays 1920x1080 resolution. This tv is CNET's editor's choice award. Nevertheless this is the best lcd tv ,and I'm exremely happy with this tv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: R. Hamilton
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. I would like to let people know when I got the tv it had a black spot in the middle of the screen. I call Amazon they said no problem they would ship me a new one and take back the bad one at no charge. The tv came very fast. From now on I will buy all my electronicsfrom Amazon due to great service!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Mia
Reviews.Content: This was the first Samsung LCD TV I had ever purchased. Needless to say, Samsung did not disappoint me.  The delivery was flawless, the TV was taken up two landings of stairs without a problem, set up by the delivery men was quick.  The touch of color is a beautiful addition.  It matches a color in my comforter so it blends with my color scheme.  Anyway, the picture is awesome, the colors are bright and with a blue-ray player, I feel I am in my own personal movie theater.  The price was excellent and free shipping was even better.  I would purchase this product again without hesitation!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Deal especially with Free Blueray player
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: TV arrived this morning. Works perfectly. I had no issues with a glare in a bright room. Sound quality is very good. Picture is amazing. I also got a free blu-ray player though a sort of hidden amazon promotion. I didnt see the promotion until it almost ended, but it looks like they reupped it. If you get the tv look at this blu-ray player (Samsung BD-P1500) and see if the same $200 off promotion still applies. The promotion now and then appears on the front page of the electonics site. Great deal. I haven't hooked up the blu-ray yet because I have no DVDs. You will not find a better price. White glove delivery was very prompt. I ordered the TV Monday morning and I could have had it delivered yesterday (Friday) but I had to work and postponed it to today. The blu-ray arrived Wednesday. Hope you buy and enjoy! Happy holidays all!

Reviews.Title: Great Deal, Great TV
Reviews.Author: J. Stornelli
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this TV, and the deal was great. HD picture is bright and detailed, SD picture is good also. Sound is good, 1080P & 120 hz along with other features like internet capability means this TV won't be obsolete for years. Best price I've seen around Orlando is around $2000 plus tax. Don't be afraid of shipping it, arrived in perfect shape at my door.

Reviews.Title: Highly Impressive.
Reviews.Author: K. Onozawa
Reviews.Content: Like most out there, I've done the research, compared the prices, and pulled the trigger, and I haven't been happier. I'm not a technophile so I won't be going into the numbers or technology involved here, so this is for the everyday regular people who just are looking for a great tv; YOU'VE FOUND IT, FOLKS!This TV is quite honestly the most amazing piece of technology I could ever ask for; the picture is crisp, dynamic, and vibrant, the design is outstanding and practical, and the quality is beyond words. I also bought in addition to the TV, a blue ray player and the "Planet Earth" blue ray disc set; best decision I've made in years! You want to feel like your in the Serengeti with none of the bad smells, fear of death, and food-poisoning? Seriously, this is the single-most amazing viewing experience I've ever had the pleasure of being a part of.Well, I think most everything else has been said by other reviewers so I'll leave you with one thought; buy this tv and you'll never want to view anything that isn't on it again ;). Cheers!

Reviews.Title: Wow The Best HDTV out there TRUST ME
Reviews.Author: PGram
Reviews.Content: I had an LG 42inch I just upgraded. Wow amazing this is the best HDTV out there you get 3 extra months warranty just for registering your HDTV. When you watch standard TV it still looks great. I am amazed at the picture quality. I went to sears and looked at dozens of LCD's nothing came close. Ordered through amazon and couldn't believe how fast I received it. Great service they even asked if I wanted it set up. I said no because opening is the best part about getting something new.When you watch movies OMG looks like your looking out of the window or watching live footage its so damn clear i stare at it with my mouth open. Mind you this isn't my first HDTV 1080P My last HDTV was great but this beats it by 100% Trust me don't think just get this Samsung 6 series.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Samsung :650A Rocks
Reviews.Author: Michael Moriarty
Reviews.Content: I'm pretty anal about doing my research. So I did plenty. This LCD had great reviews so we looked at it live and in person at Best Buy and Circuit City. It looked great but they couldn't come close to Amazon's price.There is no longer an issue with the power cutting out. This was taken care of during the first half 2008 with a software upgrade and all TV's since are fine. No issues.Picture quality is awesome and a great bang for the buck. I have a Sharp Aquos that is a few years old and is not even close. The picture in HD on the Sharp is decent but not even close to the Samsung 650.Buy this model without hesitation. The 850 is about [...] more using LED technology but is not worth the [...] difference in price unless [...] is like [...] to you, then go for it.....Buy the 650A and enjoy.

Reviews.Title: outstanding TV
Reviews.Author: Robert A. Stein "superbroker1997"
Reviews.Content: I researched my decision for over 6 months and bought this set when it dropped below $1500 on Amazon.  It is FANTASTIC. HDTV looks great but Blu Ray movies are so realistic it feels like you are right there. The set was easy to set up and use and quickly integrated with my surround system.  Once connected via HDMI cables it even knew to turn my Blu Ray player on and off automatically. I highly recommend this set to anyone who wants a top notch picture.

Reviews.Title: 46" Samsung LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Frankie Perego
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with purchase having compared different brands in local stores ahead of time.  Delivery time was great, far sooner that was expected probably due to the fact that we only live 98 miles from Houston.  Freight company rep. called ahead of time and delivered during time that he said then removed TV from box, set TV up, and connected to our cable system.  Very pleased with purchasing through Amazon.com and recommend this type purchasing to everyone we know.

Reviews.Title: A Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: M. Berry "Berryjam"
Reviews.Content: Our set came in about 3 days - out of the box and plugged it in!  Can't say enough about the quality of the picture and sound. Excellent!  All channels (HD or not) are almost clearer than life.I'd recommend Samsun and Amazon Warehouse to anyone who asks and a few who don't!!

Reviews.Title: Value at its best
Reviews.Author: T.M. James
Reviews.Content: No sales taxes and with Amazon Prime, no shipping costs, and the low price on the product means that I got the best deal on this television and it was not even close.Lots of people are talking about waiting until Black Friday to buy a set.  I think that would be a mistake.  Waiting to buy an inferrior set at the same price does not make sense.This set has a beautiful picture, check the specs, they are good.  The inputs are plentiful.  Shipping from Amazon was on time and the service was outstanding.  They allowed me to plug in the set to make sure it worked before leaving, if I rejected it, they would have returned it for me.Side story about why I bought this set.I replaced another set with a cracked screen with this one and the tech told me that the screens for Samsungs and LG's are the cheapest to replace.  If you are worried about a cracked screen (kids, pets, high activity house) you should get a screen protector.  But if I had this set, it would have cost half as much to replace the screen as my old brand.OVERALL:Great value, $1500 for everything, additional $200 for screen protector from another vendor, and I have a set that is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Worth Every Penny
Reviews.Author: Joseph D. Panaro
Reviews.Content: This product has exceeded my expectations! Really! The shows I watch in HD are almost ruined because the picture and movement are so good. It's like the actors are right in my living room! Worth every penny, a must get!!!

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier!
Reviews.Author: Jason "jkd88"
Reviews.Content: First of all, I am no expert on HDTVs but I shopped for almost 6 months before I made my decision.  I became a regular at the local Circuit City.  I know for a fact they got tired of me just looking and not purchasing from the store.  I had the LN46A650 next to the comparable Sony LCD HDTV 1080p 120mhz model.  In the dark lighting of the store the pictures were very close to the same.  It seemed to me that the Samsung had just a slight crisper image.  The only real difference I could tell was the price.I decided on the Samsung and I couldn't be more thrilled.  For a first time purchaser of HDTV I am still amazed by the quality and clearness of this picture.  The remote is a bit large but easy to use.  It only took me about 30 minutes to figure out how to use all the features of the TV.  You can control just about anything you want as far as color goes.  The same can be said about the contrast and or brightness.  I have basically left my TV at the factory settings with only minor tweaks.The sound is okay.  I plan to upgrade to a surround sound system to make the viewing experience even better.  I can live with the sound for now.Over all I am very happy with my purchase.  I would definitely recommend this TV.  For the price I could not find another unit that was even remotely close.  I almost forgot, the 4 HDMI ports come in handy when you are hooking up any external devices.jkd88

Reviews.Title: Enjoying the Samsung set.
Reviews.Author: A. Parker
Reviews.Content: We are really enjoying our set. It was a very wise choice to purchase this brand on our part. We have had the set for only a month but we have no regrets at this time. We would like to do another review in about 5 months. We will probably purchase a 40 inch soon. Thank you Amazon and Samsung too!Artis & Lydia ParkerHiram, GA 30141

Reviews.Title: Worth it
Reviews.Author: Dov
Reviews.Content: Some major notes:1. Like everyone else, I did my homework. There is not a TV with these specs that has a better value!2. I began looking last christmas for a TV and waited on the sidelines while the prices dropped. To those who are still waiting - prices will continue to fall, especially as new models are unveiled. After having this TV at home for a week, the last thing I am thinking about is how I could have saved another $100 or whatever. This TV is so amazing, I wish I had bought it sooner. I was going to buy it here but when I went to take one last look at it at my local electronics store, it was only $30 more so I just got it there. But I buy a lot of stuff from Amazon and love their service.3. This TV is begging for Blu Ray. DVD's on a normal player look terrible; the set is too good for it. Non HD cable channels also don't look too good, compared to the HD channels. The HD Cable TV is phenomenal, and it only broadcasts at 1080i compared to the Blu Ray's at 1080p. I knew there was a difference from cable TV to HD cable, and to 1080p but actually seeing it is such a huge difference.  I had not really considered a Blue Ray before, but I am going to buy one very soon. This TV is made for super high def. I just can't shake the feeling that this TV is not complete without the Blu Ray.4. The TOC is super subtle. I can barely see it. It is not 'lit up' as the marketing suggests. This is my first big screen and we are very happy with it. I was concerned that I got a broken TV because it was so subtle but I called Samsung and said it is not actually lit up. The frame is merely translucent and there is just a small amount of red material inside that you can see when a light source hits it.It is also very light to pick up. I loaded and unloaded it myself, but had help getting it up to my fireplace.

Reviews.Title: Great LCD TV!
Reviews.Author: Greek "Spartan"
Reviews.Content: This TV is by far the best on the Market!  This was my first LCD TV (for that matter HDTV) and I did 2 months worth of research and seeing the different TV's in person (at bestbuy etc...) and this one had the most rich color and just clarity.  I also purchased a Vizio for another room and there is no comparision between the two.  All my family and friends love the realness this TV produces.  I would definitely buy another one in the future, even another family memeber purchased it but they got the 52inch one! Also Amazon has the best price and great customer service to go along with it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: J. Uselding "your average Jim"
Reviews.Content: I did much research on the internet and narrowed it down to this and Sony.  I agree the Sonys are more expensive due to name brand.  The delivery service was excellent.  It was delivered earlier then due date.  It was delivered in time frame agreed and they borught into house, unpacked it, setup basic tv hookup and had me inspect it.  Could not ask for anything more and it was FREE!!.  I shopped for price and even with store discounts, Amazon was by far the cheapest and that is before tax free.  After going to the store this was the TV with the best picture for a LCD.  However after ready reviews, I had concerns about the glare, the red tint around frame.  I also considered the 750 but decide the glow around the edges would bother me and was not worth getting the memory in the TV, slight better tech. the base third speaker and the internet connect. I have had the TV for close to a month.  The picture is clear the colors are bright and it looks almost 3d.  The hook-ups were easy and numerous.  I switched to a HD cable box and went form component to HDMI.  Results were a better picture, but manu times the picture was not full screen.  Have to play with that.  I have two big picture windows in room and the glare was a problem until I rearranged the room to put the TV against the same wall as the window.  THe glare is not an issue anymore.  I also like the red tint around the frame.  It is not noticable unless you look for it.  It is deep in color and blends somewhat with the black of the frame.  I read in the manual if you want digital sound do not route you other devices through the TV but directly to the receiver.  Still playing with the speaker and wiring to get the best sound.  For a TV the sound from the speakers was more than exceptable.  I did not care about the PIP and have not tried it.  The remote is acceptable and has back lighting when in the dark.  I did not hang the TV so having the swivel stand (750 does not)a plus since many times during setup, It was nice to turn the TV to get to the hookups to add the next device or change the wiring. I feel for me I made the correct decision.  Good luck in your decisionand what you pick makes you as happy as I am with my decision.One last note, I also found a fantastic corner stand that fits in the corner nicely is 2 feet tall and is very sturdy.  It was over $300 but looks sharp with the TV.  Best price was circuit city and model is BUS VS1183603 Bush Segments Collection Video Base.

Reviews.Title: Review on Samsung LCD-HD 650 model
Reviews.Author: M. Gregg "mysfre"
Reviews.Content: Bought Samsung LCD-HD LN46-650 model two weeks ago from Amazon. Paid a good price of $1579.99.  This TV was selling in my area for $2200.00 and had to pay state tax. Amazon shipped free and no tax which was savings.  This is my first LCD-HD TV and we currently do not have HD programing on our Dish plan, will wait for Feb.'09.The TV was delivered by Ceva trucking on exact date set up.  They brought the TV into my living room, I asked them to unbox it to check for damage and they did.  No damage and my husband set up TV with no problems.This is a great TV and currently has a great picture and the sports sections are wonderful. So far everything is working great with no problems and Samsung extented 1 yr. warranty with an extra 3 months.Tv does have a slow start but this is not a problem for me, it is only about 3 seconds or so.I did alot of TV research because I decided on this TV and so far we are completely satisfied. I do hope I have no problems with the TV as this was a large purchase.  This replaced a 25 yr.Sharp Tv for my living which I am still using in my bedroom.Hooked up a WII and it works perfectly. Do like that this  TV has a USB port, computer port, and a digital camera port which I have not used yet but will when I have time.In all so far, I am pleased and satisfied with this purchase and do recommend it.

Reviews.Title: 46" Samsung
Reviews.Author: FTX42
Reviews.Content: This may be the very best 46" LCD TV available.Picture quality is superior to other TVs.I also purchased a 52" Samsung in the 750 series.  It has the same picture quality as the 650 series with some added features.  The 650 series is the best buy.

Reviews.Title: Great Big TV
Reviews.Author: S. B. Zur "sbzreviews"
Reviews.Content: First off, buying this on Amazon is great. They deliver it to your place, unbox it and wait for you to say whether or not you want to keep the TV.  The price can't be beat (trust me I tried at a few retailers but they just can't price match Amazon).  The TV is really nice, the bezel is good looking and the picture quality is great. As with all big LCD's watching standard television looks worse than it did on the old tube TV, but that's a price you have to be willing to pay to get the AWESOME HD channels looking lovely.  The infolink is cool, but I don't find myself using it as often as I expected. I do like knowing it's there, and i like the USB cables and many many HDMI slots.Good tv - definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Eugene L. Lacek
Reviews.Content: I am extremely pleased with the performance of the Samsung HDTV I purchased from Amazon on 9-8-2000, which was a Sunday evening. If I was home on Friday 9-13-2000, I would had the TV on Fri. As it turned I received the set on the following Monday. Amazon kept me informed as to when the TV was shipped and on the expected delivery date.I have many read reviews from others re: this TV before I made the decision to purchase it. It is accurate that the shinny screen does reflect light when it is turned off like a mirror and also reflects lights from windows or lamps but to much lesser degree and I personally do not find this minor condition to be a problem when watching a program.  In fact, I rarely notice a reflection while watching the TV.In many reviews that I have read, there were many complaints re:  The Up/Down/Left/Right circular button on the remote. I admit that it took me a few tries to get the hang of it, but with in a few minutes I had no problem using it. I found this to be a minor negative.One other complaint I read Re: th Samsung 46A550 was that the sound was very poor. This is not the case on the 46A650. The sound is very satisfactory.I wasn't pleased with the delivery company (EGL)..The driver was NOT very careful bringing the TV into my house.  He was very rough in attemting to lift the unit over my 4" step into my house, banging against it until I assisted him to raise it high enough. He did take the unit out of the box and helped me to set it up on my TV stand.I have recommended the Samsung LN46A650 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV to several of friends. I am very a happy with it..Gene

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture
Reviews.Author: snirks "gopack"
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of researching HD televisions before deciding on this particular model.  I had heard from several friends that Samsung was the way to go - now I completely agree.  The picture is amazing.  The functionality is awesome, and the price is good.  The pros far outweigh the con.  That's right, just one con - to me anyway.  It takes about 7-10 seconds to turn on.  But, to me, this is just a minor inconvenience.  I am not a technology buff by any means, but I highly recommend this set.

Reviews.Title: Best LCD on the market
Reviews.Author: W. Carrabine "Logan"
Reviews.Content: 1st off I run a 7.1 home theater surround system and wanted to upgrade my hd tv to 1080p. I did a lot of research and found that Samsung had the best tv's.After receiving the lcd tv and setting it up the picture is amazing and the sounds just from this model lcd is very good not tinny at all. The colors jump out at you the 120hrz processing is very nice eliminates most ghosting.  This is a very space saving tv if you want large size but save room and it is surprisingly light weight.1 last thing that they don't tell you about this tv it may save you a little on your heat bills during the winter the lcd does give off quite a bit of heat so you may have to turn your thermostat down a bit this winter.Cost wise I price shopped stores out of curiosity to see if I could get a better deal and after going to all the big box stores that most would think to go to I realized one thing. I would pay almost 3,500.00 for the same tv with the extended warranty plus tax at a store and I got the same tv here with extended warranty and free shipping for less than 1,900.00.It's a no brainer buying online is cheaper and with amazon.com you cant go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Happy in PA
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Rado
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased a Samsung LN46A650 LCD HDTV from Amazon and couldn't be happier.  Amazon had a great price and the service was very professional.  The order was placed on Monday and I had my TV on Friday. From a review I had read, I did have some concern about a glare issue since I have two large windows in my living room.  I am happy to report that glare is not a problem at all and the TV is fantastic.Happy in PA

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCDs are top of the line
Reviews.Author: R. Husted "Grunt and Gamer"
Reviews.Content: I was torn between both the Sony and Samsung LCDs. Samsung was cheaper and the picture was a little more vivid and crisp in my opinion. The only question was that the screen does reflect some light, a lot more than the Sony models.  That being said the $200 dollar difference was well worth the try. I have the TV in my downstairs media room and it is directly next to a bay window at ground level and the reflection is noticeable but not too annoying or distracting if you ask me, however I can see why it may bother some people. But this picture is absolutely amazing.  The only thing that you may want to keep in mind is the 120 Hz True Motion on these high end LCD HDTVs. But there is no noticeable difference between the Sony and the Samsungs in my opinion. I watched them side by side and couldn't tell. But I wasn't quite sure how I felt about it at first, but I have grown to really like it. The way the camera moves and stuff makes it almost look unnatural, but you get used to it. I absolutely love to tell you the truth, but it does take some getting used to. After that it is like movies aren't even movies anymore, they are like watching something going on right outside your window......like you are watching live footage. It is crazy, and I recommend Iron Man and Transformers...watch those two films and you won't want to watch anything else.......add a Blu Ray disc player and you are going to change the way you see movies now.

Reviews.Title: Great choice!
Reviews.Author: S. Reimer
Reviews.Content: I was debating between this Samsung and the Sony KDL-46XBR5 for quite some time. I did some shopping around for these two TVs. I checked the Internet and also went into my local Circuit City to see them first hand.The Sony did have a little better picture and the screen is more of a matte finish which has less of a reflection on it.This Samsung has a glossy screen but it isn't as bad with reflections as I expected it to be. The only time I really notice reflections with this screen is when there is a dark scene and there is a lot of daylight/lights on.The Samsung has more options than the Sony does which is a plus. 4 HDMI ports, a great black level and an excellent crisp picture take the cake!The Sony costs quite a bit more and I felt the cost was not worth it.I found the best price for this Samsung here at Amazon! After shopping around at many different places, this was $500 cheaper than anything I could find and the free white glove shipping was the best deal! I received the TV in only a few days as well!Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Lives up to expectations
Reviews.Author: NTC
Reviews.Content: This tv arrived yesterday and I've been in front of it for most of the last 24 hours.  I researched tvs for a few months a year ago but didn't buy.  I researched again this year for a few months and bought this one based on reviews, how it looked in the store, and the price.  I also bought a PS3 so I could fully appreciate the 1080p when watching movies.  So far I've watched No Country For Old Men on blu-ray and played gran turismo (I'm not a gamer but might become one).The picture quality is as good as I expected and maybe a little more.  The black level is excellent, the picture is clear, and the colors are sharp.I have this tv in a fairly bright room so I definitely get a lot of glare.  However, I expected that going in and for me it's worth it since I got it at $500 off.  I'll also be moving within the next year so maybe it will be in a darker room at my next place.  The red frame is noticeable but it looks okay and doesn't take anything away from the picture.I'm getting cable today and will be watching a lot of tv.  I'll update my review if my opinion changes in the next few weeks.

Reviews.Title: Excellent, but do your homework
Reviews.Author: G Clark "raceready"
Reviews.Content: I shopped retail stores looking at HDTV's for a few months before deciding to purchase the Samsung 650 series 46" tv. I was originally looking at the 750 series model, but there is very little difference for the approx. $200 price difference...an integrated sub-woofer which is marginal at best, and a mute point if you're patching the tv into your home system, and a gig of on-board cache for computer related stuff.The Samsungs had some of the best picture quality of all of the tv's on display. I would think there's a reason they have 35% of the LCD HDTV market share, but I also think the Sonys are very good as well, but priced higher.I noticed some have mentioned a glare issue with this tv, but this does not bother me at all. I've found that all tv's will have reflections, especially on bright days in the room where the tv sits. Even my old 35" CRT tube tv gets some screen reflection. The Samsung clear panel technology is responsible for the more vivid colors and deeper blacks that a lot of other flat panels lack. This may contribute to it, but I think it's a good trade-off. It's really a matter of opinion, and I've found that the picture on these tv's are excellent regardless of room lighting conditions. One important thing...you may think that the picture is good right out of the box, but calibrating is crucial to getting the absolute best picture and extending the life of the tv. You can either pay to have your tv professionally calibrated, where they will plug expensive calibration equipment directly into your tv if you have the budget(some will come out and do it for anywhere from $150 to $300), or there are a couple of other options that are cheaper. You can buy a calibration dvd, and there are a couple of good ones out there, that takes you through the steps, or there are a couple of web sites where settings are posted for the various models. They won't be customized for your particular room, but are an excellent starting point......tweaktv.com being one of the better ones. If you go this route, you'll need to stay with the new settings for a few days to form an opinion since the factory settings are very high and bright, and something you get used to very quickly.I did my homework, so I knew what to expect, and I'm very happy with this tv. This was my first major purchase through an Amazon merchant, and the price was excellent...and with free shipping. If you know what you want, and buy through a rock solid site with a good reputation, it's the only sensible way to go.

Reviews.Title: Superb TV if ambient light is reasonably well-controlled
Reviews.Author: Timm K.
Reviews.Content: After using this TV for over a week in a room with four large windows (two 60x30, two 80x35) with south and east exposure, respectively, I second the concerns of some reviewers about reflections off the glossy screen. Fortunately, I watch TV mostly at night. For watching during the day, the blackout shades on the larger two windows and brown fabric light-filtering shades on the other two (which are facing the TV) are eliminating the reflections almost completely. Without the shades lowered on the windows facing the TV, dark movies or scenes noticeably suffer from very distracting reflections on anything but the brightest material. Thus, light control should be a paramount concern for people planning to use the TV during the day in rooms with windows facing the screen.However, in a light-controlled room, this TV truly offers one of the best pictures I have ever seen. Superb detail and, with the unit calibrated (using the Digital Video Essentials HD Basics: Blu-ray DVD), an astounding color trueness and deep blacks (though obviously not quite on par with Pioneer's Kuro plasmas - if you want and can afford that, go with Samsung's 950 series or the Kuros). Conveniently, the inputs can be adjusted individually, so you can use the set's pretty exhaustive picture adjustments to optimize the settings for each input.I am pairing this unit with a Pioneer BDP-51FD blu-ray player and a Denon 2930CI upscaling player set to 1080p output, so your mileage may vary somewhat, especially when watching regular (non blu-ray) DVDs, depending on the player you use. However, the set appears to have surprisingly (given the price point) good video processing and correctly de-interlaces interlaced material, so unless your upscaling player is rather good, you may want to try having it put out 480i and let the TV do the scaling.The punchline: Superb picture IF ambient light can be controlled.

Reviews.Content: Like many of you, I did exhaustive research before making my decision. It really came down to Samsung and Sony. I also rely on reviews to help make a decision.
