Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Lupin III
Reviews.Content: Bought the LN46A650 on Amazon, after I was at BestBuy, taking a look at all the different TV's, whether it be the Pioneer and Panasonic plasmas, or the Sony, Sharp, LG and Samsung LCDs.  I found myself drawn to the Sonys and the Samsungs that had 120hz.  It was interesting that sometimes I found the Sony's picture better, and sometimes I found the Samsung's better.  Considering the Samsung was 400 dollars less expensive, it was an easy choice.  I also had to make sure I could live with the Touch of Color red, which really isn't that bad.  Maybe if you're in a REALLY brightly lit room, it might get to you, but my room is pretty average lighting, not too dark or light, and the red doesn't bother me, it actually looks kind of nice.The screen is glossy, and yes, I'd rather it not.  However, without the gloss, the color might not be so good.  The color is fantastic, and it has the ability to burn your eyeballs if you so desire with the dynamic mode.  I actually calibrated my tv with one of those calibration discs, and in a nutshell, brightness got turned down, and gamma got turned up.  The picture looks fantastic for movies, however, if I need a brightness boost, like when I'm watching the game, there are 3 presets (game, movie, sports) that will do the trick with a simple push.The remote is backlit which is nice, and its a little sluggish, and not that appealing visually, however, like most, I too, will be purchasing a harmony universal remote, so whatever.  Too bad they don't have a 50 dollar discount on units to come without the remote!Switching sources is a bit sluggish, but I don't have another reference point, so I'm not sure if all LCD's are like that when switching between my cable to my blu-ray, or if its a thing with this set.Overall, picture is fantastic, touch of color isn't bad, tons of inputs.  I'm a happy customer.

Reviews.Content: Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of ColorI bought this a few weeks ago but finally took delivery last Thurs. (Due to moving) Got HD cable (DishNetwork) connected this morning. As everyone else has stated...absolutely beautiful TV, both frame (matches our TV stand :) and pix. Sony had a few more features, but the image on Samsung is head and shoulders above the comparable Sony: vibrant colors, sharp images, clean action (a good friend of mine has Sony's XBR3 unit and I like mine a lot better ;) I'm still learning how to optimize the image, but what I have now is so much better than anything before it. Well-worth the investment. Everone's comments here are spot on....Amazon was great. A week after I purchased and set up delivery, the price dropped and Amazon was courteous and responsive in providing the credit (I'd be interested in learning how the person who said he/she got it for ~$1500 did it...that's a great price!).Delivery, on the other hand, was less than satisfying. Never asked if I needed a showing to understand how to set up and use the unit. I'm glad Amazon offered no-cost shipping....but then, maybe I got what I paid for :(

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Amazing LCD and Great Service Overall
Reviews.Author: Russell Armstrong "Piniq"
Reviews.Content: This LCD TV is absolutely Amazing! The first time I plugged it in, it had the most amazing picture quality before I even calibrated it. There are other reviews that will tell you more about that. I read a lot of reviews before deciding on this TV and I wanted to address the issues people had with it. First I don't get barely any glare from the TV when I have the lights on in the room, Yes maybe a little more than if it had a Matte screen but not enough that it even makes the slightest difference compared to the benefit. The sound is another con by most people and I don't see why I have the TV at 25% volume in my apartment and I can hear it in the kitchen and throughout my apartment; at 50% volume my neighbors can hear it. If you want incredible sound buy a surrond system but for casual video guys like me in an apartment, the sound is great. Also the Remote isn't that bad and I think for the quality TV people are just picking at the smallest of details. I appreciate people doing this though so we know all of the details but over all there are no cons to keep anybody from buying the Samsung LN46A650.As a finishing touch the shipping worried me because of the reviews I read, but the service was 5 star. They called me and set an appointment within 4 days of me buying my TV and my wife was home to receive it and the guy showed her to setup and was very courteous. They were very careful and knowledgable. He even wiped down the TV very carefully and asked if we wanted to remove the plastic rather than him doing it and also gave us the option of taking the box or keeping it in case of a return. He also turned on the TV and checked the screen for any problems. Don't believe what you read about CEVA they are A+ service.

Reviews.Title: Excellent LCD choice
Reviews.Author: W. wang "av84me"
Reviews.Content: I bought this model at the same time with Samsung LN52A750 (52").  Other than the ToC (Touch of Color) only appears top and bottom, and the little more 'round' shape on the bottom, and some internal differences, this TV is the same as 7 series.This TV does swivel, and my other TV (LN52A750) does not if you use the stand.Overall, it is a great TV with the best picture quality.  You can really see the difference if you have Samsung LCD sitting side by side with any other brand LCD.I believe Sony is coming out with its XBR 6,7, and 8 to compete with Samsung's 6, 7, 8, and 9 series.  Not sure the pricing of Sony's, but with the pricing coming down few hundred dollars for the Samsung 6 and 7 series, I will highly recommend Samsung over Sony.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 650 LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Mary I. Valuri "marycherry"
Reviews.Content: we are very happy with this set.  The picture and sound are great, and the TV looks like a work of art, with the red toned frame and shapely stand.  We like the fact that the screen can swivel for viewing from any angle in our large living room.

Reviews.Title: Glad I waited to buy this one
Reviews.Author: Joe C
Reviews.Content: I shopped for a few months before I made my selection.  Samsung's LCD units offered the richest picture available.  The issues w/ previous firmware versions where the unit shuts off and on no longer exists with the newer units.  The setup is very simple and the remote looks difficult but I was able to navigate it pretty quickly.Buy this unit from Amazon.  I'm telling you that I priced a 42" unit at all of the electronic outlets and was able to buy the 46" unit on Amazon for the same price as the 42" units at the popular outlets.  The white glove delivery and return policy removed all concerns.  I love this TV.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: Shizzy
Reviews.Content: I bought this excellent tv a month ago and i was vastly impressed at the colors and contrast ratio.  I have a sharp aquos that i have loved and this tv just blows it away.  Compare it at stores to others and there is no competition.  Great size, and has different tv modes, such as movie, sports for brighter, excellent colors etc.  If you are in the market for an LCD, look here first, you can't go wrong!

Reviews.Title: A Beauty but!
Reviews.Author: William Tell
Reviews.Content: I love the intense picture quality which is evident when you go from a digital cable channel to one that is analog.  However, I did experience the TV shutting itself off.  I did use the flash upgrade, which helped, but it has since shut off once more.  I also find at times that the picture will stop/freeze and/or the audio will be garbled.  I contacted tech support who felt it was a problem with the cable provider.  Has anyone else experienced this type of problem?  It was somewhat annyoying  while viewing the Olympics.  Overall, it is a great TV.  I researched for over three years and bought this one dispite the warning of the set shutting off on its own.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Farid Rekabi
Reviews.Content: I researched for along time before I bought this particular TV. The look is great, and at 120hz, It has a great picture. If you get the HD package, you will see what I mean.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: L. Carlton "shackncj"
Reviews.Content: Great picture, refresh rate. Best price by far. Saved $300 on sticker price alone. Solid HDTV - VERY happy with it! No issues with having it shipped either - arrived perfectly fine, no issues. Definitely recommend a brick and morter to peruse and look, Amazon to buy!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 6-series purchase
Reviews.Author: K. Selby
Reviews.Content: After months of researching and comparing to like Sony products I felt with the size, price and everything the 46" Series-6 offers the decision was finally an easy one and have not been disappointed since receiving it.  Set up was relatively easy even for this TV remote-challenged buyer and after a little reading had it working with no problems.

Reviews.Title: JAW STILL ON THE FLOOR
Reviews.Author: Michael P. White
Reviews.Content: The delivery service was amazing, friendly, timely, and very flexible.  The tv is amazing.  I was playing Half-Life 2 on PS3 last night and my jaw hit the floor.  I was used to playing it on a 20 inch tube, I will never go back.  Simply stunning.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Choice
Reviews.Author: C. Lau
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent LCD TV with crystal clear picture, video is exceptional good.  The features are outstanding: with 4 HDMI, I connected DirectV HD receiver, a HD DVD player, play station, and a regular DVD/CD player.  I can't be more happy that this.  I bought this to watch olympics. The motion flow (120hz) feature gives me no delay in watching fast moving sport motion.

Reviews.Title: WOW! AMAZING TV
Reviews.Author: T. Murphy "Murphman"
Reviews.Content: Just recieved my Samsung 46a650 today, got it all setup and its working great. The white glove service was amazing, unpacked the TV and carried it upstairs, plugged it in and made sure everything was working. No issues with sound, display, no clouding, no haze, no flashlights, no dead pixels..Now i'm just waiting to setup my HD Cable, watching in SD right now, doesn't look the best, but it's watchable.. Will call our provider later this week and get that setup.Waiting on a shipment of HDMI cables, which were supposed to be delivered today, but nothing has shown up. So for the time being, i'll have to use old composite video for my ps3, but i was lucky enough to have my xbox 360 hooked up to provide HD Quality, games look amazing, had no issues of lag.Once I recieve the HDMI cables, here i come blu-ray. Picked up about 20 blu-ray movies this past weekend for this particular day so that I could start experiencing high quality movies.Did I mention this TV is HUGE! I was going to get a 40" but I didn't want to regret it later down the road, so i picked up the 46" and i'm glad I made that choice. At 7-8ft viewing distance, this TV is the perfect size for my Bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Remarkable Television
Reviews.Author: Randy Berry
Reviews.Content: This television is more than I had expected.  I have been shopping for a flat panel television for a while.  I made repeated trips to retail stores to help me decide.  At first I would look at picture quality without looking at the brand names.  Everytime I was drawn to the Samsung LCD.  When I decided on the exact model, I began shopping the internet for the best price and chose Amazon.  I was a little reluctant getting the LN46A650 because of the "turning off" problems - and - I could have saved $100 at a couple of other sites, but I have been a long-time Amazon customer and have always been pleased with their service.  Speaking of their service let me tell you about the delivery of my set. It was shipped by CEVA (Eagle).  I was able to track the whole shipment process on their website and they called me with a 4-hour delivery window as promised.  The driver could not have been more courteous, unpacked the set, hooked it up to make sure it worked OK and offered to haul off the boxes.  "White-glove" delivery is EXACTLY what I received!I've been watching the Samsung LN46A650 for a little over a week.  HD programming is exceptional.  I have satellite television, so the local network channels aren't in HD format yet; but, I can purchase an HD antenna if I want to view them in HD.  I'm not going to bore you with a lot technical stuff, if you're into it, you can do your own research.  I do know this television has a great picture, the best I've ever seen.  Would I buy this TV again?  YES I would!Now for the icing on the cake.  Seven days after it was delivered, I noticed the price had dropped $65 on Amazon, so I requested a refund through Amazon's Post-Order Price Guarantee.  No questions asked!  Within 24 hours, my refund had already been processed.I am a very pleased customer....Again!

Reviews.Title: Stunning
Reviews.Author: BabyG "Sam"
Reviews.Content: This is my first LCD TV. So did lot of research. Decided to buy this TV after reading reviews on cnet. I am glad I did. This TV is simply stunning with amazing pictures. Lot of connectivity options. Great great great product.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of Color
Reviews.Author: Herman L. Karhoff
Reviews.Content: We love our new TV! Everything as advertised (i.e., great price & shipping service). A great shopping experience!

Reviews.Title: I think I'm in love!
Reviews.Author: P. Sugden
Reviews.Content: Just got this delivered by CEVA a few hours ago in perfect condition. And all I can say is WOW!! great picture, slick looking television.  I love it so far.  I hooked up PS3 and it is just amazing!  I would not hesitate to buy something like this again from Amazon...Good job Amazon!update:It is a week later and I'm still in awe of this tv!!!  Not one problem with it, everything works great.  Buy it, you can not go wrong.Update part IIStill in love with tv, buy buy buy

Reviews.Title: Amazing HDTV
Reviews.Author: K. Malladi
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV after looking at the rave reviews.I am very much happy with the TV. I am enjoying the Olympics in HD and the picture quality is great. My friends who owned expensive Tv's than this like Sony Bravia XBR and Pioneer also gave good applause. Also Amazon is the best place to buy this TV and the delivery is within 5 days of placing the order.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46'
Reviews.Author: Christopher Cumberbatch
Reviews.Content: Product and delivery was excellent!!!!! Delivery/Setup with 5 business days of purchase.  Saved over $700 compared to retail price.  Sharp picture and will recommend to anyone considering this television unit.

Reviews.Title: Out of the box its great
Reviews.Author: D. Rosen
Reviews.Content: Amazon delivered what was offered and the Samsung LN46A650 was perfect out of the box.  GREAT set and picture.  I have it hooked up to HD box from Comcast and the PLaystation 3 as my DVD player.

Reviews.Title: This TV is AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: J. Li
Reviews.Content: I am not a techy in any sense of the word.  However, I do recognize good picture quality and this television is absolutely fantastic. The colors are eye-popping and the lines are sharp and I don't even have the high-definition cable channels.  This television coupled with an upconverting DVD player results in a picture that is, in my opinion, as close to HDTV as you are going to get without the high prices of HD-DVDs.  It was easy to set up because if I can do it, anyone can.  Also, I shopped around and Amazon prices are more than competitive for this product.  (When I was shopping it was the cheapest.)  Amazon delivery was excellent.  They called me in advance to set up the time and when the TV arrived, they took it out of the box and inspected it with me to make sure that it is OK.

Reviews.Title: Simply Spectacular!
Reviews.Author: Gregory W. Fink
Reviews.Content: Received the 650 at 46" today and it is simply spectacular!  Pulling in 1080i from cable box and HDMI cable let me watch Phelps get #8 gold in absoulute clarity.  Even watching DVDs in 480 showed details never seen before.I did the research on all available contenders and this proved the champ. Go to Best Buy and look, but do not buy there, as prices are too high.  Delivery was fast and great with white glove.  Price beat Best Buy by over $400 and no sales tax or shipping cost.  Do not even consider Sony, which I looked at very critically.  Samsung price:value is huge.  We also have several Samsung PC flat panels and they do nothing but perform great. Cannot make a higher recommendation for any product...Get yours in time for football season and root for the Steelers!Also, do not buy Monster $100 HDMIs.  Get the HDMIs on the recommended link at Amazon for under $10.  HDMIs only send 1s and 0s and do not need the Monster cables for great def/sound.  Monster is good for analog, however and I use them for that purpose.

Reviews.Title: Simply amazing
Reviews.Author: Sean M. Winard
Reviews.Content: Like most everyone who buys a TV, I researched this and other sets for the past 3 months.  I finally decided that I wanted this one, but it took me a few weeks to finally pull the trigger. I'm glad I did though! I ordered on Tuesday, and by that Friday around noon, CEVA was already calling me to set up a delivery time on Saturday.  CEVA's tracking was a little weird, for all those days it still said my package was in Ohio (it shipped from Kentucky), and then all of a sudden I got the call. They were really polite and when I asked them to call me ahead of time they said no problem.On Saturday, the delivery guy called me about an hour before he arrived. It was two guys, and then brought the package in, unpacked it for me, put the batteries in the remote and let me turn it on myself. There was no damage whatsoever, no dead pixels, clouding, or any other problems. A perfect set! I hooked it up to my digital cable and my Xbox360 and it is by far the most outstanding picture I've ever seen.  The remote takes a good 10 minutes to get used to, but it's fine overall and I don't find it to be too much of a nuisance.  The sound is also much better than people give it credit for.  I haven't tried out all the little features and things yet, but so far it's a great investment and I'm happy I went through with it.

Reviews.Title: Exceptional
Reviews.Author: Joe Swanson
Reviews.Content: Everything & more than the description.  120hz is worth it, especially if you are a sports fan.  No tracers, crystal clear picture even during the fastest action.

Reviews.Title: This is One Solid Performing LCD
Reviews.Author: DigitalSalsero
Reviews.Content: I was in the market for a new LCD television, upgrading from a 26" Sharp Aquos LCD.  After reading a few of the reviews on various forums for different brands and models, I settled on the LN46A650 from Amazon. Amazon offered the best price. I was a little skeptical at first about the customer service involved with shipping such a large and expensive item, but for the most part it's been a pleasant experience.Unlike a lot of customers who already have HD sources, for now, I use the TV mainly for watching regular DVDs. I anticipate getting HD sources connected to the TV in the near future. Given that, the quality of standard DVD definition on the TV is nothing short of spectacular. Depending on what you're watching, a lot of the scenes can actually appear to look HD in quality. Of course, if you've been reading the reviews for this TV you already know of its rich feature set and superior black level. I agree wholeheartedly with those assessments.Likewise, you are probably aware of the somewhat reflective screen and that the touch of color (RED) isn't for everyone. For these two things, I'd recommend going to your local Best Buy or video store and checking the TV out for yourself to see if it agrees with your tastes. The remote control is probably the weakest link to this TV. It seems like more of an afterthought to an otherwise great TV. In my opinion, it's a hideous-looking remote that really isn't consistent with the quality and "bling" of the TV. The wheel can be difficult to use if you're not a patient person. Plus, it's not a universal remote, which came as a disappointment. Other than that, so far the TV is consistent with the positive reviews that are out there. You may have an issue with the firmware and software, but it's definitely not a deal breaker and is easily corrected.Now onto my shopping experience with Amazon. Like I mentioned, Amazon offered the best price/customer service balance. I'm certain you can find cheaper TVs on this model elsewhere but you may find yourself in a tussle with their customer service dept. should something go wrong. With my initial purchase, something did go wrong. I took my initial delivery a couple weeks ago and found the TV had a few defective pixels in the lower right corner. Of course, these things can occasionally happen on such a large LCD TV so I didn't cry about it....too much. After the discovery I simply called Amazon and explained to them the situation and they immediately set up an exchange for me. The call took less than 5 minutes and the rep. on the other line was very cordial. Two weeks later I took delivery of the new unit and so far the TV is performing perfectly. Of course, I'm still within the 30 days of my delivery so I plan to test the heck out the TV and update this review accordingly.As far as the main delivery company, CEVA, the company needs to train their phone handlers to be a little more courteous to their callers. The delivery was on time as should be expected but upon calling them to arrange specific delivery times I got the sense that they were either overworked or just didn't want to bother talking to anyone. In short, they were not very polite, even by today's standards.  Regardless of that, the delivery process itself was decent. Just don't expect the "white glove" label to be something spectacular because in my recent experience, it was just "normal glove".This is a solid performing TV and I'd recommend you give it some serious consideration to add to your entertainment arsenal.

Reviews.Title: Best Television I've ever seen.
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: The best way to show you how good this tv is would be to completely list it's flaws.1) The rotary controller on the remote is a poor excuse for arrow buttons, and doesn't respond as it should. Consequently, using the TV's menus can be a pain.Other than that, this machine is stellar. I cannot see myself ever purchasing another TV as long as I live.

Reviews.Title: What A TV
Reviews.Author: M. Leefar
Reviews.Content: What a great set!!!  I see some here say they had a problem with the remote. It works fine for me. Beware of those on the web low balling this set. They will not sell you the set unless ypu buy add ons. I had this happen at 4 other dealers. Many only give you a 90 day warranty also which means it's "gray goods". I ordered the set from Amazon on Monday and recieved it 8 days later. The drivers delivered it on time,took it out of the box and hooked up the set to make sure it worked and then took the box with them after I requested them to. I also hear the prices of TVs will be going up and saw proof of it as Amazon has raised the price of this one by $75.00 since I bought it 10 days ago. Don't wait much longer or I fully expect the price to go even higher. I did my homework on TVs (even the salesperson at Best Buy said this set was the best TV in the store). This is a great set, get it!!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Ln46a650 video settings
Reviews.Author: Andre Frederick "Galaxy Note 3"
Reviews.Content: This is the best looking lcd I've seen in my life.  This TV will have you watching your old movies all over again.  Until I get professional calibration I have the TV settings like this:MODE:  STANDARDBACK LIGHT: 7CONTRAST 90BRIGHTNESS 50SHARPNESS 75COLOR 55TINT G50/R50PICTURE OPTIONCOLOR TONE NORMALSIZE 16:9DIGITAL NR OFFDNIE ONHDMI LEVEL NORMALFILM MODE OFFAUTO MOTION PLUS 120HZ MEDIUMDETAIL SETTINGSBLACK ADJUST OFFDYNAMIC CONTRAST HIGHGAMMA 0COLOR SPACE NATIVEFLESH TONE -2EDGE ENHANCEMENT ONXVYCC OFFREFERENCE MATERIALHIGH DEFINITION VERSION OF:THE INCREDIBLESCARSRATATOUILLETEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES 2007ICE AGE 2: THE MELT DOWNYOU CAN WATCH THESE MOVIES AND NOTICE A HIGHER LEVEL OF BLACK DETAIL IT ALMOST LOOKS LIKE 3D.Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of Color

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: TechGuy
Reviews.Content: Great purchase, delivery, and setup!  Please note that the free delivery takes about 7-10 days. This picture is outstanding with very rich colors and superior contrast you really can't ask for much more! I haven't had a real opportunity to evaluate the 120hz refresh to date. The surface of the display is a bit reflective as noted in some reviews, but we watch TV primarily at night so it's really not a bid deal.  This is no more reflective than a conventional CRT. The red touch of color around the outer edge is nice and very subdued. This LCD stands up the staunchest Sony competition and a much lower price.

Reviews.Title: I have now seen greatness!
Reviews.Author: R. P. Scott
Reviews.Content: Okay, I have been looking at Samsung televisions for the last 8 months or so, the pictures always looked unreal to me, and every place I went it seemed if the employees there were in a trance because they could never tell me how it was creating that good of a picture and how they could even say the other 1080P's were close to the picture when I new Johnny Depp and the rest of the pirates were not coming out of the tv like they were on the Samsung. Long story short, I have been wanting the tv for months, and after buying a magnavox and Toshiba 42" I finally had to push all those to the side and get what I wanted! Two days ago I did it, and I have never seen something so beautiful (my wife is up there mind you :) )  Every day I watch the TV I am still amazed, I watch Direct TV HD channels and the pictures pop out on that, I watch Old Dvd's movies made in the 70's they pop out, I watch Blue Ray disc and the clarity is incredible!! This was the best purchase I ever did. I see no flaws (although the remote wheel does kinda suck) I recommend this TV to anyone who is thinking of going HD, and strongly imply not to consider any other brand, it is just that much better than the rest!

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Richard Stolz
Reviews.Content: The unit was delivered a day late because we had made other commitments. When the unit arrived the box was slightly damaged. The person delivering the unit asked that we observe the unloading of the unit. There was no apparent damage. He hooked up the unit and had it running in short time. I was somewhat hesitent about ordering such a large item over the internet but, after this purchase I'll have no trouble in the future. Overall we felt that this was handled well even with slight damage to the package. As for the unit itself, this is by far the best viewing TV we have ever seen. Being on antenna or satelite makes no difference. Would suggest this TV to even the pickest viewer.

Reviews.Title: Worth all the hype and even more !!!
Reviews.Author: Adrenaline
Reviews.Content: Well, let me start by saying that I was one of those who did not really care about the 120hz nor the 50,000:1 contrast ratio. After doing some "extensive" research I settled on the 46LNA550 over the 650 as the best value for money...yes the 550. I went to my local BB and brought that baby home. After 2 days, I found that Amazon had the 650 on sale for the same price of the 550. So I went to BB to take a look at it and was simply blown away by the picture. The 650 had a Blue ray hooked up to it and the picture was just fantastic. Also I really liked the Red TOC which look far more elegant and cool than the bland black frame of the 550. If you are spending so much on the TV i figured that it should have the looks too.So off went the 550, in came the 650 through Amazon. Eagle shipping was fast (my TV came in 4 days) sometimes for people living in smaller cities, they dont have service everyday, so make sure you are home at the scheduled time. I've been using the 650 for close to 3 weeks and till date I havent regretted my decision. The 650 is georgeous to look at (depends on the user). The pictures for Standard Definition are very good and crisp. I dont feel like adding the HD package when my SD looks this good. You do need to do some tweaking for the pic (available at avsforum.com) but it is till very good with the SD channels.As for the sound people have been complaining, I live in an apt and my living room is fairly large, I never had to turn up the volume more than 50% to listen to most of the channels. You need to turn it up a bit more if you have ur A/C running or in a noisy environment (when ppl around u are talking all the time). As for the glare/shiny surface, you will hardly notice it when you are watching TV. The only noticible effect is when its turned off and you can see significant reflection. But hey, if the TV is off, you aint watchin it either :)So overall, the 650 is the best bang for the buck. For those torn between the 550 and 650, if you dont mind the price difference, go with the 650, if its gonna make a dent in ur budget, the 550 is an equally good tv and will serve you well over the years. Compared to the 650, the 550 wasnt all that far behind. Now my next goal is to add a PS3 and harness the power of Blue Ray to see how the 650 handles it.Good luck.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650
Reviews.Author: Chris M. Pickering
Reviews.Content: Great picture, easy setup. Appearance of TV is clean and simple.Considering Sony XBR4, glad I went with Samsung. Every bit the television at a cheaper price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for what I expected so far
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "bluejay"
Reviews.Content: I just had a chance to try it out once since I got it (3 days ago), since work is killing me by time I get home.  Hey, hard times takes a toll on some of us.Ok, enough of my sorry life; The TV arrived in mint condition, I repeat 'mint'.  I was afraid to be one of the unlucky ones you read on the reviews of having defects or problems.  So far I am quite happy with it.  Hopefully everything will still work ok so you won't hear from me on this review.  Image is very crisp but I still don't see the 'soap opera' effect everyone tells me with the AMP feature.  It just looks crisper to me, but I don't jack up all the settings , so I lowered some of the settings down.From me... I say take a gamble and get it; If it you hit over 21, you can always ask the dealer to deal you again.

Reviews.Title: It doesn't get much better than this
Reviews.Author: prognaut
Reviews.Content: I was ready to buy the 750, but after reading about some of the design issues and determining that the extra features and functionality weren't important to me, I decided that this would be the TV for me.  I was right.This is the most amazing television I have ever seen.  The picture, the controls and the design are all top notch.  Samsung outdid themselves with this model.Even out of the box, the picture was amazing.  I didn't tinker with any settings for about a week and honestly was perfectly happy.  My DVD player and Wii looked fine, although regular cable looked awkward.  Then I made a few adjustments using some basic test patterns from an Avia DVD I bought several years ago and the picture is now absolutely beautiful.  I think the two biggest adjustments I made were to the sharpness (factory setting was waaaaay too high) and saturation (factory setting was too red).  Now movies played through my standard DVD player (no Blue-ray yet, that's next) look just about as good as they do on the big screen, and even regular cable looks fine (I think those who are complaining that it looks too "real" should try turning the sharpness way down).  I also just got hooked up to HD digital cable and the picture quality is unbelievable.  I really can't describe how good it is, so I'll stop.I like the remote.  It's not the prettiest remote I've seen, but I find it fairly intuitive.  Same with most of the basic menu options.The TV itself is very good looking.  I didn't think I'd like the touch of color, but it's grown on me.I was initially a little hesitant to make a purchase this large through Amazon, but money talks and I couldn't justify spending an extra $300-$400 plus shipping at a competitor.  So I had to wait an extra week or so for delivery, but that wasn't really a big deal.  It's summer and I should be outside anyway.  Their "white glove" service was great.  They came as scheduled and had me set up in less than 30 minutes.  No complaints with service.As others have mentioned, the only real downside with this set is that the picture in picture is a pain in the arse and is basically useless if you don't use a coax/antenna input.  My old Sony (which now sadly will not turn on) had a great split screen feature and I could play video games and watch TV/movies at the same time.  But that's the only thing I miss.Also, so far I'm not a fan of the AMP.  But that's not really an issue because it's easy to turn off.Overall this is one of the best TVs I've ever seen.  Definitely the best I've ever owned.  I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a high end flat panel.

Reviews.Title: Great picture for the price
Reviews.Author: J.C.S "country boy"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tv through Amazon and I hooked up Direct tv hd to it. The picture is incredible, it is easy to set up as well.The box the tv came in let me know it had the latest software installed so I should have no problem with the auto-shut off issue.Some have reported trouble with the remote but I find that the rotating center is actually easy to use.The finish is great the touch of red makes it distinct compared to just the plain old piano finish.

Reviews.Title: Great experience w/Amazon, great TV!
Reviews.Author: A. Stewart
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this TV and when it arrived I turned it on all excited and...it was broken, big line through the middle of the screen and half of the screen was dead.  I called Amazon and they sent another out ASAP and even discounted me the difference of what I paid and the the price it was listed at that day (refunded me $108).  When the delivery guy dropped off the second TV he took the defective one without any hassle and even helped me set up the new one and make sure it was working before he left.On the the product...Samsung has the market on LCD TVs at the moment, simply amazing picture quality.  I have played games (PS3), watched movies (DVD/Blu-Ray), HDTV channels, you name it and I am constantly impressed with the picture quality.  I prefer to view it with the auto-motion turned off but that aside everything is great.  Comes with good baseline factory settings for color and has the darkest blacks out of any of the TVs comparable in price.  After viewing the Sony and Samsung side by side there is no contest.  You will not be disappointed with this purchase, great product and great customer service from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Making a right choice
Reviews.Author: HWY
Reviews.Content: Can't be happier with the service of Amazon and the quality of Samsung. CEVA delivery is outstanding. They not only do delivery, but also set up the TV and check all the functionalities for me. I'm very satisfied with Amazon 30 days price matching policy. For this TV all I can say is WONDERFUL. You won't be regret to buy this TV through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46 inch LCD
Reviews.Author: B M Milvain
Reviews.Content: After considerable research online I ordered this TV from Amazon and I could not be happier. 1) the delivery was 2 days ahead of schedule, 2) the Amazon-selected carrier representative was a real gentleman and assisted with set-up.We have no compliants.

Reviews.Title: Great value, beautiful picture!!!
Reviews.Author: GummyReads
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture ! Great value. I read some bad reviews about Amazon's 'White Glove' delivery but I had no problems at all... they called the day before to confirm that I'd be available and they came ... well... as fast as delivery guys will... BUT between the promised time!

Reviews.Title: A Flawless LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Jurek
Reviews.Content: I read everything I could about HDTVs, and I stared at many floor models.  I was not impressed.  Too many digital artifacts: pixels jumping around, jagged diagonals, jumpy motion across the screen, and colors that were not realistic.  Finally, I found the Samsung LN46A650, and it is just wonderful.  The picture is the sharpest I've seen looking at all the models available at Circuit City.  Contrast is outstanding.  The colors are beautiful (makes "CSI: Miami" irresistible).  The 4ms response time has eliminated any motion problems that LCDs usually have.  The user interface is intuitive.  No User Manual needed.  The best indicator of how good this product is:  friends who have resisted buying an HDTV (even after seeing the Bravia and Kuro), are now going to buy the Samsung 650 product.Note:  Amazon initially shipped me a model with a dead pixel (red all the time).  However, after a phone call, they replaced the original with a new one that has 100% healthy pixels.  No problems.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Happy owner!
Reviews.Author: C. Baker "cbav8r"
Reviews.Content: This is my first HD flat screen and I can't be more happy...and all I have right now is an SD source.  Can't wait till they flip the switch on VIOS in my area.  I researched quite a while before deciding to purchase.  Made this selection based on CNETs review as one of the best flat screens of 2008 so far.  Picture is great, Xbox looked wonderful with lots of contrast.  The ability to set picture settings up different for each input is a nice feature that recognizes that all inputs are not created equal.  I've seen absolutley no problems.Delivery was fast and professional although the delivery guys were not the friendliest around.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Excellent LCD TV
Reviews.Author: T. Dotson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV about a month ago from Amazon.  The CEVA delivery was a little diappointing in that my TV sat on the dock of thier warehouse for 3 days and I had to call them to schedule an appointment for delivery.......hard to understand when everyone else seems to have had a great experience with CEVA.  Anyway, once it was finally delivered, the guys were very professional and hooked everything up and waited to make sure my wife was satisfied.The overall picture quality is very good, better than my old 32" Sony Tube.  HD channels are EXCELLENT and I am not sure how they could be much better.  I purchased an upconverting Samnsung DVD player at the same time and watching old DVD's with it has given them new life..........very impressive, sound and color and picture quality.  I am very surprised at quality of the SD cable channels.  I have Comcast cable and most of the SD channels look very good too.It sounds like a broken record, but like just about everyone else that has purchased (and reviewed) this TV will tell you............you cannot go wrong......those ratings are for real.........this is an excellent TV!!!!

Reviews.Title: Black is Black
Reviews.Author: Andrew C
Reviews.Content: I've read so many reviews saying that LCD flat screens can't produce solid blacks. This Samsung produces rich blacks, evident in dark scenes. The glossy screen does produce some glare/reflections and may be a problem in very bright rooms, but not any worse than a regular tube TV.I am having some problems with the Component Cable hookup: you can see multiple scrolling bars going up the screen plus there is a humming sound coming out of the speakers (only using the component cables). The HDMI hookups work perfectly though, no scrolling bars and no humming sounds. I highly suspect the culpret is Time Warner Cable (would not be surprising). Waiting for my DVD player to come to test the component cable again.Overall, with the HDMI connections, the picture is excellent - rivals plasmas. Motionflow technology works well with sports, taking away most of the blur. The red frame is not that bad, in certain lights it is not noticable. I actually kind of like it. Only wish the remote could do more, so I wouldn't need 5 remotes for five different things.Amazon delivery was spectacular. Two guys delivered it up a flight of stairs, took it out, and threw out the boxes for us. Extremely nice.

Reviews.Title: As good as it gets!
Reviews.Author: Mac Guy
Reviews.Content: I've had the 46" model (LN46A650), for two months now without a single problem. What others have said is true, fantastic images, esp. in HD.  I just use an OTA antenna and catch around 40+ stations and have reduced that to around 22. Some have complained about the remote but I have had no problems using it, maybe they have fat fingers.  Also the TV is located in a well lit covered patio area with lots of light, no problems at all with the reflective screen.As soon as I got it I downloaded the firmware update to my Mac, used an old version of Stuffit to unzip it and put the resultant folder onto a flash drive and stuck it into the USB port on the TV, got to the update software option and updated with no problem, piece of cake.Pros:  What everybody else has said is great.Cons: None so farWatch for sales, the prices are coming down fast, got mine for $1700 plus tax.

Reviews.Title: Exceeds expectations
Reviews.Author: Dustin Strong
Reviews.Content: Did a million years of hunting & comparing. We're SO pleased with this set, and glad we didn't settle for less. Ordered from Amazon, and the set arrived TWO business days later! Really amazing service, totally unexpected, kudos to CEVA. The picture is stunning, even with our old Sony standard dvd player. Wondering if we should get an upconverting dvd player. We're finally Samsung believers. Cheers.

Reviews.Title: Remote Codes
Reviews.Author: Stephen Fisher
Reviews.Content: This TV is beautiful and has lots of inputs and features. The room it is in is not bright and it is impossible to see the labels or the buttons of the controls on the TV (eg Vol CH source etc.) I had to attach little stickers on them to know where to push.I want to pgm this TV's control codes into the remote for the satellite box, but the manual doesn't provide any codes.  Has anyone figured out what codes are needed to control this TV from a third party remote?  The included remote is dedicated to this TV only - so you will want to use the DVD remote or the set-top-box remote to control it and will need the answer to this question, as I do.S

Reviews.Title: Stunning, simply stunning!
Reviews.Author: S. Shaw
Reviews.Content: After 10 years of 50" rear projection Mitsubishi, it was time to upgrade to Hi-Def LCD flatscreen, and boy did this Samsung deliver! After going to local brick-and-mortar stores to see the picture quality of this set, I found it to be everything I was hoping for and more. Plus, I saved over $500 by buying from Amazon. Delivery was as smooth as silk. I have several friends with 1080 flatscreens, but  by their own admission, this TV blows theirs away. Thanks Samsung, and thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: This TV is bad to the bone
Reviews.Author: Joe B.
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LN46A650 is awesome.  I previously purchased a 50" plasma, returned it for a 40" LCD, returned it and finally purchased this TV.  I watched the Stanley Cup finals this past spring and the action was flawless.  Hockey is difficult for an LCD because of the fast motion on a white background.  This TV with it's fast processor was just as good if not better than plasma.  But, it's technical.  There is a lot to learn about what you can do with it so read the manual!

Reviews.Title: The perfect TV for me
Reviews.Author: Jason Kosek "Cheesemaster"
Reviews.Content: The picture quality of this TV is incredible!  I watched a few DVDs right when I got it, and the TV actually made me feel like I was IN the action!  There is almost no action blur and the picture is so detailed that you can see the specific definition and different colors in a marble floor in a movie.  The touch of red color has been a conversation starter for most of our guests.  It's so subtle that people have to go up and touch the TV to make sure their eyes aren't playing tricks.  The only drawbacks that I can  think of is the fact that the picture-in-picture is for different inputs only, so you can't watch 2 different TV shows at a time, and that the only input slot that works for the 3-prong connections (yellow, red, and white) is on the left side of the TV and not the back.  Even with these insignificant issues, I couldn't be happier with this TV.  Also, I saw that it was listed as the "Staff Favorite" TV at Sears yesterday, so I must not be alone in my opinion!

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: tbroo
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before settling on the Samsung 46-inch A650, and it has lived up to expectations in nearly all respects. Excellent picture, flexible mounting stand, quick changes between channels. The remote is a little touchy when changing between sources, but you quickly get used to that. One thing I have not seen mentioned is that it (and perhaps other newer models) has somewhat limited inputs for "legacy" equipment. There are four HDMI inputs, but if you have equipment that doesn't have HDMI outputs you can only connect a few (sorry don't have the exact number with me). May not be a problem for some people, but was a close call for me. Otherwise I'm very satisfied... the great price and free delivery from Amazon was a nice bonus.

Reviews.Title: Everything is fine
Reviews.Author: Brent Duckworth "Brent"
Reviews.Content: We love the TV and buying a big item like this was fine.  I had never purchased an expensive item from Amazon and was apprehensive.  It all worked out and I would do it again.

Reviews.Title: Picture Perfect
Reviews.Author: T. S. Crider
Reviews.Content: Superb picture quality and very easy to setup. Turns normal TV viewing into a theatre-like experience. My entire family has noticed the difference and loves it.Sound quality is good for everyday viewing, but external speakers are necessary for surround sound and quality movie watching. If you don't intend to have external speakers then the 750 series is supposed to have better built-in sound quality.The wheel on the remote takes some getting used to, but is more of an annoyance than a problem. Other than that, it's surprisingly well laid out and easy to find what you're looking for.Works excellent with a computer for a true Media Center experience. Some tweaking is required if using a DVI/HDMI cable, though.Amazon's free shipping came through. I ordered this on a Friday and it was white-glove delivered on Monday. It also helps being only one state away from the delivery point, but that's still fast.It's hard to watch television on anything else after viewing this. Beware: if you replace one TV in your house with this, you may end up replacing them all.

Reviews.Title: Everything worked out great!
Reviews.Author: Barry Peterson
Reviews.Content: Just wanted to put a small review up saying my TV arrived 4 days early in perfect condition. I love the tv and the quality is stunning. I'm located in San Luis Obispo, Ca for those who may be concerned about Eagle/Ceva shipping, rest assured, everything turned out well and was very impressed by the delivery service. Thanks to Amazon yet again!

Reviews.Title: The Best
Reviews.Author: The Kid "Krebsy"
Reviews.Content: Have had my 46 inch Samsung about a month now and all I can say is it's the best tv ever. Picture is great. HD looks amazing and my PS3 games and blue ray movies are the best. My wife thought she was watching a real baseball game with MLB the show.Remote is not as bad as every one says.My only problem is not with the TV but with Comcast cable not giving me a reviever with an HDMI input\outputDelivery service was great. recieved the TV a week before the amazon estimated arrival time and had no problems with the delivery company.Amazons price match service is great also I have recieved 130.00 dollars in credits since i purchased my TV. Remember to watch this as they will give you the difference you paid from the lower new price for up to 30 days after your purchace.By the way my TV came with the firmware updates that earlier people had problems with. There is a sticker on the box that tells you this so be on the look out for it when your TV comes.Enjoy

Reviews.Title: The XBR killer
Reviews.Author: N. Bolisetty "Nag"
Reviews.Content: What can i say....this model has simply sent the sony XBR into its grave. No offence to all the sony XBR customers, infact i myself am a big Sony fan. Have been researching on 46" LCDs for about 6 weeks and finally rounded on Toshiba 46RV530U, Samsung LN46A550 and Sony's KDL46W3000 since they suited my budget of around $1500. I was however eyeing the Sony KDL46W4100 and the 46XBR4 which were my all time favs in every showroom that i went to. Being above $2200 price range, i was stepping back. Then i saw the LN46A650 and compared it with the Sonys. Man...i was amazed. The blackness depth, the white lights and the brightness of the screen was simply amazing and to tell the truth, were better than  the sony models and jaw dropping.I looked for a deal and found it being offered for below 1890 at Amazon. Since Amazon offers the 30 day price guarentee, i simply went in for it on 4th june. I got a $55 refund when the price dropped later. I finally received the TV today through Amazon's white glove service through CEVA which did an amazing delivery job. CEVA delivery personnel tested the TV for physical and operational defects.I have had the TV for 12 hours now and my wife and I are watching our 4th movie already with a pioneer DV400 1080p upscaling DVD player. The picture quality is crisp and the 120 Hz is truly worth the extra $300 over the lower priced LN46A550.I want to break in the TV for a month and then go for ISF calibration. Will provide an update next month.Till then 5 stars to CEVA, 6 stars to Amazon an 10 stars to Samsung for this amazing product.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Lorraine B. Chrisenberry "Seeker of truth"
Reviews.Content: I was a little concerned about purchasing an expensive hi-tech item online but a good friend told me it would be fine.  I saved over $500 in local retail store prices plus no sales tax plus I was able to get free delivery.  I must say the delivery was awesome - very quick, ahead of scheduled days to wait, and right on time when they came to my house.  They carefully took my new TV from the box, set it on my stand, and ensured it was working.And the TV is wonderful.  I recommend the Touch of Color models from Samsung - great picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46-inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of Color
Reviews.Author: C. DeClerck
Reviews.Content: Absolutely the best price we found anywhere and the free white glove delivery was the icing on the cake. They delivered ahead of the estimated day, set up a time and were prompt, were very polite, set the TV up and removed all the packing material. We couldn't be happier with the quality of this LCD TV. The picture is crisp and bold and the remote is easy to use. We would recommend this set to anyone looking for a quality TV!

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Donald Dalton
Reviews.Content: I just got it today, very quick delivery and the people who dropped it off were great.  Easy set up.  Tv looks great out of the box.  I hooked it up to my Xbox 360, looks awesome. regular dvds look awesome, and I don't even have a blu ray player

Reviews.Title: Perfect LCD TV
Reviews.Author: J. Ogden
Reviews.Content: I researched for at least a month on this TV from Amazon reviews and various other sources as well as in-store viewing (although don't go solely on that due to the way stores set them up).This TV seriously is the best LCD for watching movies and Xbox 360, I have have 0 ghosting, stuttering (with the 1003.m firmware), light patches, etc. When watching Planet Earth HD or Sunrise Earth HD it's like I'm looking out my window, the clarity and detail is very very beautiful. I didn't think that I would like the red touch of color but it's very subtle and not noticeable. Another concern is the glossy screen that I initially had but Samsung has reduced the glare on this model.

Reviews.Title: awesome tv, awesome picture , awesome overall
Reviews.Author: eric
Reviews.Content: The previous commenters hit the nail on the head with their positive reviews, so I added some pictures from Transformers to give potential purchasers an idea of what they can expect.  Keep in mind these are pics taken from the movie broadcast over Time Warner on an HD channel.  I imagine quality will only get better on Blu Ray.Complaints: Remote could be better (replace w/ Logitech universal); sound could be better (replace with any surround sound system).For those that want to mount the TV w/o tearing holes in the wall, I am using the OnmiMount G3FP and it's working out pretty well so far, love the cable management aspect.In short, great TV, you will not be disappointed, especially as the price begins to drop more and more.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650
Reviews.Author: William D. Britt "BBritt"
Reviews.Content: Great picture, easy to set-up and operate, best price we found and we searched everywhere.We set the HDTV up in a room with a lot of in-direct natuaral light and the picture was bright and sharp during the day and it only got better with the evening.  We have watched fast action scences with no pixelation.This was as close to a plasma we could get without the high price.

Reviews.Title: SAM-tacular Televi-SUNG!!!
Reviews.Author: ET Phone Home
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this television through Amazon.  I was initially skeptical ordering this T.V. to have it shipped, but from what I discovered on the reliability of Amazon, I was completely satisfied!!  It is a wonderful T.V. for those wanting high definition, with the most up to date technology.  The 120 Hz feature it amazing, and makes even the most "old-school" movies/shows look quite interesting, and engaging.  I just hooked up a VHS player to play my ancient, yet special, Indiana Jones Trilogy.  I wasn't expecting anything special since I am so used to the newer technology, seeing I do have BluRay, but after watching Raiders of the Lost Ark, I was impressed at how nice the picture was and how well the action scenes looked!  This is a great deal.  I did my research at local box-stores, but I couldn't find a better deal for such a high quality television. It has definitely made my summer a bit more interesting, and entertaining!

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: seajam
Reviews.Content: Viewing wise,More than met my expectations.  Red tone color of set looks great .

Reviews.Title: A great deal
Reviews.Content: This tv is a great deal because you can, play blu-ray, 4 hdmi imputs, and 120 hearts a mintue. Me and my family got this tv after doing some reasearch. We think it's a great deal, so we recomend you buy it. (Deatails listed at the bottom:1: It is a LCD tv.2: It ia a 1080p.3: It runs at 120 herts a minute.4: It's a Samsung (with a touch of red color.)5: It;s 46 inches.6: comes with assemblind materials, ac cord, and cleaning cloth.

Reviews.Title: Great, but...is so much detail an asset?
Reviews.Author: Tetburyman
Reviews.Content: Just to make clear from the start, everything I thought this set would be, it is:  incredibly detailed picture, very flexible set up options for those who like to fine tune the settings, lots of connectivity options, etc.  Unlike some reviews I read, the "touch of color" red around the perimeter of the frame is no big deal - not very visible one way or the other.  I also read about how people dislike the remote.  While it is true it is not well suited to control anything but the TV, it's fine for that, at least for me.The reason I wanted to add a review to the many more detailed ones available is to point out something I had not read in other reviews.  The incredible detail of the set, particularly with Blu-Ray, is something of a mixed blessing.  I didn't realize it until I owned the set, but the detail removes some of the magic of watching a movie.  The softness of the older display technologies added something to the other worldliness of movies.  In many interior scenes, seeing absolutely everything in such stark detail makes the fact they were shot on a set much more obvious.  To me, this detracts a bit from the overall movie experience by making the scenes more prosaic.  Outdoor shots don't suffer from this problem, but shots with lots of CGI effects suffer from it more.  I watched parts of the Two Towers portion of the Lord of the Rings movie trilogy last night, for instance, and the climactic battle scenes at Helm's Deep at the end of the movie lost some credibility, to my eye, because they show too much detail and thus seem less real, paradoxically.The preceding is obviously a very personal reaction to watching a fine HDTV set that can show such granular detail, but wanted to share since I haven't read any similar comments.

Reviews.Title: Pixel problems
Reviews.Author: R. L. Giffin
Reviews.Content: I received this LCD TV a few days ago and it had pixel breakup problems almost immediately on a few channels. I thought it might be a problem with my Time Warner cable box so I called the cable company but they claimed it appeared to be a problem with the television set so I called Samsung. After speaking with the service rep at Samsung (whom I had difficulty understanding) she said the problem was with the cable company box and not the Samsung tv. She refused to have a service call by a technician and said if I wanted a service call done it would be at my expense, (on a brand new Samsung LCD 46' television under warranty???). I declined this offer.Then I called Amazon and told them what happened. The rep said Amazon would honor the terms of the sale and refund or exchange the unit. They also said they couldn't understand why Samsung refused to honor the warranty and attempted to have the customer pay for a service visit.So I would give Amazon 5 stars and Samsung 1 star (or no stars), if possible

Reviews.Title: Never buy high price electronics from Amazon or small electronics stores
Reviews.Author: eBuff
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV about nine months ago and recently, it started to show verticle lines. I called Amazon and they differed me to Samsung. I called Samsung.They were very polite and scheduled an appointment to fix my TV. The techinician had to come back three times to fix the TV. He suggested to buy high priced electronics form big chain stores such as Best Buy, [...] or Sears as they are classified as Class I stores to receive the best quality prodduct. The Class II stores, such as smaller chain stores,  get the B quality products and lastly, the C grade products are sold to online clearance such as Amazon. He indicated that majority of his service calls are for the TVs purchased through online retail places. My TV is fixed for now and keeping my finger crossed as I only have few months left on warrenty.

Reviews.Title: TV's great - Manual is worthless
Reviews.Author: R. Plank
Reviews.Content: The TV is great.  The manual is not worth the paper it is printed on.  It focuses entirely on how to use the menu and make selections.  There no description of functions or relationships between functions.  The later is very important because some selections preclude the use of others and you are completely on your own to figure that out.

Reviews.Title: Vertical dark line on LCD screen
Reviews.Author: oaktree2011
Reviews.Content: After having this TV for only 3 1/2 years, a dark vertical line has appeared on the screen.  I can't beleive that a television that costs as much as this one is already having problems in this short amount of time.  This kind of problem is totally unacceptable, and I would have given the television 0 stars, but I was forced to give it at least 1 star.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect except.......
Reviews.Author: Mike Oxlong "MikeO"
Reviews.Content: This TV is almost perfect except for the speakers and minor picture distortion during fast moving sporting events, etc.The picture quality is beautiful and highly recommend the set, but I notice extreme sound distortion from the speakers when the TV is on low volume.  It would really be annoying except for the fact that I'm hooked to a surround sound system and rarely listen to the TV without it, but if you don't have surround sound, I'm sure it would be disappointing.The picture quality is almost as good as plasma, but since I'm in a highly-lit room, I chose LCD.  The picture "drag" during fast sporting events like hockey and football is a minor price to pay considering the overall performance.Would have given 5 stars if not for poor speakers.

Reviews.Title: Definitely Exceeded Expectations
Reviews.Author: D. DeBlanc
Reviews.Content: Coming from a Sharp Aquos 1080p (42"), my wife was a little hesitant on why exactly we needed a new TV. I told her about the contrast differences and, mainly, the 120 motion.  Pointless, it was like speaking Japanese to an African.  My only concern was that the "touch of color" was going to screw up the entire appeal of the set.  So we headed on down to the now doomed Circuit City, where it was more than $500 above the price on Amazon (they wonder where their business goes), to get a glimpse firsthand what this thing looks like.  I was going mainly to see what the touch of color looked liked and I was pleasantly not distracted by it (I thought I would be).However, they had this set hooked up with RCA video, not even component and certainly not HDMI.  I asked the rep why the picture quality looked so weak and if the motion was turned on.  He said "yes", then I looked around back and saw the problem.  This is completely unfair to the television.  It's the equivalent of having a really nice sports car and driving around with the parking break on.  I couldn't believe it, the TV picture looked like garbage.I knew what this TV was capable of based on the hardware inside of it and the touch of color was not overbearing like I had hoped it wouldn't be. So based on other Amazonian's reviews, I convinced my wife that this TV would be very much worth it.I ordered it and five days later, the TV revolution started.  What an extreme difference a digital (HDMI) connection makes (compared to the CC setup).  There is a substantial difference in clarity and overall picture quality in this set versus my previous Aquos 1080p (hooked-up exactly with the same configuration (DirecTv HDMI).  People that come over that are technologically inclined are hailing this set as "the best picture they've seen".My two favorite points about the set would have to be the stunning black levels and the surreal 120 motion.  It looks better than I expected.  So I learned what I already knew, 1080p is not altogether even on the same spectrum to the new 1080p sets.  These new sets have much less fragments floating around, much clearer, richer color, and the motion..... you'll see.Thanks for all your reviews, it truly was the deciding factor in taking the leap.  I don't give out 5 stars much, if ever, being very critical is an essential component in the value of the review process.  This TV is a great set and definitely worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Awesome television
Reviews.Author: Alex Belfield "Satisfied"
Reviews.Content: Everything about this television is fantastic. Amazon's delivery guys were very fast and professional. I recommend that if your going to buy this TV, buy it through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Still drooling several hours after watching transformers
Reviews.Author: Ethan Short
Reviews.Content: This TV is amazing, it really is breath taking. I *used* to be a firm believer that the sony xbr4 and xbr5 TV's were better than this TV by far but after having in my house for the 2nd time (originally bought one at circuit city but returned it after they LIED to me about several things involved with the purchase of this tv) I can say this TV is definently on par with the xbr series. Standard def really is kind of grusome looking but did i get this TV for standard def? Most definently not. HD anything looks great, upconverted DVD's even look great; Blu-ray looks completely amazing. Spiderman-3 and Transformers are so visually stunning it's amazing. I'm actually selling off my DVD collection this weekend so i can reinvest the money into blu-ray, regular old dvds just can't cut it anymore for me. If you are skeptical about purchasing this tv based just on reviews than i suggest doing extensive research as i did. avsforum.com and blu-ray.com are great places to try and find help with purchasing the right TV for you but what i would suggest doing is going into good old brick and motar stores to find the tv that is most appealing to your eyes. Do remeber though that stores juice up everything on the tv so when you bring it home it will most likely not look anything like what it looked like in store.

Reviews.Title: beautiful t.v.
Reviews.Author: D. Silverman "Big Mamma"
Reviews.Content: I researched the internet and local stores and this was the best deal around. My Theater and sound tech told me this was an amazing tv and that I got an amazing deal on it.

Reviews.Title: Good to, but my second one after another moving out of the ex's place
Reviews.Author: Mat
Reviews.Content: Had this same model before that I bought at best buy, and the best buy one had a different more sturdy, stylish base. The this one works though too so it's OK, was probably just a different revision of the same model.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Socal Ninja
Reviews.Content: bought it when it was top of the line and still, until now, it is works great for everything i use it for..

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: C. M. Heaxt
Reviews.Content: This is years later after our purchase.  Samsung is a stellar performer with a clear, sharp picture we gush over every time.  Very enjoyable still and I cannot imagine what new technology they have created these few years later.

Reviews.Title: A really amazing TV
Reviews.Author: Tony Shek
Reviews.Content: It's worked fantastic for a number of years now, just brilliant. Would recommend to anyone looking for a midrange/midprice widescreen tv.

Reviews.Title: Garbage after 4 years
Reviews.Author: James Chandler
Reviews.Content: The set worked great for 4 years. Then I turn it on one day and there are vertical colored bands in the middle 2/3 of the screen. Sometimes they fade out, but almost always there and comes right back. Samsung tech says I need a new display panel for $900!!!No more Samsung products for this household.

Reviews.Title: Not so good after all...
Reviews.Author: M. Smulders
Reviews.Content: While the TV worked well for about 5 years, it is dying a slow very untimely death. It has been serviced for the Capacitor problem - and yes one of the caps were bad - but the problem is now that it shows 5 horizontal bars with shadow for the first 15-30 minutes of a power up. This is a KNOWN issue with LCD's of that age - but I got no where getting support from Samsung for it. It's considered 'normal' wear.On the other hand, it did work pretty well for as long as it lasted.

Reviews.Title: 5 years old and still looks amazing
Reviews.Author: IBrown
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV on "Cyber Monday" 2008 for roughly double what these used ones are going for. It still looks as good as the day it arrived with deep blacks and bright colors. I only wish there was a firmware update to add Netflix. This is also surprisingly energy efficient compared to other 46 inch TVs, even the new ones.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this TV
Reviews.Author: Bubba
Reviews.Content: If I had to buy a new TV today, I would not get this one.  I'd get one which is easier to connect to the internet.  Still, considering the era when I bought this TV, I got one swinging incredible deal on it, and I have used the living daylights out of this product with absolutely no problems or issues of any kind.  I highly recommend this brand.

Reviews.Title: Cycles off and on
Reviews.Author: Bob A
Reviews.Content: Continually cycles off and on. The only way to stop is to unplug. Look at the class action lawsuit before buying a Samsung HDTV. Paid 1700 for this tv. What a loss.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46-inch TV
Reviews.Author: Roger Winchester
Reviews.Content: The speakers leave a little something to be desired as I have a hearing problem but a beautiful picture. We love the Television and would recommend it

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46" LCD flat screen
Reviews.Author: Montana Jack
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV several years ago and have not been disapointed. Has 4 HDMI inputs which is great for connecting a sound bar and sub woofer, along with a PS3.Working fine and still think it was a great buy from Amazon. Also got the "White glove delivery" which is also well worth the small additional cost. Delivered to my living room, un boxed, set up and run in a very short time by a courteous and knowledgeable person.I will definitely buy again from Amazon. Great price, great service.

Reviews.Title: Good things
Reviews.Author: carol curtis
Reviews.Content: Have had this tv for  four years and still doing fine. No problems picture is very nice to look at

Reviews.Title: Bought it way back when
Reviews.Author: Blueblur1984
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV but it's probably considered obsolete by today's standards.  We've been using it happily for a few years now and maybe in another few years we'll upgrade to an LCD tv, but it was money well spent at the time.  You can probably find a comparable tv for closer to $700 instead of the $1800 or so mine set me back.

Reviews.Title: Short-lived LCD TV
Reviews.Author: DM
Reviews.Content: The Good News: We absolutely loved this LCD TV. Picture quality and sound was excellent. The Bad News: Screen image only lasted 3 1/2 years. For $1500 it seems like the life span should be much longer. We started getting a red bar down the left side. This would gradually disappear once the TV "warmed up." However, the problem became progressively worse until the entire left half of the screen had a red hue to it along with a horizontal bar along the top. Now none of it will go away. Apparently the cost to fix it doesn't warrant the hassle. This will be my last Samsung purchase. I have replaced it with a Sharp 52" LED LCD Smart TV at a much cheaper cost.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Hoosier
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV on amazon 4 yrs back, we had a problem with LCD screen after couple of days it was delivered - although TV is turned on & you can hear the movie, nothing was displayed on the screen. It was blank. We called amazon & they send a guy from Samsung. He changed the chip/board inside. Since then no problems. We love it & recently bought a smart TV 8000 series (at a local store) -so far good.

Reviews.Title: three years later it died LN46A650A1F
Reviews.Author: M. Kabir "new york , brooklyn"
Reviews.Content: this is a bad lcd tv, mt tv samsung LN46A650A1F died after 3 years later i couldn't believe it. i thought samsung is a good company, its a bad company to invest your money in. instead buy sony, will last a life time i hope. no more samsung for me. new york, brooklyn.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650 46inch 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Photogirl
Reviews.Content: I am in love with this TV.  I was worried about the touch of Red but it is great.  You barely notice it unless you're close to the TV, then it looks classy.  The quality is superb.  I have it hooked up to my own stereo, so I can't comment on the sound but the picture is top notch.  The only thing that is a draw back that I didn't realize at the time is the glare.  And that is only because I have it opposite 4 large windows in my home (only place to put it unfortunately).  But that is not a huge drawback because you can close the shades and it still rocks!!  I know this is an outdated tv but I still love it and have had no problems at all with it!

Reviews.Title: Fine televison
Reviews.Author: V. Basava
Reviews.Content: I had this TV for five years and still no problem with itI disagree about scratches on the TV,I have experienced little kids touching with greasy fingers on the screen and still no scratches or prints.so i highly recommend this TV,its very nice and long lasting television!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: DieselAddict
Reviews.Content: TV has been great, we have had it for almost 3 years now and moved twice during that time and the TV is still as good as new.  Picture clarity is awesome, inputs and features on it are great.  We have the 46" and 2 family members each have the 52" model.

Reviews.Title: I would buy it again!
Reviews.Author: GoodFolk
Reviews.Content: We've owned this TV for three years now. Brilliant picture, great sound.  And attractive casing.  But I'm writing this review three years later to express how impressed I am with Samsung.Last week, out of the blue, the TV would not instantly turn on. Rather, we would turn it on, and it would turn itself off immediately, then continue to turn itself on and off, before finally staying "on". This became worse over each of the next 5 days. I googled the issue and found out about the widespread "capacitor" problem - this was across many brands and models.  I called Samsung, even though the TV was clearly out of warranty. Samsung identified it as a capacitor problem and sent someone out to fix it. For free.  The fellow came to my house, replaced the capacitors, and the TV works perfectly.Tremendous customer service! I would by this TV again, and my next TV will also be a Samsung!

Reviews.Title: sweet HDTV with a little glare
Reviews.Author: S. Ihm "TuBuGuRL"
Reviews.Content: i don't think there's much point in writing this review now since the TV is over 2 years old and there are much better TVs out now. but i have to say that i still love my samsung tv. it looks fantastic, the picture quality is great and i never regretted the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV For The Money!
Reviews.Author: Scott Richards
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV about 3 years ago, and it has worked great - no issues so far. The sound quality I would rate 4 out of 5 stars. Fairly clear, but not much low end. The picture, for the money, I feel it quite good. I think this set compares favorably to sets priced much higher, and it looks great too!

Reviews.Title: Samsung at its best
Reviews.Author: Arthur
Reviews.Content: After reading several reviews and testing this model out in the stores, I decided to go with Amazon. The free shipping and tax savings made it worth my while. The Tv was delievered within a few days and was easy to set up(15 imuntes).The picture in HD was breath taking and is still very good in SD. Contrary to some other reviews, the sound from its speakers are actually pretty good though I use my audio reciever.Two years later, its still going strong and I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful TV
Reviews.Author: bck177z
Reviews.Content: After reading countless articles (at the time of purchase) I decided to go for this one.  Not only did I take into consideration the reviews on Amazon, but also researched this TV elsewhere and found it to be a great TV.  Has a crisp, clear picture and with a BluRay hooked to it this is definitely a TV worth buying.  Ive seen Samsungs plasma screens at the same size and they may appear to have better colors, but this is so close you wouldnt be able to tell much of a difference.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: LN46A650 is Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Dianne Iorio "Dianne Iorio"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the flat screen 2 years ago.  Learned quickly what 1-click was when Igot a message that my tv shipped.  Whew!  That was a surprise.  Anyway, we love it.  A Comcast repairman came for our DVR box, looked at our picture and hooked up our HD correctly. Thanks Mr. Repairman. Then we really fell in love.  I'm sold on Samsung's lcd flat screens. I am not sure what wise link is for or if it connects to the internet for netflix.  Looking into it now. The swivel base is so useful.  I turn it when I'm on the treadmill. It came with a free Samsung Blu-ray player.  Don't care for blu-ray movies but it makes regular dvd's pop. Delivery man was helpful.  I feel guilty after reading the other review about tipping them.  They definately deserve one. I'm so tempted to buy an internet ready model.  If someone can tell me if and how this model connects to the internet, I will buy another one of these for less money. Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of Color

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: tonto
Reviews.Content: This is a great hd tv for the money.  Two years old and no problems.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture and great quality!
Reviews.Author: K. Connell
Reviews.Content: I love this TV....sleak cabinet and beautiful picture.  I would definitely buy another one!

Reviews.Title: Good Picture Quality with a few flaws
Reviews.Author: Philip Dean "odetothesun"
Reviews.Content: I really like the picture that this set gives. It looks amazing with HD cable and with PS3 games and Blu Ray.For the price Amazon beats a lot of  other places to buy this TV. It's a great buy for the quality of picture and size of the TV.Where the TV flaws come in are the base/stand that the TV is on. It really is just not wide enough to fully support the TV. This causes the TV to lean from side to side and it general feels weak for such a heavy TV.However the major flaw on this set, is the random power shut off. The firmware update through Samsung's website might fix this problem; however I believe that it is caused by some electrical shutoff switches which I think can only be repaired by putting in a new part.  I am currently researching this on my set.I recommend searching Google for this models product key and random shut offs, before purchasing this TV.

Reviews.Title: Stunning picture!
Reviews.Author: Vince M. "Texas Aggie in GA"
Reviews.Content: I bought this HDTV about one and a half years ago.  We have kids and use this TV every day.  The picture is just beautiful and sharp.  I have no regrets about this purchase whatsoever and based on the time we have used it and the quality of enjoyment, I think it was worth every penny!

Reviews.Title: Great LCD, Great price
Reviews.Author: Dennis Leland
Reviews.Content: Have had this TV going on a year now and love it. The sound from the TV is poor, we have surround sound so not a big deal. It does have some glare with a lot of light coming in the room. I bought this through Amozon and got the best price I could find. The price also included delivery and setup in my home. I think I would pay $50 just to have that done again on another TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Vol G. Williams "barbvol"
