Reviews.Content: We bought this for Christmas last year and I am just now getting around to writing a review. Not much to say other than it is a great TV. Great color; superb picture; easy to use. I wish the sound was better. We had to buy a external speaker system just to be able to enjoy it. This model was 120HZ stop motion and did not have Wi-Fi or a USB port so we can't get the streaming video movies from Amazon or Netflix. Now they have 240HZ Wi-FI models with LED back light for the same price. Tchnology never holds still.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Trish
Reviews.Content: Have had this TV for about a year now, and it is perfect.We do have HD hookup, so the picture is much better obviously.  It is fine without, but I would recommend HD to anyone buying this size TV.I had read complaints about the sound quality, but I have noticed no problems with that.And also glare is not a problem...and it is in a sunny room.I have not used half of the features that are available with the TV...have not hooked up to any other source but the stereo.

Reviews.Title: Samsungs are the best!
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: I'm a little late with this review since we bought the tv a year ago, but I just wanted to voice my opinion of how much I love our TV! We researched hdtv's for a long time and we knew that Samsung made the very best! Now I am somewhat tech-savvy but really I think anyone can tell that Samsung is the best. If you don't believe me, go to your nearest Best B** or other electronics retailer. Look at the TV's on the walls and then look to see which screen seems closer to black and which colors look more true to life? The answer will be Samsung every time!Now for someone who isn't all that tech savvy but wants to buy a great tv here's what to look for:Contrast Ratio- This is what makes the screen seem look black. If you go to your local WalM*** or such place you will see that they have very cheap hdtv's... Even those these tv's are hdtv's, they mostly junk! Yes, I am aware that you can buy Samsungs there, but look at the specs. The contrast ratio may only be 2000:1.1080p- This is going to give you a much better picture than a 740p. When we visited a friends house they had just bought an hdtv, but the screen was horribly "pixelated". It was awful! You will not get this with the Samsung. The picture is clear and so life-like its amazing!120hz- The 120hz really does make a difference in fast squences. Other hdtv's tend to get blurry when there is some fast action... but not this Samsung! We have never had an issue with the screen being blurry.I also really love the design and color of this particular tv. It's very modern and the red is a great little touch.Not long after purchasing the tv, we had family over and were watching a movie. Our relatives (who own an hdtv) thought the movie was blu-ray because of how amazing the image quality was... They couldn't believe it was just the normal dvd!You cannot beat the quality of Samsung tvs! Plus the price on Amazon will beat anyone else, and the shipping was great. It was fast, the people were very courteous and they even hooked everything up.As far as the size of the tv, our couch is fairly far away from the tv and the 46 inch is the perfect size!I can't say enough great things about this tv. HOWEVER, the only thing I will say is that if you are considering spending this much on a TV you may want to consider going with one of Samsungs new LED tv's. On Amazon they really aren't too much more and they are even more amazing!! We're considering buying one and putting this 46in one in our bedroom!But if you don't want to spend more then you should defintely buy this tv. Like I said before we've had the tv for over a year and we have no regrets.

Reviews.Title: I am 100% satisfied with my purchase.
Reviews.Author: Tom 48
Reviews.Content: I am 100% pleased with the TV and with the Amazon experience.  The first tv that was shipped to me had a problem and Amazon customer service took ownership of the problem and fixed if for me right away.  It was my first purchase from Amazon and since then I have purchased around 8 other items from them.  Service is what keeps people returning.

Reviews.Title: Still the best TV after a year
Reviews.Author: Scott C. Simpson
Reviews.Content: I've had my Samsung for nearly a year now.  I pulled it out of the box and have never had to make any color adjustments or any other adjustments because the images were simply stunning right out of the box!!  I absolutely love this tv and would recommend it to anyone looking to make a purchase.  The colors are true and saturated.  The whites are very white and the blacks are real black.  There's never been any of that blurring when the subject of the image is moving fast.  The 120 handles it just fine.  I can't say enough about this TV.  After a year I have no complaints at all!

Reviews.Title: Best Picture Ever
Reviews.Author: Just Lookin
Reviews.Content: Received my TV last February.  Best picture I've ever seen on television.  Sound is very good but not great but most likely would be if enhanced with just a cheap sound system.  Football and movie viewing is outstanding and shows not in HD, while good, or mostly ignored now.  I did watch the old movie "Shane" the other day that was not in HD and it was great.  Movies from that period had outstanding pictures and color. If your set is as good as mine has been you'll enjoy TV viewing much more.  If you purchase this set I believe you'll be very happy.  I don't see how viewing can get any better.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: S. Moore "Tech Junkie"
Reviews.Content: I have owned this TV for almost a year now and have nothing but praise to offer. The picture is superb and the sound is good.I have attached:1. Satellite HD2. Over the Air HD3. Tivo HD4. Computer5. Bluray6. DVD7. BroadbandEverything works as advertised and looks fantastic. I ordered from Amazon.com and was shocked with how fast it was delivered. I had possession of my new TV two days after I ordered it!It does have a shiny screen that reflects light and creates a bit of glare. You need to plan the location of your TV/light sources to minimize this. The picture is so bright and vivid that I have never found this to be that big of an issue.If you buy this TV I'm sure you'll be happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Definitely lives up to the hype...
Reviews.Author: Mr. John T. Hansen "TV's John Hansen"
Reviews.Content: I don't have a super indepth review of this TV. Just a cut-to-the-chase review.PROS:- Amazing color- High Definition sources look awesome. It's REALLY hard to watch something in standard def 4x3 after seeing what this can do.- Sweet design- Easy enough menu navigation- 120 Hz is a little hard to get used to. But this can be done in "stages" through the menu (off, low, med, high, auto)CONS:- Dreadfully slow response time when switching inputs. (I do this often, as my Mac G5 is connected via DVI-to-HDMI cable to one of the inputs and I switch between TV and PC often.)- Picture-in-Picture works as long as one of the inputs is "TV" - as in the antenna. So if you have a cable box or satellite dish, forget it.- Shipping was a bit of a headache. I got to pick the day, took that afternoon off work, only to have them call me to say it would be one day later. Waiting another day is not that big of a deal, but when I rearranged my schedule for this delivery day, it's hard to turn my life upside down to match the delivery schedule.- 120 Hz is a little hard to get used to. (a pro and a con)That's all I got, really. The bottom line is that I would purchase this TV again in a heartbeat and definitely have recommended it to other people.

Reviews.Title: Incredible TV at an outstanding price.
Reviews.Author: D. Bowden
Reviews.Content: First off, I purchases this TV through Amazon warehouse deals which is the arm of Amazon that sells the "open box" items.  These are usually items that have been returned or have minor cosmetic damage to either the unit or the packaging.  When I purchased this TV, the description said that the set had minor cosmetic damage on the housing and the screen but when it arrived I examined thoroughly and honestly I could not find even the most minor of blemishes anywhere on the set - anywhere.Once I was done being astonished by the condition it was in, I put in a Blu-Ray disc (in my samsung BDP-1600) and fired it up.  Oh. My. God.  The picture is just incredible.  With the 120hz auto-motion, it is simply amazing.  There's no juttering, no sloppiness, nothing.  It honestly looks as though you're there on the set of the film.It's been repeated over and over again here in these reviews how great this is and it's true, it is.  So, I just decided to place this review here to a) further that impression and b) let anyone who's considering ordering from Amazon warehouse deals know that it is definitely a good idea - you will NOT be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: All my research paid off!!!
Reviews.Author: Shadow "Shadow"
Reviews.Content: I have had my TV for well over 8 months now and it runs perfectly.I had upgraded from a previous Samsung that was only 13 inches. So needless to say it took some time to get use to the picture size.One thing that many have not comment on is that the TV produces a 3D like effect where the people in the foreground do stand out from the background. Some people complain about this but I think it makes the scene very realistic and gives you the feeling you are there. All friends and family agree with me. . . If you still fell its an issue after a while your eyes get use to it and it is not noticeable.At the time this is one of the top of the line models, and even though LED is coming out driving the price down of all LCD models I purchased this TV because I knew it had longevity. Why well its 1080p, 120Hz, a high contrast ratio, and the Samsungs I have purchased have lasted me over 13 years! I believe the TV now cost 1300 dollars which I believe is still worth the value. I got it at 1500.Of course you need to have HD channels to really see the worth of the TV, but it does a fairly good job on none HD channels. I have a PS3 and playing COD or watching a blue ray (even non-blue ray) looks amazing on the TV. Granted you need an HDMI cable and PS3 enhances regular DVDs. Many are blown away by the detail it shows.So what are some of the downsides we can't always be biased. The TV runs hot. . . it needs to have a spacious room so the heat will not overwhelm a room. I usually keep a fan on when I turn on my TV just so my room stays cool. Also when you turn it off it always makes a sound to notify you that it is turning off. I personally could have done away with that. Tried to find the option to mute it but didnt find one.Misc. tid bit.The TV turns on relatively quick within 5 seconds. My family has a Sony Bravia and that takes forever (15 seconds) to turn on. Though it is a small thing I find it important.I would recommend this purchase to anyone looking for a quality LCD TV that they can still enjoy with the fact that LED will soon take over the market.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV but not that into the whole 'touch of color' thing.
Reviews.Author: Clembert
Reviews.Content: I'll save the more substantive reviews for the real videophile types, and just say that I think the picture is better than on some of my friends' slightly older TVs and much better than a four year old Samsung plasma that I have. Bright, good blacks, no motion blur to speak of. Good tv.I docked it a star though because of the 'touch of color' business. It really isn't that obtrusive or annoying, honestly, but a) why does it only come in red and b) why don't they make this tv without it? Again go look at one, and you'll likely find it isn't a massive issue, but I definitely would have chosen a plain black frame if I had a choice.I don't find the remote to be too bad, as many do. Maybe I haven't been exposed to many remotes, but they all seem more or less the same to me when you get used to them. Maybe if I really had a true universal remote I would change my tune but as for a regular old remote, it seems fine to me (though I do wish they would make more remotes using bluetooth or other similar technology instead of making us rely on line-of-sight infrared technology...seems very ten years ago that we mostly still use IR remotes).

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: Terry J. Opie
Reviews.Content: Beautiful display for the price.  We only have a handful of HD channels, but they look great.  For the price this was an excellent choice for us.  I don't use a lot of the "extra" features, like ethernet connection, or ability to plug in a usb drive, but nice knowing they're there.I do wish the Standard def channels looked a little nicer.  But when you're magnifying the signal into a bigger screen (we replaced a 32" set) You're bound to be unhappy with the picture.Watch the prices.  This was cheaper than NewEgg here at Amazon by $100...  Was the other way around the week leading up to the purchase.  Glad I came back to check.Solid choice!!

Reviews.Title: LCDs have come a long way
Reviews.Author: Cory
Reviews.Content: This television is spectacular!  I watch a lot of sports and I couldn't ask for a better picture.  The sound is great too.  I'm very glad I went with this LCD rather than a plasma.  I can't see any difference in the picture quality and I don't have to worry about burn-in.Only con I see is the controls on the front panel of the TV.  You totally cannot see them at all, even if you look closely.  You need a flashlight to see them.  Otherwise, great TV.

Reviews.Title: ln46a650
Reviews.Author: Angy R. John "arj"
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of ColorI purchased this product form amazon on april,comes with sealed factory pack.I even not hooked it up with  blueray player or similar devices to see the difference of picture quality but its looks much better with cable connection all channels are crystal clear on this tv.So far this tv gives my family great quality entertainment and we are happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: R. Jones "HD freak"
Reviews.Content: I know there are many HDTVs out there.  I originally was planning for a Sony, sight unseen because of the previous non HDTV quality of the Sony sets I had.  Then I read the CNET review for HDTVs and went to see the TVs.  I think the Samsung was the best of the best.  Sure, the LED backlight of the LN46A950 would have been nice, but not $1000 nicer.  I am very pleased with my purchase and now need to couple it with a Blu-ray.

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture quality
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The reason for buying LN46A650 was just to get a little extra size (42 to 46 upgrade) and full HD resolution for Bluray, and I got much more than expected. I had two Panasonic Plazma TVs before I purchased this Samsung LCD, and I thought I am getting everything I can from my HD cable. I was amazed how clear the picture is on my new.

Reviews.Title: LOVE it.
Reviews.Author: Pro Shopper
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome TV and a great value for the price - highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: sweet
Reviews.Author: G. Brainard
Reviews.Content: this tv is all that it is advertised to be! I install dishes for directv and have seen a lot of hd tv's and with the 5 star reviews and my own experience i saw nothing i liked better. I LOVE IT ...........

Reviews.Title: Beautiful TV, excellent delivery!!
Reviews.Author: Pianogruh78
Reviews.Content: We've had our TV for about a month, and it's been more than we expected. The picture quality is fantastic! The delivery was great...they kept us informed on when they were coming, showed up when they said they would, set everything up for us, and took the trash away...not the norm these days and greatly appreciated.  The only reason I gave 4 stars is because the sound quality of the internal speakers is not great, but usually I listen through my speakers anyway.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Threshkin
Reviews.Content: I purchased the TV (LN46A650) at the beginning of May through Warehouse Deals as an open box item.I could not be happier.  The TV arrived 4 days ahead of the promised delivery date and aside from the cardboard box being a little tired the TV looks like new.  Everything works perfectly and the picture quality is amazing.  The delivery driver helped me unbox the TV and waited until we had set it up and completely checked it out.I saved at least $400 getting an open box unit.  It was more than worth it!

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Robert Spearman
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this purchase.  I have put off buying a large screen hdtv till I felt the quality vs price had met my expectations.  This was it.  My 25" sanyo from 1994 has finally been replaced.  Amazon was great and so was the delivery service.  The delivery guy not only helped unpack the tv, he helped set it up and made sure it was working properly before he left.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a great price
Reviews.Author: Steven Rudy
Reviews.Content: The LN650 was everything I expected and more.  Amazon delivered the TV 3 days after I ordered it in perfect condition.  Also, you can't beat the Amazon price.

Reviews.Title: Trout
Reviews.Author: Larry Rice "Trout"
Reviews.Content: This TV blew us away. We have a 37" Samsung from a couple of years ago. This TV is so far beyond. It looks like 3d.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Charles R. Foster
Reviews.Content: Could not ask for a better tv for the price!  I have done lots of research and this TV is top of the line unless you are wanting to compare LED technology.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Gary from PA
Reviews.Content: We have had our Samsung TV for about 6 weeks. Love the picture and everything about it. Now that the next model is out, I can't see much difference in my model and this year's. Only difference is we paid a lot less than this years price.End of year prices occur in April and you can save around a $1000.00 at this time of year, but act fast before they are gone.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Picture & Sound Control (commercials & program same level)
Reviews.Author: Pat "Pat"
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of ColorLove this TV...ordered on a Monday, received on Friday.  No hitches and a Fantastic picture.  Have lots of windows and light but picture looks great.  Also, big point, has sound control (Set up thru Samsung Remote & use same for volune control) that keeps commercial & program sound at same level.This is a 2008(A in model#) model 650 ($1389.00)that appears to have better features than 2009 (B in model#) model which is more expensive.You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Television Review
Reviews.Author: Charles L. Henry
Reviews.Content: This forty-six inch LCD television exceeded my expectations. Colors are unbelievably vivid and with the Panasonic SBT-100 Blu-ray home theater system movies are like sitting in a movie theater. I did not think HD could be that much better than digital until I got this set. This tv is at the top of the list in value and price from Amazon.com. Anyone purchasing one of these sets will not be disappointed and delivery was less than a week after order was placed.C.H.

Reviews.Title: A great LCD TV
Reviews.Author: SciChick "SciChick"
Reviews.Content: Very sharp image, great sound, easy to use, lots of multimedia possibilities, love the infolink feature.I've only had it for a month, but so far I would recommend it to a friend!

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier
Reviews.Author: Wilson Onu "Monte"
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be happier with this product. I waited 6 months without a TV (since my old one broke) and reviewed several models before picking this Samsung. The picture is clear, TV's bigger than I thought, and I love the 120Hz feature. Once you go LCD you never go back!Will

Reviews.Title: Awesome HDTV
Reviews.Author: M. Berning "Mom To 3 Boys"
Reviews.Content: After much research, this HDTV was our best bargain for the money.  It is fabulous.  The picture is very clear.  Setup was a snap.  Love this TV.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Mom of 2 boys
Reviews.Content: we are very happy with the picture quality, sound and viewing angle.  i didn't want to get the touch of red, but it's barely noticeable.  we were debating between this and the LG and am happy we chose this one.

Reviews.Title: solid performance by today standard  ... deserve a 4.5 stars
Reviews.Author: Tuan A. Vu "hqbabie3"
Reviews.Content: I have experienced ownership of large screens like the Sony 52W4100, the 46XBR6. the Samsung 52A630 before this 46A650.  My fear had always been to be see if any of these praised models would give me motion response accuracy, vividness in color and brightness/contrast that would satisfy my norms in accordance w/ current 1080p technology.  The Sonys (beautiful housing and nice remote) do not fill me w/ satisfaction regarding stark contrast and motionResponse. The A630 is better (not much) in contrast, (a tad more) responsive to motion yet does not have the loveliness in color softness & hue. The A650 is a nice piece of glossy furniture w/ everything the A630 has, but comes w/ a more pronounced contrast and a slightly better accuracy in fast motion. The glare from the 46A650 screen is by far a non-issue when the adjacent rooms only show mere inside lighting (not direct sunlight)and when most windows are curtained. I don't think the matte A630 surpasses the glossy A650, but both deserve a serious consideration when bright 120HZ LCD is on your current prospect list, and when Viera/plasma is yet to beat LCD HDTV in brightness. I don't give weight to remote control, sound or internet capability since I only focus on image quality and response to motion. I wish I can give 4.5 stars for the A650 (BTW: audio is being medium, and remote has Enter button located far from the numeral selection).

Reviews.Title: Samsung 650 LCD
Reviews.Author: M. Liao
Reviews.Content: Product arrive in perfect condition and the delivery was great right down to the timing.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: H. T. Nguyen "winnie"
Reviews.Content: I gave this TV 4 stars because I just don't have a whole lot to compare it to as this is my first HDTV ever.  While I have no real complaints, I felt I couldn't honestly give out 5 stars as I'm a bit of a neophyte, and my 5-star rating wouldn't mean all that much.  My gut impression of the TV overall is that it's a great TV so I wanted my rating to reflect that.I thought the Red TOC would distract me, but it's very subtle and I don't notice it at all anymore, and it has actually grown on me.  The TV itself looks very classy.Many people comment on how they dislike the remote for this TV. I actually like this remote. I don't really have problems with the click wheel. I feel the shape is ergonomic (for my hand anyway since I have really small hands) and the buttons are well-placed relative to their function.As for the picture. No complaints, but I'm no expert and have nothing to compare it to since this is my first HDTV as I mentioned. All I can say is that I went to Best Buy and tried to do a blind comparison of all the TVs. This Best Buy has ALL their HDTVs against a large back wall and I walked through and looked at just the picture on the screens without noting the brand. The Samsungs popped out at me every time.  That's why I went with one. The colors are rich and vibrant. Even with my large living room window open, the colors still pop. Sometimes I'll work on my computer which is located off to the side of the TV and I can still see the picture perfectly from that viewing angle.  We're talking about 15 degrees from horizontal at most.I don't really care for the Automotion Plus 120 Hz function. I generally turn it off. Somehow when I turn it on the picture looks less "real" to me. I don't know how else to describe it.  I don't think it matters much unless you're watching something with lots of CGI or when you're gaming. I don't really do either.One annoying thing another reviewer mentioned is that it does take several seconds to turn on.  I find myself instinctively hitting the power button again when I get impatient and end up turning the TV off accidentally. It also takes a beat for the TV to turn off. Not sure why this is, but I think that all HDTVs seem to have this "problem."Hope this review helps someone!

Reviews.Title: Love the new Samsung
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Francis "Gamma and Gampa"
Reviews.Content: This is our second 46" Samsung.  It is wonderful.  Have been watching it for three weeks, and picture, colors, resolution et al are ideal.  Would make this purchase again without question...

Reviews.Title: Amazing HDTV
Reviews.Author: J. Merkel
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this purchase.  After finally upgrading from our 22" TV to this 46' flat screen HDTV, the picture is amazing.  Very clear, little glare.  Great was to watch sport events.  Wow!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Larry L
Reviews.Content: I read all of the reviews before purchasing.  I can't say much here that has already been said.  This is a great TV for TV Watching, Movies, and Video Games (I have a PS3 connected to mine).The picture is super-sharp.  I have very rarely caught even a hint of motion-blur.  Blacks are truly black and all of the in-between shades look great.A comment regarding Amazon's service:  There was minor problem with the shipping company that was used.  I e-mailed Amazon figuring nothing would come of it.  Amazon actually called the shipping company and put pressure on them to see to it that I received my TV when I was supposed to - and it worked.  I can't say enough good things about Amazon's service.  They made good on a bad situation.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV.... better than my Sony XBR
Reviews.Author: acina "acina"
Reviews.Content: I have only had this TV for a few days but I am very impressed.  I have ALWAYS been loyal to Sony for video but I decided to try Samsung after reading all the rave reviews and watching it at my neighbors house.The picture in HD and non-HD are superior to my 46" Sony XBR4.  Both sets are full HD with 120HZ.  I am especially impressed with the Samsung non-HD picture.  It is spectacular!One small yet impressive detail to note, especially if you have this TV in your bedroom, is it has a backlight remote.  This is especially helpful when you are watching TV in the dark (when your spouse is sleeping).  You can turn the backlight on and it will automatically turn off after you put it down after about 30 seconds.  MORE IMPRESSIVE is that it has some type of motion detector on it.  When you pick the remote back up it automatically lights up!  Awesome.Note:  The contrast setting out of the box is set to 95%.  WAY TOO HIGH for my taste.  It felt like my eyeballs were being burnt and the skin tones were washed out on people.  Be sure to check that setting immediatley.Buy this TV you wont be sorry.  I know there is a newer model out and I would guess it is the same or better... but I cant speak to that.UPDATE 5/13/09:  One discernable low is that the screen is a bit too reflective.  Considering LCD's are commonly less reflective than Plasma's I am little disappointed with the reflective property of this screen.

Reviews.Title: used-very good = looks brand new!
Reviews.Author: S. Kinsey
Reviews.Content: I won't comment on all the specs, as there are a ton of reivews out there.  Suffice it to say, Consumer Reports says this is the best LCD out there and one of the best tv's they've ever tested (RE: the 52" model; April 2009 issue).I wanted to comment on Amazon Warehouse deals.  I ordered mine used-very good condition.  It was listed as having minor damage to the housing.  The TV was delivered by Pilot 2 days ago and looks brand new.  My wife and in-laws all looked for a scratch, and if it's there, we can't find it.Maybe I just got lucky.  I don't know that all the used-very good tv's are in this shape, but it was worth the gamble to me, esp. if the scratch had been on the stand or on the back of the unit.  You have to cover the $50 shipping, but for $1200 you can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Samsung is the best
Reviews.Author: Kay C. Wood
Reviews.Content: The LN46A650 is probably the best LCD flat screen I saw while searching for a TV.  It has lived up to my expectations.  The new models have come out, and it may be more difficult to find now.  Still if you can find this on sale as merchants make room for the latest, you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Review of Samsung LN46A650A1F High Definition LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Kenneth C. Beaudrie
Reviews.Content: The image is superb with vivid colors.  It's breath-taking.  I watched the Masters golf tournament - it was so clear it was as if I was actually there.  I am really impressed with this TV.  I am receiving over-the-air high-definition TV in 1080i.  Some stations are still broadcasting 480i pictures digitally.  Even these programs, when viewed in their unexpanded, 480 format, are remarkably sharp.  Much better than the old TV sets.The only caution I have is that Amazon claims that this set is a 120Hz model.  The user manual states that it is 60Hz.  However, there is an "Auto Motion Plus 120Hz" mode.  You can select Auto Motion low, medium, and high settings.  There is a caution that "If you enable 'Auto Motion Plus 120Hz,' noise may appear on the screen.  If this occurs, set 'Auto Motion Plus 120Hz' to 'Off'"I have watched NHL hockey without the Auto Motion option on and did not notice blurring.  And I have turned Auto Motion on without seeing noise.  So I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650 LCD TV
Reviews.Author: drenf "dhr"
Reviews.Content: Everything I could have hoped for in appearance, performance and features. Rock solid all the way around.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: shadows4u
Reviews.Content: I love this tv! It had been 10 years since I had bought a tv. And I have to admit I felt overwhelmed by everything it takes to choose a tv now days. The place to begin is taking a look at what's out there and determining your personal tastes. I had bought a 22 inch Samsung a year ago for my daughter's college room and feel in love with its picture. Though that was a consideration, I did compare Sonys, Panasonics, LGs, Sharps, the gamut.I knew my viewing room needed a 46 inch LCD set to fill its visual space. From there I started visiting big box stores, comparing picture quality and features. After reading all the articles, reviews, product descriptions and talking it over with some friends, I have to admit I don't believe anyone produces a better LCD set than Samsung. Sonys have a great name and history. But in picture quality, resolution, features, value, Samsung wins hands down. At least, as far as I am concerned.My biggest frustration was delivery day. Being a hands on kind of guy I research a ton and then I am willing to try things myself. I've been around things electronic and mechanical all my life and knew I could set up and calibrate the set myself, which I did. Only thing I wish Samsung did was produce a clearer explanation of settings in their set up guides. Both the quick guide and tv manual were thin on settings between cable boxes, receivers, and the tv. After a little experimentation I got the picture up and its been smooth sailing from there. Being the suspicious kind, I think this is why people spend tons of money having other people set up for them, and the manufacturers are complicit in this. Getting past that, I love the set. It's a wonderful addition and I would highly recommend expending the few extra dollars to buy the Samsung a650. Worth every dollar and more.

Reviews.Title: This is one Bad mofo
Reviews.Author: C. Laborde
Reviews.Content: This tv is increbile one of the best pictures i have ever seen, and the dark night at 1080P on this beast makes it feel like your in the theatre.  HIGHELY RECOMMENDED THIS TV YOU WONT BE DISSAPPOINTED!!!

Reviews.Title: Quickly spoiled
Reviews.Author: John J. Dunphy
Reviews.Content: This is my first high def. television and I am very pleased with the picture quality and with the ease of operation.  I would recommend this television to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Crisp Definition
Reviews.Author: PharmaSearch
Reviews.Content: I did an extensive amount of research prior to purchasing this particular unit and determined that for its size and cost it provided the most value of any 46" units.The 1080p and 120Hz when watching any HD channels is equivalent to looking through a glass window.  Perfect clarity and definition.  The colors are brilliant.Take the time to set up the unit with your preferences.  It makes a difference over the presets and defaults.

Reviews.Title: You can't do HDTV better than this!
Reviews.Author: Susanfilm
Reviews.Content: Believe me when I tell you that I researched this purchase. It's top rated on CNET and also Consumer Reports. (I subscribed to CR to compare HDTVs) The color is super sharp. My husband actually doesn't like it because it looks too real. He complains that it looks like the actors are are actually in our living room. I've seen other HDs but never with a picture this crisp. I can make out every pore on the weatherman's nose. (poor guy) I can make out every lash on Adam Lambert's eyes bathed in the shimmering blue lighting I'd never even noticed before on American Idol. Beautiful! Also, there are no problems with sound, as far as I can hear. (I only mention this because sound was noted on several customer reviews as the only problem.) Did I even mention the HDMI connections and the ethernet port?Hey, why are you still reading my comments? Order your own Samsung LN46A650, flop on your couch, clicker in hand and soda to your lips. Ahhh, that's entertainment.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Machine
Reviews.Author: James B. Sprouse "jbs"
Reviews.Content: Can't be happier!  Great picture and sound.  I was worried I didn't get the latest LED TV, which is much thinner..and much more expensive.  Saw a review on the Samsung LED and it had great reviews for pics, but bad reviews for sound (thin TV can't hold the speakers apparently).  Don't know about you, but I didn't want to have to crank up my sound system everytime I watch TV so thought this might be the better purchase.  After seeing the LED and the LCD Samsung together at the local store, I really couldn't tell the difference in picture quality and the LCD is MUCH cheaper.  Picture quality of this model blew away the other brands as well.  A great TV and a very satified customer.

Reviews.Title: WOW !  Incredible Television !!!
Reviews.Author: bamadog1
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant ordering a television 'online'.  But, after reading all of the reviews, I settled on this model, and ... WOW!  I am absolutely blown away by the quality, picture, and most importantly features this lcd offers.  The touch of red is barely noticeable, and the glare is not bad at all, and we just moved into a house with 10 windows in the den, ALL of which still do not have blinds!For the money, I cannot imagine another purchase.  Do yourself a favor, and believe all of these reviews...THIS LCD IS INCREDIBLE!!!

Reviews.Title: Better, Easy to Install,Worth every dollar
Reviews.Author: J. Schouten
Reviews.Content: My Samsung A650 arrive 2 days earlier than expected so we had to hustle to get a new console for it. The Pilot Freight Service called on Monday to deliver on Tuesday Noon and delivered the TV without a hitch. Excellent delivery service; tell them my thanks.Out of the box, I was able to set it up myself and had it running properly the first try before my husband came home. Remember to order a HDMI cable for your component and TV hookup.The only glitch we had was syncing the TV with the universal remote for our DVR; our cable provider did this for us in less then 60 seconds with a special code for this TV that was in the Univ. remote manual. So we will not be using the Samsung remote and the crazy, iPod-like wheel it has.We felt we took a chance ordering online for a big ticket item like this but the process went so smoothly that I have not stopped talking about it to my friends and family!I was able to track it and knew where the TV came from and where it was along the way. Thanks again.Judy

Reviews.Title: High Definition at It's Best
Reviews.Author: Sidney Zack "Music Man"
Reviews.Content: High Definition as it is supposed to be. Brilliant colors clear sound all the best.

Reviews.Title: 120hz + Auto Motion Plus + HD Viewing = TV Heaven
Reviews.Author: S. Kime
Reviews.Content: Just got this TV last Monday through Amazon Warehouse Deals, to replace a Panasonic plasma. I would have kept the fantastic plasma TV if I hadn't have been sold on the Auto Motion Plus feature I saw in a couple stores.I know a lot of people in these reviews can't stand that feature, but I for one LOVE IT! Talk about juicing up 1080p! It takes HD viewing to a whole new level when watching Blu-Rays and HD channels. Even DVDs are given a whole new life with this feature. I juggle between the high and medium setting on AMP, depending on the mood I'm in.When I knew I had to have the AMP feature, I then compared the picture quality of different sets and the LN46A650 won every time. The colors are noticeably richer thany any other TV I looked at. I was originally going to get a Sony, but after further research, I realized this was the superior TV. I couldn't possibly be any happier.Also, I ordered this set through Amazon Warehouse Deals as "Used-Like New." I admit I was a little hesitant at first, but the price tag of $1350 total (including shipping and handling, and thankfully no tax) was too irresistable. If this TV has been used, I sure as heck cannot tell at all. It's literally in PERFECT condition. If you can get a "Used-Like New" set through Amazon Warehouse Deals, go for it! You can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Love It &Easy; to Use
Reviews.Author: R. Parizek "T BOB"
Reviews.Content: Sports fans you'll love it's fantastic clairity at 120 HZ. I'm a big hockey nut and it's like being at the game. Samsung has made it easy to operate a high tec TV by giving you a manuel you can understand. I've read more then enough pro and user reviews and visited enough electronic stores to realize being a sports fan and a movie watcher that the Samsung LN46A650 is a top of the line LCD TV and is now mine.Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of Color

Reviews.Title: Best TV I've ever watched!
Reviews.Author: John P.
Reviews.Content: Short and sweet.....this LCD is fantastic. I cannot believe the picture quality. Recently my 3 son's came to visit and they were amazed. My middle boy said that the detail was so sharp that he actually didn't like watching shows he normally watches due to the obvious fake backgrounds he never picked up on! Myself I cannot get over the detail no matter what you are watching. Best Purchase I ever made.

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: Grimlock74
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews on Amazon prior to purchasing this product (which is mostly positive).  I also did a lot of research with the 1080p and 120 hertz and such.  I compared my LCD with others I know who own a flat screen.  Mine looks great and performs great.And yes, the delivery people are great.  It took me 10 mins. to set up my TV.  And I'm back in business.  I didn't want it mounted on the wall so it took me only 10 mins.  I'm techonologically challenged and it wasn't hard for me to figure it out.LOVE my new TV.  As always, I'm happy with the product, the delivery, and Amazon.

Reviews.Title: very nice TV
Reviews.Author: Charles A. Tietbohl
Reviews.Content: I was worried about ordering online, but the TV arrived on time and not damaged.  Set-up with our satellite and DVD player was a little more complicated than I thought it was going to be.  The picture from the analog satellite box did not appear to me to be very good, but my wife thought it was very good.  I ordered a new digital satellite box and had it installed by the satellite company.  I needed to buy new cables so I went to WM since no HDMI cables were supplied.  With digital channels, the picture is excellent, sharp, correct colors, and dark blacks.  The only other thing we will add is an antenna to pick up local channels when clouds block the satellite dish.  I will also order that from Amazon.  I am impressed with Amazon service and delivery.

Reviews.Title: happy customer
Reviews.Author: bibber "bibber"
Reviews.Content: Must say that I'm a happy customer. I was somewhat skeptical about a major purchase over the internet, but the Samsung A650 was delivered ahead of schedule. It was unpacked and checked by the delivery team to make sure there was no problem in shipping. No sales tax or delivery charges is a huge bonus! Did I mention that I saved nearly $250 from my local retailers (between the sale price and money saved from no tax)? Oh, last but not least, this is an awesome television with a tremendous picture. I have absolutely zero complaints and am quite happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: Matthew H. Ramella
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV from Amazon last week (Friday, April 10th, 2009) for $1,320.48 (out the door price, with free shipping, and the Gold Box discount).  The TV was delivered yesterday (Tuesday, April 14th, 2009).  I am very happy with this TV.  It has a great picture!  Blu-Ray's look incredible!  Also, the shipping and delivery was great.  Only 3 business days for free shipping! Not too shabby!  Plus, the delivery guys setup the TV, which was nice.  One thing I do suggest - If you hookup a Blu-Ray player, be sure to go into the Blu-Ray player's settings and select 1080P output.  I did not have the 1080P setting turned on initially, however, when I turned it on, I was absolutely floored by the picture quality.  My wife said it almost looks too real, and my kids thought Walle was going to come out of the TV :-)  Pretty cool...

Reviews.Title: Short and sweet review
Reviews.Author: Fatima Padilla
Reviews.Content: OK I'll keep this short and get right to the point.This TV is amazing, HD looks beautiful and it almost feels like your in the program your watching. Yes, it's that good.This TV can produce amazing blacks and the somewhat glossy screen makes all the colors appear more vibrant.blu-rays looks really good as well, and if you get this TV you will honestly not regret it.Touch of color - If you feel a little turned away from the red trimming, please note it is very dark red, I can barley notice it.

Reviews.Title: Spectacular Color!
Reviews.Author: keynotes
Reviews.Content: Just received our Samsung this week! Gorgeous color! We shopped for a tv for quite some time and compared it side by side at a local electronics store with the other highly recommended tv in Consumer Reports. Once viewing them next to one another, the Samsung was more true to color and the blacks were black! The two different tv's both were the same size and had the same features. As far as the reviews regarding the glossy screen, that I haven't found to be a problem. When the tv is off you see reflection but when it's on you see nothing but the great picture, also I love the chimes when you turn the set off and on. Best purchase ever!

Reviews.Title: Worried about glare issues
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: After reading alot of reviews and trips to best buy I decided to go with the ln46a650. The picture quality of this tv is excellent. My biggest worry was glare, as I have a large picture window directly behind the tv and 2 other windows in the same room. I was so worried about glare that, at first, I decided to go with  a sony 46w4100 until I saw these 2 tv's side by side.The samsung won hands down. I bought the samsung and decided to chance the glare problems. I also bought an adjustable wall mount to reposition the tv just in case. Let me just tell you that I am very happy I went with the ln46a650. Compared to my old 24" tube, the glare is only more noticeable because the surface area is that much bigger. I honestly think glare would be an issue with any large lcd.Basically, if you are worried about glare on this tv, JUST BUY IT!! You will not regret it.By the way, I have yet to worry about changing the position of the wall mount to avoid glare.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Cawinediva
Reviews.Content: When we first purchased the TV we had non HD sattelite reception.  We were disappointed.  Soon we were able to have AT&T; U-Verse installed. BIG DIFFERENCE.  Beautiful crispness and amazing color, and we've yet to do the custom adjustments.  It doesn't seem to need them.  The remote is clumsy, but we usually don't even use it.  The U-Verse remote is slightly better.  But slow reaction.  After lots of investigation we bought the Samsung and dollar for dollar it's the best.  The one thing that's unusual is we can't seem to find programming in 120HZ, so it's in 60HZ most of the time.

Reviews.Title: What more could I ask for!
Reviews.Author: JIM
Reviews.Content: Rec'd Samsung 46' 650 yesterday through amazon's white glove delivery.  The guys delivering came into the kitchen unboxed item and moved to living room to keep my carpets clean.  Set tv up on stand made the proper connections and turned on tv.  Can i say how impressed I am with this tv.  I have it hooked up woth an HDMI cable to FIOS and the HD channels are unreal.  My only regret is I did not purchase this sooner.JIM

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC TV
Reviews.Author: J. Jones "Travelchick"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV about 6months ago for my husband after doing a lot of research. This tv was worth every dime. The clarity was fantastic. I dont have a bad thing to say about it. I am waiting for the price to go down so that I can purchase another one.It works great with a Sony playstation for blueraysMost of the 5 stars reviews are accurate you can even go to CNET and get the same reviews. I would watch the price to see if it comes down a little more but you will not be disappointed. Oh and dont forget to get the tv Calibrated it makes a big difference with the picture

Reviews.Title: Samsung ln46A650
Reviews.Author: Bill Wentz
Reviews.Content: I've been waiting for eight months to save my pin money to buy this TV.  They still want $1899 plus tax at Best Buy so last week I finally got the money together and the TV was delivered today.  I'm completely blown away!  There were no problems with the shipping.  The set actually arrived a day early and was brought into my home, un-boxed and set up by some friendly helpful truckers.  And this evening while watching my favorite shows I just couldn't get over the amazing quality of the picture.  Sure, you're knocked out when you see a set like this on the showroom floor, but it my home, straight out of the box, the quality of the picture was phenomenal. I have nothing but great things to say about this purchase, its the best TV on the market at this price point, everyone should own one, and Amazon is the place to buy it.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the Price!
Reviews.Author: Nihar Shah "Nihar"
Reviews.Content: This is my first LCD TV  and I absolutely love it. A lot of reviews have been written about features in great detail, so I will point out couple of points I find another newbie like me might find it helpful.1) Rather than have TV only remote, a universal remote would be much better.2) There is a present setting for 'Movie' mode. I think having another one for 'Sports' might be useful as well to give a good starting point to play around with preferences.I did not have any problems with auto shut off that some of the users pointed out .All in all, it is a great buy...hard to go wrong with this choice.

Reviews.Title: Superior product
Reviews.Author: John C. Loughridge
Reviews.Content: I am completely satisfied with my new Samsung HD.  The product is well built and overall it is a joy to look at.  Top quality overall.

Reviews.Title: Better Than Expected
Reviews.Author: Kyle Dobbins
Reviews.Content: Crystal clear picture.  The red in the frame is barely noticable, I don't see why some make such a big deal about it.

Reviews.Title: GREAT LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Marvin Reid "Just For Me"
Reviews.Content: We shopped for months comparing prices, sound and picture quality of different brands.  We decided to shop online and found that no one could beat the Amazon price.  The TV was delivered by a well known carrier within one week just as promised.  It was well packed and handled with care.  The TV was very easy to set up.  Some programs are so clear and the colors so vivid, that they appear to be live broadcast.  We are very happy with our choice. By far, the Samsung 650 reigns number one.

Reviews.Title: It doesn't get any better than Samsung
Reviews.Author: C. Clukey "cac1281"
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant not only buying my first HD TV, but purchasing a TV online rather in the store.First of all, the delivery I received from Pilot was superb and couldn't ask for anything better. They unfortunately arrived at my door when I was at work and forgot to call ahead of time. But they said they would be back at the end of the day and call in advance. When they arrived, two drivers were there to bring the package in, take it out of the box, place it on the tv stand, and test to see if it worked.As for the TV, I've had it for almost a month now and the picture is flawless. I'm sure you can calibrate it to where the picture is even better, but I'm speechless with the factory settings.Most negative comments have to do with the speakers and remote. The sound from the speakers really isn't too bad for everyday shows. But I also have a home theater system hooked up to it for sports and movies on tv. The wheel scroll on the remote is pretty interesting and can be a pain sometimes. As long as you remember to point the remote at the sensor on the TV, you will be fine.The RSS Link is a fun tool especially for reading news articles right on your TV!In all, you really can't get any better than Samsung especially at the Amazon price. And I'm sure with the new LED TVs now coming out, the price will start to go down. Many of the reviews on Amazon regarding this product helped influence this decision greatly, not to mention family saying if you don't choose Samsung, you'll be disowned lol!

Reviews.Title: Amazon really delivers!
Reviews.Author: Bartlguy
Reviews.Content: Why pay more for less by purchasing a Sony when this 46" Samsung LCD model  offers better features, at a lower price, plus excellent, top ranked quality?  And Amazon's price was $200 lower than Best Buy.  That point  plus the free shipping, unpacking and quick in-house setup convinced me that Amazon was the way to go.  It worked out perfectly.  I ordered on Monday and was using the set by Thursday. It would have been Wednesday if I'd been available!  I am a 100% satisfied, happy customer.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650
Reviews.Author: Charles D. Hibbard
Reviews.Content: This LCD TV has not disappointed.  The picture, clarity, and price exceeded my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Extremely happy!
Reviews.Author: M. Nuguid
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV on February 28, 2009.  Estimated delivery date was supposed to be something like March 12.  I received it on March 7.  CEVA (the delivery company) called to set up a delivery date and we were able to schedule delivery on a Saturday, between noon and 4pm.  CEVA actually came at 11:30am, which was just fine with me!  Two gentlemen carried it in, took it out of the box, placed it on the stand for us and turned it on to make sure it was working.  They were in and out in a matter of minutes.  They were quick but very careful.As for the TV itself, it is AWESOME!!  The picture is unreal.  I just wish more stations broadcast in HD.  The TV paired with a PS3 that plays blue ray discs is amazing!  When I watch tv shows or movies, I find myself looking at things in the background that I never would have noticed before.  Everything is crisp, clear, and vibrant.  But beware, you may be distracted by how much make-up your favorite actors really do wear!

Reviews.Title: PHENOMENAL TV OUTSTANDING SERVICE
Reviews.Author: D. Csay
Reviews.Content: This TV is magnificent! It is a beauty inside and out! The delivery from Amazon was super fast (more than a week early than estimated) and the service guy's work was outstanding.

Reviews.Title: AN AWESOME LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Justin Peltier
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV!!!!  Samsung has definitely lived up to the hype of making some of the best quality electronics with this HDTV!  With an amazing picture, it also comes with an awesome remote that's ease of use makes this TV one of the most user friendly TV that I have ever used!

Reviews.Title: Amazing!!!!
Reviews.Author: kraziekling21
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV about 3 months ago and LOVE IT!! I was a bit skeptical about it simply because of the price, but I have found nothing negative to say about this TV. It has the best quality and picture. HD TV has never looked so good. And everyone that comes over loves the hint of red around it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!!! 120Hz is amazing!!!
Reviews.Author: J. Hood
Reviews.Content: I just bought this tv and absolutely love it. I actually downgraded from a 60" mitsubishi 1080p DLP tv, and was kind of worried that the smaller size might be an issue. I was wrong, the colors are so vibrant, and the detail so amazing, that i didnt even notice the smaller size. The deep red bezel and touch controls on the tv are also really cool. I cant really speak to the extra connections or anything, as i have all of my connections through a yamaha surround receiver so im only using a single hdmi input. It takes maybe 2-3 seconds for the tv to show the picture after turning on, or switching signals (xbox, ps3, dvr, computer). The only real downside ive noticed so far is that it doesnt automatically fill the screen with the picture as my mitsubishi did. (ie, get rid of the black boxes either on top/bottom, or sides). granted im still learning alot about the tv, and the manual is huge, so there may be a way to get it to work, but i havent found it yet after going through all of the regular menus. I also cant speak to the speakers on the tv as again, i use a surround sound receiver.Overall this tv is utterly amazing in the clarity, vibrance, and details that the picture shows. The 120Hz took a bit of getting used to at first. Its kind of strange how it makes every tv show almost look like a soap opera in the way those are filmed. Its hard to describe, but the motion of people in particular look like they are filmed live or something. Again, took some getting used to, and didnt really like it at first, but its definitely grown on me. And there is a menu to adjust the level of the 120Hz (off, low, medium, high). Mines currently set on medium. Also, as a previous review said, the lower quality channels do show lots of pixelation and such, but the high def channels are amazing. The tv is also very bright (lights up my whole living room). I actually turned down the lcd backlight because i like to watch tv with little surrounding light, and the tv was hurting my eyes.Defintely take the time to play with each setting, to find what works best for you, and you will love this tv.

Reviews.Title: No Problems Great Product Great Service
Reviews.Author: Gary K "Jayhawk"
Reviews.Content: Delivered one week after ordered.  No problems.  Two guys brought it in, unboxed it and made sure it worked.  This is my third Samsung LCD.  I also have the 52" 650 and an older 28".  I used to buy nothing but Sony but Samsung makes the best LCD for the money.  I was able to get it for $1400 but I see the price is not dropping on this model anymore because they are coming out with the 2009 models and this one is sold out in most places that have the best prices.  I don't think anyone has the new ones in stock yet so get it while you can you won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: Great LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Curt A. Burdorf
Reviews.Content: The tv and remote are easy to use, the picture is fabulous.  Sound is decent, I might add auxillary speakers or go through my stereo later.  Did a fair amount of research before purchasing a tv (Consumer Reports, epinions) and it paid off.  Plan to turn off the silly noise that the tv makes when it turns on (it's in the manual how to turn it off).

Reviews.Title: Samsung Red
Reviews.Author: Erin A. Mulhern
Reviews.Content: We love this TV! We read reviews about it before we purchased it that said the red color was distracting, but we have not found it to be a problem. Nor did we find the dial on the remote to be a bother.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Steelers Way
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV in early January from Amazon. Picture is awesome, sound is good 'TV' sound.This is my first HDTV, easy to use right out of the box.Blue ray is just perfect. You can't go wrong with this HDTV.The 650 does have a very glossy / clear screen which adds to the great picture but if you have a lot of light source in the room you may want to consider a different set, but it has to be a lot of light (natural or artificial) when you typically watch TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Dona
Reviews.Content: Would like to say that I truly am enjoying the great picture on this TV.The swivel base make connecting it to exsisting componets quite easy.Priced it in several stores and amazon's was the best.The men that delivered the TV were very polite and made sure that they did not make a mess by tracking in snow and dirt on the floor and rug by taking off their shoes.

Reviews.Title: Best Purchase Ever
Reviews.Author: Arlyn
Reviews.Content: My husband and I had been doing research for quite a while before purchasing our Samsung 46" LCD  1080 with 120HZ TV.  We found an array of prices and features on all different brands but narrowed it down to Samsung because of the ratings that it was given.  I can't say enough about the product and also the ordering and delivery service.  The TV is amazing.  The picture is crystal clear almost 3-D.  The delivery was easy -- they set it up and also programmed the remote and it was ready to go when they left.  I would highly recommend both the Samsung brand (which we have had previously) and also the easy and hassle free ordering process with Sixth Ave. Electronics through Amazon.com.

Reviews.Title: WOW.  Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Bradley Mohr "avid reader and gadget enthusiast"
Reviews.Content: Sooooo happy with this set.  There's a reason the reviews are so consistently great!  Amazing color, amazing picture, amazingly wide viewing angles.  I hemmed and hawed and researched this decision for MONTHS.  Finally bit the bullet and bought this tv to replace a 2 year old 37" Westinghouse LCD and the two side-by-side are like night and day.  This new Samsung makes my old Westinghouse look like an old school rear-projection tv.  You will not be disappointed. Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: Looking for a large format display?
Reviews.Author: slagment "slagment"
Reviews.Content: This is for you.  Flawless picture form HDMI-DVI cable, or just use the built in VGA port.  The setup is great for viewing circuit schematics, watching online videos, downloading movies, and playing slow pace games.  If you plan on reading e-books, it is hard on the eyes.  Even using white text and black background will cause eye strain.WARNING TO FPS AND FAST PACE GAMERS!!DNIe feature does NOT work with while hooked to a computer.  There will be no 1920x1080 120hz gaming for you.  There is noticeable blur, from input lag, while playing games.  It's not a big deal on RTS games, but will make you feel dizzy on first person shooters.Don't let the negatives scare you.  If you're purchasing just for gaming or reading e-books, this isn't for you.  If you're looking for a large format display that can handle a little of everything, this is for you.

Reviews.Title: touch of red TV
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV..Pic is great and you can adjust the brightness to suit yourself..Looks great also.I chose to set it up on an antique table.The height is perfect.This is a new TV experience....

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650 is an LCD HDTV with a Touch of Color
Reviews.Author: Dog lover
Reviews.Content: After agonizing over rearranging the living area to accommodate a big screen TV, doing the research thanks to Consumer Reports and online information, my fingers "tripped" over a great buy. Consumer Reports definitely liked the tv and though it wasn't the exact model recommended as a best buy, it definitely seemed like an excellent value. Great choice and one I am delighted we made. I originally planned on a 40" unit but since the 46" was so well-priced, I took the risk of having the big black box dominate the room. Turns out the tv is sleek, slim and attractive...and that's before you turn it on!  The picture is jaw-dropping quality! I'm not a tv nut, but I can't wait to watch a football game on this television set. It arrived on time, in perfect condition, weighs a whopping 73 lbs. and was installed within an hour. Again, do your homework, find reliable vendors, and purchase quality products with full confidence!  Thanks Amazon for a great product at a fantastic price!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: J Reynolds "Sports Mania"
Reviews.Content: Researched several HD TV's for months and finally went with this one. Easy out of the box plug in to Satelite receiver. Easy set up. GREAT Picture. I Feel like I am at the game in person. Easy to adjust to personal preferences. I was a little concerned about the red touch of color, but we do not even notice it with out really looking for it at a very close distance. I ordered TV through Amazon. Delivery was available before estimated time. Delivery company arrived, unboxed TV and tested it in a very professional and timely manner. I could not be happier.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46" LN46A650
Reviews.Author: T. Harris
Reviews.Content: Have had this TV for about a month. No problems. TV arrived fast and in perfect condition. Great TV! HD picture is awesome. PS3 and Xbox 360 look awesome too! No complaints. Thanks to Amazon and 6ave Electronics.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier
Reviews.Author: T. Wissehr
Reviews.Content: I was a bit aprehensive about buying this TV online, but I should not have been. The TV is everything that your previous reviewers say that it is, and the delivery and setup process was efficient and totally professional. I couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: 46 Inch PC Monitor
Reviews.Author: Dnyj
Reviews.Content: Hearing that this was one of the best TVs in this price range to use with a home theater PC was my main motivation for buying it and I wasn't dissapointed.Works great with a PC.  Running via HDMI (ATI HD4850).  Can get sound on the TV through HDMI.  There's a special PC mode you can use, but this setting limits some of the picture control options.  I run it just as a normal HDMI component and can calibrate the TV to have a really nice picture for Video.  You'll want to make sure you're graphics card can output to 1920x1080 and you're set.  PC mode looks better for regular desktop computing, though.  You can use one of the two customizable picture settings for desktop and one for video to get a pretty good compromise.Interestingly enough, I like AMP for a lot of the PC stuff.  It can help smooth out choppy videos, tickers, web banners, Anime, everything.  Also NASCAR just looks unbelievable, it's like you're there (and I've been to a lot of NASCAR races).Everything high def I throw at it looks stunning.  The TV has really dark blacks and rich color.  You can brighten up the picture to make it more vibrant and keep the darks dark with some of the advanced picture controls.A word about the clouding and flashlighting, it does have some, at least on my set.  It's not bad enough for me to go through the whole process of returning the set but it is noticeable, mainly in scenes where a large portion of the screen is black (24).  The real tragedy is that it doesn't really show up until you bump down the brightness a bit and get it calibrated.  It can be tamed somewhat by turning down the backlight (I like it on 5, 3 is too dark to me), by turning on the power saving to auto (results in some screen darkening during dark scenes but not too bad) and also by using the dynamic contrast (same as power saving but to a lesser extent).  You can almost dial it out but we really should be trying to dial in the picture, not dial out a flaw in the set (hence, 4 stars).

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Camo335 "Cameron"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this TV.  The picture is brilliant and sharp!  I also have to Applaud the delivery service.  I had never heard of them but though they weren' exactly as efficient as a UPS or FEDEX about keeping their tracking up to date, they were pretty quick and they came in and setup the TV, made sure everything was working and free of damage before they left.

Reviews.Title: Screen sizing problem
Reviews.Author: George T. Workman
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LN46A650 is a really good TV for a home theatre system or watching DVD's or high definition channels, as long as the screen glare is not an issue.  Based on high def sources the TV produces incredible brilliant scenes, the best that I have seen.  My problem is that you have to manually choose screen size, recommendation is to use 16:9 as much as possible.  Problem comes with SD broadcasts even received digitally though a cable company.  If you select Wide View to expand the picture, it cuts off the bottom and top of the image.  This is especially annoying watching ESPN, CNN, CNBC and other channels that use the bottom part of the screen to show scores of other games, time left in the game, news scrolling at bottom, stock transcactions scrolling at bottom, etc.  The manual says to move the image up so you can see the scrolling items.  Great except now the heads of people on the screen are cut off.  Could not find a good resolution to this problem.  Sony Bravia on the other hand has a Auto Wide feature which checks the source signal and then fills the screen.  Yes it does change the aspect ratio to fit a 4:3 to a 16:9, so their faces are a little wider but you see everything being broadcast on the screen.  Prefer Sony's way of dealing with SD channels over Samsung so I am returning the Samsung for a Sony 46 V Bravia TV.

Reviews.Title: beautiful
Reviews.Author: J. Melb "J.Bellomo"
Reviews.Content: This TV is awsome!! Beautiful pictures- This is a high quality TV and well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Another great product from Samsung!
Reviews.Author: J. Higgins
Reviews.Content: Our new exercise room needed a great display and based upon previous experience with Samsung, buying this model was not a hard choice to make. It has plenty of audio and video connection options. All of the positive reviews speak for themselves. This is a great product and very easy to setup and configure.Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of Color

Reviews.Title: Astonishing picture, well worth the money
Reviews.Author: J. Rice "Computer Geek"
Reviews.Content: Awesome Television!  120HZ is the way to go.  If you are not convinced, go to a store and try to find a 60hz TV next to a 120HZ TV or any brand.  Wait for the demo DVD to show the fast motion demos.  If you are not convinced after this, you most likely have poor eyesight and you can just buy a cheaper TV ;-)Highly Recommended and well worth the extra money you would pay compared to lesser brands.

Reviews.Title: Nice samsung lna650
Reviews.Author: G.R.
Reviews.Content: This tv is really great. I've had it for a month and it still amazes me everytime i watch a bluray on it.

Reviews.Title: Samsug LN46A650 review
Reviews.Author: Paul Lissauer "Pablo SL"
Reviews.Content: We were quite pleased with sales and delivery process for the TV; price was good and the delivery was predictable and done well.  We are very pleased with the TV.  Colors and image are quite sharp, it follows action very well without pixilating, and overall has been a very good purchase.  I would happily recommend this Samsung unit to anyone.We also bought the Samsung Blu-ray DVD player (BD-P2500) at the same time.  Since they are both from Samsung they communicate well and it makes use of the Blu-ray player simpler than it might otherwise be.  Both units are very satisfactory.

Reviews.Title: Super TV
Reviews.Author: Elise K. Maggart
Reviews.Content: TV is great and delivered quickly. Just have to figure out how to enter the code with Satellite TV so the volume increases and decreases flawlessly.Picture is crisp and clear. Touch of Red is appealing though not that noticeable. Would buy another Samsung in a New York minute!

Reviews.Title: Fabulous TV
Reviews.Author: J. S. Gore
Reviews.Content: This TV makes even the most mundane program look beautiful, and anything shot in HD looks incredibly gorgeous. The colors are deep and creamy, with true blacks and whites, no motion stutter. The picture looks great from anywhere in my living room, so don't worry about viewing angles. Really intuitive & easy to use remote. The TV itself really classes up the room: it's thin and elegant, the best-looking home TV I've ever seen. Amazon's white glove delivery service is the best: no muss, no fuss!

Reviews.Title: Upgrading from CRT
Reviews.Author: Christopher Hess
Reviews.Content: I've had CRT TVs all of my life (I'm currently 27).  I recently bought a couple of cheap 19" LCD TVs for my kids and had a chance to see how much the technology has improved.  After looking at some of the larger TVs in local stores, I decided it was time to upgrade from my 28" CRT.Since I wasn't very familiar with newer types of TVs I did some research.  There are several pros and cons to be considered in deciding between LCD and Plasma, but I eventually went with LCD on a recommendation from a friend.Next it was time to decide what TV seemed the best to me.  My intention was to get a higher end TV that I wouldn't want to replace for a very long time.  Looking over my living room I decided a 46" TV would work best for me (though many sites I looked at assured me that a 52" wouldn't be too big).  I'm viewing the screen from about 12 feet away an I'm happy with the size of this TV.  I think I would have been ok with a 52" also, but I'm certainly not disappointed by the 46" size of this TV.Next I had to decide what features were most important to me.  Features vary a lot from brand to brand, but I settled in on Samsung as the brand with the features I liked the best.  One of the most wonderful things about this TV is the 50000:1 contrast ratio.  I've never seen a TV with such vivid colors.  I also decided to go with a modle that included dNIE.  This chip is only used when the TV is in dynamic mode which makes it set the contrast and brightness on it's own.  I haven't seen any immediate benefits from having this extra chip in the TV.  In fact, I have it turned off most of the time because I have the contrast and brightness manually set.  There are lots of connections for hooking up all o the things I run into my TV (Playstation 3, Wii, DVD/VCR Combo, Surround Sound, Tivo, and my PC are all connected and there's room for more).All in all, this is an impressive TV.  I think I would have been just as impressed with the slightly cheaper model without the dNIE chip.  I would certainly recommend this TV to anyone who is in the market for a TV in this price range.  If you're looking at something a little cheaper, pay attention to the Contrast Ratio, I think it's been the most impressive feature, and it's worth paying a little more for it now (instead of having to buy a new TV to upgrade it later).

Reviews.Title: This TV is amazing....
Reviews.Author: Miss Marples "Lady D."
Reviews.Content: The picture is so incredible, so life-like, it doesn't even seem like I'm watching television. It's light years away from the JVC 15 yr old model I was living with.At first I worried that the 46" would be too large, but having had this set for two days now, I am *so* glad I opted for the larger size.  Absolutely no issues so far--very easy setup(my delivery man was prompt, cordial and checked the set thoroughly for in-transit damage, but did NOT help with setup, had to do it myself)--and I don't understand the complaints about glare. I watched my first movie (LOTR) at midday in a room with windows on two sides...just closed the blinds, didn't bother drawing the curtains and no worries.I also don't get the complaints about the remote...it's a remote. It's not perfect, but it's certainly more than adequate.Highly recommended for price and quality. You can't go wrong with this set!

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Neuville
Reviews.Content: This tv is great.  The design with the touch of red adds character to the tv.  The price at the time of purchase was a bargain at 1300.  A few days later the price jumped to 1500.  Saw the same tv at best buy for 2000.  The white glove delivery was nice.  The two delivery guys walked in the tv took it out and set it up.  They recomended waiting an hour for the tv to warm up to room temp as it was 20degrees outside when they delivered it.The only annoyance with the tv is the startup noise it makes when turned on. Sounds like the nintendo wii when its turned on.  An electronic doorbell type sound.

Reviews.Title: Nothing short of amazing!
Reviews.Author: sweller
Reviews.Content: I was completely blown away. We watched "Finding Nemo" for the second time in many years. My Mrs. said, "It looks like 3D..." And when Darla poked at the aquarium, she leaves FINGERPRINTS! This is on a DVD player that I bought BEFORE there was HD. After watching videos on a 20 year old Trinitron, I had no idea what I was missing. Quick - Someone tell me why I might want Blu-Ray???

Reviews.Title: samsung ln46a650 1080p 120hz
Reviews.Author: TONY  A
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN46A550 46-Inch 1080p LCD HDTVWhat a deal I shoped around and Amazon.com was the best deal. Very fast shipping.I compared this tv next to the sony brava samsung blows it away.With the 50000 two 1 contrast ratio the picture is so pure. whatching a show or movie in HD you need to get used to it because it is so clear it looks fake. What I mean is you see every detail.Very clear and for the money I spent you can't beat this deal .I give this deal 5 stars .Thanks Amazon TONY FROM PA.

Reviews.Title: i dunno why anyone would not buy on amazon
Reviews.Author: Michael P. Galdos
Reviews.Content: cheapest price, professional delivery. amazon is a no brainer.as far as the tv goes it's great as expected. also as expected however is that the stock sound isn't super awesome

Reviews.Title: Unless you like sports or "the video look," save $$$ and buy the 60hz
Reviews.Author: Sweeney "Conscientious Consumer"
Reviews.Content: I work in the video industry and use this as a client monitor for my editing system, as well as a TV. Its a GREAT TV, so definitely buy this brand, but one of the first things that I noticed was that the 120hz version of this model gives you the "Soap Opera" video look to all your movies and programs.You can turn this feature to high/medium/low/OFF. I simply turn it off, but then that defeats the purpose of getting the 120hz, $300 more expensive version. Unless you watch a LOT of sports and need the high action at faster frames/per/second (i.e. the video look,) save you money and order the regular LN46a650 (non-120hz) T.V. At time of writing, its going for 1,199.00, and the 120hz version is 1,499.00.This being said, DO buy a Samsung! Happy viewing!

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: Shanarha
Reviews.Content: I bought the samsung ln46a650 model only 1 1/2 months ago. I hope I never have to change this review!  Overall I'm pretty pleased with this model.  As in other reviews, there is reflection due to the glass panel, as compared to regular lcd tv's.  My room has lots of south facing windows, so sunlight was a concern.  After seeing the reflection, I considered returning the set, but changed my mind after going back to stores to look at the other lcd screens again.  The reflection issue is well worth the improved quality of picture.  So I took a little time getting used to the reflection and adjusting my room.  Honestly, the reflection is only visible in dark scenes and for the most part is avoidable with a slight turn of the screen or is minor enough to ignore. This set is definitely one of the best lcd tv's around.  Now compared to plasma... yes there are some miniscule differences for the very picky, but it's pretty darn close to plasma quality viewing, and I prefer the lighter model that I can move myself.  My only gripe is the remote control, which is not set up for quick changes like switching from 16:9 to widefit mode.  you have to go through submenus to make changes.  And of course, as with any HDTV, if you don't have HD input, the picture stinks.  But who buys a large screen HDTV without getting HD input devices?

Reviews.Title: Great TV perfect purchase experience
Reviews.Author: J. Churchill
Reviews.Content: What can I say. I did my research and for LCD TVs, the Samsung is the best. Some people don't like the glare from the shiney screen, but the clarity is well worth occasional glare. We have the TV in fairly dark room so it isn't a problem. As far as the pruchase experience goes... I have been reluctant to purchase a major item like this except from local retail stores. But after shopping around the price was too good and the free "white glove" delivery was fantastic. Even my local retailer wanted to charge delivery!Bottom line I would highly recommend this TV and Amazon to anyone!

Reviews.Title: NOTHING ELSE BUT AMAZING TV. THAT'S ALL I GOT TO SAY
Reviews.Author: Kenny Herrera "quetzalcali"
Reviews.Content: The only problem i got was that my eyes got so use to it. I can't hardly see the auto motion sometimes. But the great thing is that if you are with friends or you are watching regular TV you wanna come back home and kiss your TV of how much you love it.

Reviews.Title: Almost the greatest
Reviews.Author: Larry T. Mcneal "Gadget Guru"
Reviews.Content: WOW! Picture, sound, extras, just WOW!!!  However.  The sound started going mute on the second day. Reading another review about an overheating problem I tried aiming a pedestal fan at the side of the TV and walla! No more sound problems even after extended periods of viewing.  I am trying to reach customer support to see if there is an alternative to returning the TV.  This is an absolutely gorgeous machine except the required fan.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jack-L
Reviews.Content: Awesome product, great looks, great picture, reasonable cost.  I am mostly enjoying connecting my computer to watch TV shows that I have missed during the week.  It is also nice to review pictures, etc. through the USB port.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: David A. Fynbo
Reviews.Content: I like many others I pondered on if I should order such a big tv and put my trust into a shipping company, well I did it and will do it again.  I had no problems tracking and getting my ln46a650 ahead of schedule.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Karen
