Reviews.Content: [[ASIN:B001413D94 Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of Color I absolutely love it. Get deal. Arrived quickly with an easy set up.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Joseph Headapohl
Reviews.Content: This TV has great picture quality and the glare issue/toc is barely noticable in my living room. This TV has great black levels for an LCD and sports and movies look great. The reason i wanted the 120hz was for watching bluerays with out the 3:2 pulldown. I really didn't like the AMP feature and I leave it disabled. It just doesnt seem natural when it is on high. It may have a use for sports, but right now it is fine without the AMP. The sound is good for a TV but if your spending this much on a TV, you should have a good sound system to go with it. I have an older (2006) Sony 5.1 channel system that is acceptable for now. Eventually I am going to get a 7.1 channel system when I have a bigger room and no longer live in an apt. My only complaint about the TV would be the remote but I dont think I have ever had a good remote with a TV.

Reviews.Title: MISTER
Reviews.Author: jim tv addict
Reviews.Content: TV speakers sound tinny.  I have hooked up external speakers, which is necessary for good sound with this TV.Picture is wonderful when you're not watching from an angle.  Haven't yet been able to figure parameters of the angle for viewing without picture degradation.  Seems to differ with different programs--but could be my imagination.  If my room wasn't full of outdoor light producing glare, I would have gone to plasma instead of LCD.  There is very little glare with this set.I would purchase this tv again.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Adam Paternostro "paternostro"
Reviews.Content: After looking for about 6 months, the Samsung was way better than the others we looked at.  After viewing side by side, this one stood out.  The 120MHz is great for gaming and this TV has a Dolby Digital output for over the air reception to run to a receiver.  No issues with the TV so far.  The shipping from Amazon was great and the delivery guy setup the TV and went through a checklist.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46 HDTV Model 650
Reviews.Author: P. R. Fornwald "Paul"
Reviews.Content: I love my HDTV.  It is everything that I asked for and more.  I was concerned with the red TOC before I got it.  The TOC looks nice when it is turned off and does not impact viewing when turned on.  Amazon.com was $700 cheaper than Best Buys.  The delivery guy unboxed the TV and made sure that it would turn on.  I would strongly recommend this model to anoyone thinking about buying a big screen HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Great bang for the buck.
Reviews.Author: Todd Malcolm "ToddCM"
Reviews.Content: I am still burning this unit in, but the picture without much tweaking is very good so far.  My wife is very pleased that we now have a HD TV in the bedroom and being able to watch HD DVR material is night and day.  Samsung seems to have it down, I would say that you would need to spend a LOT more money to get any real improvement in picture.

Reviews.Title: Crystal Clear
Reviews.Author: Red
Reviews.Content: The TV is exactly the way the other reviews described.  The vibrant color of the images are so crystal clear.  I truly enjoy this TV.  I would recommend it to anyone interested in this size TV.  I have no problem with natural light reflection.  The volume is acceptable without a audio stero system, although I use it with a stereo system  to enhance the surround sound.  I rate the TV "5" star easily!

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: M. RODRIGUEZ
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV!  You can't get a better TV for you money.  The only bad thing is the sound.  I upgraded from a 32 Samsung to this one and wow!  The people almost feel like they are in the room with you!  Great picture & great color.  If you have a sound system this is the tv to get!

Reviews.Title: Months of research has paid off!!
Reviews.Author: B. Tisler
Reviews.Content: I researched probably longer than any person should before they purchase a TV. but I couldn't be happier(so far) with this purchase.  It was ordered from Amazon and delivered 1 day a head of schedule.  The picture for sports is amazing, after 4 days of use and watching several basketball games and some golf, the screen has yet to freeze and re-pixelate, which was one of my biggest concerns purchasing a LCD TV.  Overall I'm very satisfied to this point.

Reviews.Title: Best Value for the money!!!
Reviews.Author: Michael S. Andrews
Reviews.Content: After researching TVs for over a year, we purchased this Samsung. We absolutely love it! At first, we thought a 52 inch would be what we would get. The 46 is hands down the better value. You get a fabulous picture and a big screen for $300 less than a 52 inch. You can't tell a difference between the two.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding accept for one possible glitch
Reviews.Author: benyitzchok "CD"
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of ColorThe picture quality, contrast and depth of black are better than any other LCD TV that I spent hours watching at Best Buy.  The set up was straightforward and very easy.  The remote is easy to understand and to work. The buttons are clearly labeled and easy to read.  I have had the set for three weeks and my endorsement is qualified by only one fact that might or not be the fault of the set.  After watching a channel for a period of time, a single flickering broken white line sometimes appears at the very top edge of the screen. I can make this go away by changing to a different picture size or channel and then back to the initial size or channel.  I contacted Samsung's tech service line about this.  The first line responder tried to research the problem but eventually transferred me to the second line of response.  That person sounded more definitive, but I did not have a lot of confidence that he knew what he was talking about.  He maintained that the problem was due to a weak or faulty signal over my cable.  Having registered the problem I am now waiting to see if it persists, goes away or gets worse in which case I will make a bigger fuss with Samsung.Amazon's delivery service was flawless.  The delivery came within the specified delivery window and the delivery people unboxed the set and made certain that it worked before leaving.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME !!!!!
Reviews.Author: lynn
Reviews.Content: This is the most awesome television we have ever had, the picture is absolutely beautiful and we have all the extra componants to go along with it, just now hooking them all together, home theatre, blue ray player and television. So far so good. Hope we will enjoy many years with this set up! And thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Dale Warren
Reviews.Author: Dale Warren
Reviews.Content: Great Delivery.  Quicker than told. They carried in the TV, set it up, andremoved the carton.  Picture is great.  We looked at a number of LCD TV'S and believed the Sumsung was the best.  We then settled on the LN46A650 with 50,000:1 contrast ratio and the 120 Hz.  It's a fine looking TV and I can recommend the LN46A650 to anyone and feel they will be thrilled with the performance.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Choice
Reviews.Author: W. Blackwell
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this set.  Nice change from the big, bulky 36" JVC that it replaced.  Beautiful picture and the number of HDMI and other input/output jacks have been adequate.  Paired it up with the Sony 550 Blue Ray, Onkyo TX-SR606 HDMI Receiver and surround speakers from The Speaker Company.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46ln650a
Reviews.Author: L. Mifflin "coachmiff"
Reviews.Content: There is a reason this tv was the best seller in its catagory for 2008--enough said--there is no equal to this lcd!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: S. Arment
Reviews.Content: The Samsung 46" is fantastic.  The picture is bright and crisp.  At first I thought I went to big...seeing I went from a 27" to a 46" but within a couple of days I knew I made the right decision.  The deliver was also wonderful and FREE.  They unpacked it, put it in place, and made sure it worked.  How wonderful is that?  I didn't have to do a thing.

Reviews.Title: Exquisite HDTV - couldn't be happier
Reviews.Author: G. Nancarrow
Reviews.Content: I got one of these from Amazon just before Christmas '08. Free shipping, white glove service and an unbeatable price ($1500). When I saw my first HD-DVD movie (Transformers) I was flabberghasted. Even non-HD discs are fantastic. Now I have a Blu-Ray player and HD cable service. My family is little tired of me always drawing attention to the detail and depth of color of this set. The only other brand that can compete with the Samsung picture is Sony...but not at this price.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely amazing!
Reviews.Author: K. Grady
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of Color on March 2, 2009 and got it today March 5, 2009.  I guess it helps to live close to the Amazon.com warehouse.  The "Enhanced Delivery" was exactly as described.  I did have to help the driver carry it into the house, but I expected that.  The delivery guy unpacked it, removed all the plastic, and hooked it up.  He didn't ask me to sign for until he made sure it worked fine.  This was the "free shipping".  I must admit that I was a little nervous about purchasing this TV online, but Amazon has put those fears to rest. And to top it all off I got it for $100.00 less than Newegg.com.  "Good job Amazon.  As for the TV, well, it is simply amazing!  The "RED Touch of Color" is very subtle and elegant.  But what is really cool is the TV itself when you have an HD signal.  It can be summed up in one word WOW!  Samsung has hit a home run with this TV.  My advice to you is quit shopping around and just buys this TV, you will not be sorry.I will definitely buy from Amazon.com again and I would buy another Samsung TV too.

Reviews.Title: Best LCD so far
Reviews.Author: Stephen Yu "Willow"
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd LCD TV in my house, and by far, it is the best performer.  In fact, I felt that it is "too" clear at some point.The 120MHZ Auto Motion definitely adds more clarity.  At times, it felt a little awkward (I guess I have to get used to this), so I tried between "low" and "medium" setting.  Even a movie that I watched 100 times felt brand new.I have a 52" Sony LCD, and 2-year old 40" Samsung LCD, and in terms of clarity, this one is the winner.  For movie viewing, Sony is pretty good too, but don't forget that they are more expensive.  For sports viewing, there is no question.  Get this one and stop shopping around.I don't like the sound quality as much as the picture quality, but you can always plug in an external speaker set, or route it through a sound system.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650 LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Herbert Kentner II
Reviews.Content: TV was as promised, excellent picture & user frendly. I did a complete review of online forums, and was impressed by the positive ratings it received. This LCD is a replacement for a Samsung 50" DLP, purchased over 4 years ago, so I was familiar with the strong Samsung Brand. I have yet to calibrate the set as the picture is excellent, after adjusting some of the settings, but I expect to be even more impressed when it is. My buying experience with Amazon on this product was excellent, good communication and service. However a problem did develop when delivered. The driver informed me that it was a "Threshold Drop" , not the promised "White Glove" Delivery promised by Amazon. He did however help bring the TV into the Family Room, and open the box to check for damage.Hooking up the TV was not a problem for me, fortunatly I was home to accept delivery and not my wife. Overall, beside the one misque, I was very satisified with both the product, and Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Awesome television
Reviews.Author: Lewis C. Reyna "Fair Winds and Following Seas!"
Reviews.Content: Got excellent delivery service from the company Amazon.com uses. Got the white glove delivery. The company arrived with the TV all boxed up in the factory carton, opened it, and set it up for me including hook up to power and cable, etc. They left me sitting on the sofa watching TV. The delivery time is not what the system predicts. The TV arrived in 3 days from date of purchase, the system estimated 10 days.I am and electronics tech and specialize in audio and video systems. The video quality of thsi tv is beautiful. I could not be happier. I shopped around before I purchased and decided on this brand/model. There are many brands out on the market,it pays to be careful, read reviews and recommendations.If there are any cons to this TV is that the screen is shiny and glare can be a problem unless tv is carefully positioned. I placed it opposite a wall with no windows to avoid this. The controls are easy to navigate. I was able to pick up and move tv around by myself as it is not that heavy.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV
Reviews.Author: T. M. Wing
Reviews.Content: Pretty much all I want to say about this TV has already been said. We did our homework, read the reviews and what consumer reports had to say, talked to people, and finally ordered it.The reviews are right - this is an amazing TV.The delivery went perfect and the shipping company treated the TV with respect and everything went off without a hitch just like you'd expect from Amazon.The picture quality is mind-blowing, though we turned off the 120 Hz refresh feature because it was giving us both motion sickness. As others have said, the picture is almost too good, and you can see the actor's fake mustaches and bad makeup. It takes some getting used to.I just can't say enough good things about this TV, and I'm glad we didn't go with a cheaper brand. The more research we did, the more we discovered that Samsung was the brand we wanted. I also have a Samsung fridge and a couple Samsung hard drives in my computer. To me, Samsung is the new Sony.This TV gets the best reviews because it's the best TV. So don't rush out and just buy a Vizio or other cheaper brand. Read the reviews and talk to people, and if you choose this TV, you'll be happy you did.

Reviews.Title: Just simply beautiful!
Reviews.Author: A. Rebeil
Reviews.Content: First off the product arrived on time from Amazon and I saved over $700 buying on Amazon and not best buy. The TV I received was manufactured two weeks before I ordered it, Which is another plus. The TV was exceptionally well packaged and shipped for free, plus ++.LN46A650:PROS:-Great and innovative design-great contrast ratio-Auto motion plus is fantastic- Great with PC inputs-Very nice and realistic true blacks-The clear screen creates a very nice immersion experience that makes images sometimes look 3d.-The lighting on this TV is got  to be one of the best things. Thanks to its contrast ratio the dark and light colors are dynamically diverse.CONS:-None really except wished the TV could receive 120hz signal. The TV is 120hz and runs at 120hz(the TV by itself). But cannot receive 120hz signal from PC(or any device) signal but only 60hz. Which isn't really a big deal because the TV  does a good job of synchronizing frames with its Auto Motion Plus 120hz-Artifacts present at maximum Auto motion plus setting. Though medium is setting is great and the AMP is much cleaner than the Sony TV's.Other thoughts:I got this TV for $1418 on Amazon and am very happy with my purchase. Buy this TV worry free and when arrives you ll be happy you saved a couple Benjamins. And go get yourself a nice surround sound system with the money you saved.

Reviews.Title: Upgraded from Samsung 530 model to 650 model
Reviews.Author: Joseph T. Brandolo
Reviews.Content: I recently upgraded from the Samsung 530 model to the 650 model.THERE IS NO COMPARISON.  The picture on the 650 (both 46 inches) blows away the 530 model !!!!  Even my wife agrees, and she usually doesn't have much opinion regarding the tvs.  Buy the 650 model.  You won't be disappointed (and the latest Consumer Reports agrees with me).

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Alfred G. Mueller II
Reviews.Content: With the digital signal deadline approaching, my wife and I decided it was time to go high-definition. We did our research on the Internet and looked at dozens of TV's in showrooms and ultimately settled on the Samsung LN46A650. The color beats out any other set, and the screen is viewable from any angle in our family room. I am not a fussy person, so the fact that the TV remote is not compatible with the cable remote does not bother me. It took me the better part of two weeks to get the color like we saw it in the showroom. The controls are not terribly intuitive and the manual does not offer preferred settings. But I found out after about seven days of fiddling with the controls that there are literally dozens of forums online where this information is available. The TV itself is very easy to connect to a surround-sound system. It is literally plug and play. On some of my favorite TV shows, it almost seems like I can reach into the screen and touch the people. The experience is really overwhelming at times. We don't have Blu-Ray, so I cannot comment on compatibility. But hands down, I would recommend this TV to anyone. The delivery service predicted that the TV would arrive in one week, but the TV showed up in five days. It would have shown up in four, but we did not get home from work in time to get the message on the fourth day. So honestly I can't find anything to complain about with this TV.

Reviews.Title: LCD TV outstanding but PILOT delivery not white glove
Reviews.Author: J. Strohsahl
Reviews.Content: The TV is absolutely outstanding. The only issue I have is that unlike my previous LCD, the sound from the TV and the sound from my audio system are not in sync. You need to use one or the other at a time or you get echo.  Delivery was a different story. Even though my packing slip says "Amazon room of choice  two man delvery", one delvery man from PILOT in Miami brought the unit with my help into the house and then handed me the slip to sign. When asked, he said he doesn't unpack or set up. I at least made him stay until I opened the box to be sure the screen wasn't cracked.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, great price
Reviews.Author: JohnnyMac "golf fan"
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with Amazon.com from price, to delivery, to set-up, to picture quality.  Amazing color and detail, especially for sporting events.  Would recommend this product without hesitation.  Only drawback is delay (about 3 seconds) when changing channels, otherwise extremely pleased with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: J. Olson
Reviews.Content: The picture quality & clarity is great. We looked at lots of brands & sizes & this one out did them all & the price compared to other models is good.

Reviews.Title: I highly, highly recommend this TV
Reviews.Author: V
Reviews.Content: I know I'm just rehashing what hundreds of other people have said, but this is one amazing TV. After doing lots of research and visiting some forums I started getting discouraged with buying an HDTV at all, some people had clouding, some had stuck pixels, some didn't like the AMP, blah blah blah. Well, those are the minority. Most people will buy this TV, love it, and hopefully never have issues with it.I ordered mine on a Friday. On Saturday I got an email from Amazon that it had shipped. On Monday CEVA called me and said the TV was here and they could deliver it Tuesday between 1-5PM (I live in Boston, so delivery times could definately vary if you're further from a warehouse). Two guys showed up at 2:00, weren't particularly chatty or anything, but they were professional and did what was needed. They brought the TV up, set it up, connected the cable box, and made sure it worked. Then I signed for the order, and I had my new TV.The picture is simply amazing. The blacks are black, the colors are bright, and the viewing angle is great. The speakers are nothing to write home about, but like all high end TV's, it really needs to be hooked up to external speakers if you want the audio quality to match the video quality. The remote isn't great, but it's not terrible; it does the job fine.I've yet to receive my Blu-ray player (should be here tomorrow), but I've tested it with Comcast HD (1080i), Comcast SD, Xbox 360 (some 1080p games, some 720p games, and DVD's), and my PC via the VGA input. All the sources look great. I actually find that the TV does a better job than the Xbox of de-interlacing/stretching DVD's. Can't wait to compare Planet Earth Blu-ray to the DVD version tomorrow.I could go on and on, but you need to stop reading reviews and buy this set, you won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: Looks good and Looks Good!
Reviews.Author: T. McKay
Reviews.Content: I researched HD TV's for a few weeks before going with the Samsung A650.  I had a Toshiba Cinema series 35" tube and this choice is even better than what I expected.  There were many TVs for less money.  Our old TV was about 12 years old and was still in excellent condition.  Considering this will be our main source of TV entertainment for the next dozen years, a few hundered dollars today seems like a good decision for getting the latest technology and the most enjoyment out of the investment - since even a less expense TV is still a significant cost.I have seen many HDTVs with pictures that were less than acceptable especially with non-HD material, which is still most of what you will be watching.  Setting the TV on 16:9, when your program is not high def it automatically adjusts for the correct screen size (putting black bars on the sides for 4:3 and on the top/bottom for various wide screen formats).  This way you don't get the fat squatty people you see so often on these screens.  Even when watching HD channels, most of the older programming (2yrs+) is in 4:3.  Prime time and news + most movies are in high def 16:9.The 120hz motion engine comes preset to medium (options: off, low, medium, high).  In this mode the people look like a soap opera or video game with overly crisp motion and a 3-D feel to the scenes.  Some people like this as it creates the feeling you are in the scene with the actors.  I changed it to the "low" setting and it creates a much more natural look for me.The screen is a bit more reflective than the A550, but comparing them side by side the colors were richer with the A650 and the relection is not significant.  My room has an entire wall of windows and the TV is very watchable in that environment during the day.  That also brings up the brightness of LCD over the Plazma TVs.  You can quickly change the video mode from "dynamic" "standard" and "movie".  In "standard" and "dynamic" the screen is very bright and crisp with excellent contrast.  In the evening I switch to "move" which creates a more movie theater like environment swith rich colors and dark blacks.The "touch of color" is a very classy touch on the frame.  It is a band of red across the top an bottom behind a slightly curved clear accrylic frame.  It is very subtle and you don't have to worry about it "clashing" with your rooms colors (my wifes 1st concern).  Now that it is in the room, she thinks it looks as great as I do!About size, I probably could have gone with the 52" instead of the 46".  Originally we were thinking the 42" but salepeople told us that you need to go at least 10" bigger than your old TV (a 35" tube) to create the illusion of being larger.  Since much of the programming is still 4:3, the actual screen size of those shows are not much bigger than our old TV, although the HD programming (HD channels prime time and HD premium channels) along with Blu-Ray bring out the full glory of the screen.  Since the TV is so thin compared to the bulky tube TVs, it has a much smaller presence in the room - especailly not extending into the room so invasively.  Don't get me wrong, we love the 46", but can see that a 52 inch (what's 6"?) would have worked just fine too.  We are both glad we did not go with the 42".  Our family room is 17'wide x 18' long.

Reviews.Title: What an awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: Marcus on the North Coast
Reviews.Content: After much research and review of other's opinions of this TV we finally ordered it up from Amazon. Price, instant availablity, free shipping and no sales tax made it easy to use Amazon over the other options, like Best Buy ($50 cheaper, but add sales tax, pick it up and transport it myself and wait for 30 days to get it). Quick setup instructions were clear and easy to follow, and the detailed connection pages in the owner's manual took care of other questions. After getting it connected to Dish Network and our Bose home theater system we turned it on and WOW! What an incredibly clear, sharp and detailed picture! We put in WALL-E to check the DVD capability and it was like being in a high end movie theater. The only real complaint we have is the glossy screen. While we love the aesthetics of it (the TV is absolutely beautiful from a styling standpoint) it does reflect outside light. Our living room has panoramic windows that face Southwest and we get major sun in the afternoons. As long as you are 10 feet or less from the screen and facing it directly it is OK, but any further back are at an angle and you definitely get glare. That said, we have no other complaints at all, just praise. Hollywood stars are in big trouble, because you see every line, wrinkle and makeup flaw on this TV. The depth of color is fantastic and unlike other reviewers I don't notice any problem with the black definition. We do recommend that you hook it up to a good quality home theater system for sound as the built in speakers are weak, and you should turn them off using the system menu as they have a slight lag with the home theater system that makes is sound like a cheap reverb system from the 60's. We also have to once again comment on the sheer beauty of this TV from a styling standpoint. The simplicity of the screen surround and its subtle deep red tint make it an absolutely beautiful piece of functional art. Oh, and the remote is way cool - if you get near it it senses that and lights up all of the buttons. The menus are easy to use and well documented, and so far we are fully satisfied with the factory settings for picture and color. All in all, I think this is one of the best values for the money and I will definitely consider Samsung TVs first for any future purchases.

Reviews.Title: No adjustment needed
Reviews.Author: D. Manzella "Cyborhog"
Reviews.Content: This is the first TV I've gotten that didn't need a bit of adjustment.Color, Contrast, etc.  How boring is that.Worked great right from the box.

Reviews.Title: big, clear, and stylish
Reviews.Author: K. Wright
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for 2 months now and love it.  I read a lot of reviews discussing how bad it is in a bright room.  I have it sitting on the East wall of my room and in the West wall about 12 feet away is a window.  The glare has been minimal in the day time, not enough to bother me.  The picture is perfect.  The red touch of color (which I didn't quite get until it was sitting in my living room) really adds a nice touch.  We happen to have furniture similar in color so it almost looks like we planned it.  The sound is decent through the speakers that come on it.  I don't have HD tuning (yet) but watching movies on TNT or the like have been stellar for just normal TV tuning.  Even my mother-in-law commented on how clear everything looked and how we felt we were right there!  I have no real complaints at this point.  Best price for it here on Amazon and the white glove delivery service could not have been better.

Reviews.Title: Worth buying
Reviews.Author: J. Wirsing
Reviews.Content: I spent a lot of time researching the different LCD tv's available and decided on the Samsung LN46A650.  The tv is absolutely fantastic!  I have absolutely no issues with this tv.  Definitely worth every penny!

Reviews.Title: Great TV BUT....
Reviews.Author: Fuad Alam Khan "SamsungBoy"
Reviews.Content: Ok People this is by far the best TV i have seen. Still not sure if it is better than LNT4671F but it is just as good. Did a lot of research and baught LN46A650 because the 6 series is the best price. If you want a built in woofer go for the 7 series, if you want a very thin LCD go for 8 series but all of these have the same spec (the picture is the same..50000:1, 120hz, DNILE, Ultra Clear Panel)But...make sure you get a set without clouding!!!!! this is a light leakage on different parts of the screen when you are watching the TV in a dark room. This is a defect so i returned by TV and AMAZON gave me replacement. This replacement is great so far and i could not be happier!A way to check is watch TV for half an our turn of all lights at night and try to go to an all black background seen. if it is truly all black..congratulations you have a superioir set.Clouding is caused by inconsistant heating on various part of LCD. Due to low manufacturing quality standards. AVS forums has some cures but this in really incurableSony XBRs have been known to have this problem so save your money and just buy the Samsung 6 series.really happy with Amazon service. with all the inconvinence of getting the TV, shipping it back, getting another one....i will still purchase from them again.

Reviews.Title: ln16a650
Reviews.Author: Seth Bradley
Reviews.Content: Amazing product, would defiantly recommend to anyone. I do have to say that if you are not hooking everything up via HDMI you are missing out. Samsung has put all of their money into those hookups, everything else falls short.

Reviews.Title: Great T.V.  I Love It !
Reviews.Author: Fourthstooge
Reviews.Content: I had to buy this Television from [...] for a little bit more money because amazon refused to give me over $550 credit on their card so that I could take advantage of the 3 year interest free financing.  Newegg had no problem giving me $2400 credit and 1 year interest free financing.  Oh well....The T.V. is great.  big, bright, colorful...  all I ever wanted in a television.

Reviews.Title: Great TV@!
Reviews.Author: Andrea Bass
Reviews.Content: My husband had to have this TV.  It has a lot of buttons and options and if I actually had time to sit down and watch TV, I would enjoy it a lot more:) Picture quality is better than the bog screen!

Reviews.Title: New Digital TV
Reviews.Author: Samsung Advocate "Sam"
Reviews.Content: We really enjoy our new Samsung 46" digital TV.  It exceeds our expectations in every way.  Watching HDTV is a great experience, especially sporting events.  And when watching movies, the clarity and sound makes is just like being in a theatre.  I would recommend this product to anyone WITHOUT RESERVATION!

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV, GREAT SERVICE
Reviews.Author: Peter M. Zwieryznski
Reviews.Content: I must say I am very happy with everything. To start, I originally went through Amazon for this purchase because of a rediculous dispute I had with Best Buy and there horrible "Phone Order" customer service. Amazon was great setting up my order and helping me get everything going. Now, after I placed my order I went through and started seeing all of these complaints on the delivery service people were receiveing which really worried me. There are some horror stories. To my suprise/delight the delivery service for me was great. The gentlemen was very nice and helpful and I recieved the TV well in time for the big game.____Now I know this review should be for just the TV, but I needed to put that out there to show its not all bad on the shipping end. As far as the TV goes, its awsome. The PICTURE QUALITY is phenomenal. Many are rating the speakers as poor, but they are standard TV speakers. For everyday watching they are great...as any other TV though they are not meant blow you away (unlike the picture). THE REMOTE, again, not as bad as some make it out. Not the best, but certainly not terrible. And yes, if you are new to the 120HZ feature...it needs turned off unless you are watching sports. Otherwise it does look 'wierd'.____GREAT TV, GREAT SERVICE

Reviews.Title: I love this TV!
Reviews.Author: The Doughboy
Reviews.Content: I've never been much of a TV watcher, but I knew I wanted a big flatscreen HD TV.  I researched models for about four months before deciding on this one.  Then, I watched the price like a hawk.  Eventually, the price dropped to a reasonable level and the TV wound up in my Gold Box Deal "quick pick" page.  That's when I ordered it.The two delivery guys arrived within the scheduled window and were really nice.  They unboxed the TV and set it up, even offering to take away the box.  I decided to keep the box to use if I ever have to move my TV.  One of the guys told me that he delivers flatscreens all day and he thinks this model is the best.  He said he has a 52-inch model and a 46-inch model at home.  And he said all this *after* I tipped him, so he had no reason to butter me up.The TV is great.  It's my first HD TV and I've become an HD snob.  I'm now less likely to watch programs that are in SD.I have a Playstation 3 and have to say Blu-Ray movies are amazing.  I watched "Good Night and Good Luck" in Blu-Ray and could see incredible detail.  The picture was truly amazing.If you're looking for a flatscreen HD TV, this is the one to get.

Reviews.Title: Some things don't live up to the hype, Samsung LN46A650 does!
Reviews.Author: R. L. Robbins
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of ColorThis is a lovely TV even when it's not on. The picture is sharp and thecontrast is great (50,000-1). It is second to NONE. It has all the necessities of today's modern HDTVs and more. I am extremely satified with it and recommend it to anyone looking for quality at a good price. That's hard to find in today's economy but if you sharp around it can be done. This Television is without a doubt one of the best made, if not the absolute best. Go for it, you won't be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Simply fabulous!
Reviews.Author: Thomas Lee "Callie"
Reviews.Content: I have been reading and studying this item and others for many months. It is my 3rd TV purchase since HD surfaced. I flipped back and forth many times between this and models from Sony. I fretted over and over again, not about price, but picture. I received it yesterday, it's up and running (very simple) (they even included an HDMI cable) and I am real impressed. The picture is near perfect as far as I can see. Don't let the "off axis" scare you. I sit near 45 degrees to the left of the TV and the picture remains clear and detailed. The set itself is a beautiful piece of furniture, but beware. Clean the screen and rim (frame?) carefully to avoid scratches. Oh yes, they included a special cloth for this practice. I am totally satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV!!
Reviews.Author: Emile A. Meyer IV
Reviews.Content: THIS IS REALLY A GREAT TV!!  I went from a 480i to a 1080p though so my review may be a little biased...i really did 2 months of straight research on prices and performance...i am a gamer(PS3) so a Plasma didn't really sit well with me and BURN IN...the LCD is great for gamers and movies and the colors are rich and crisp...I was amazed at HD...delivery was good but they didnt know much about the tv which would have been nice..cheaper than BEST BUY!!! Thanks AMAZON!!!

Reviews.Title: Pure Visual Awesomeness
Reviews.Author: M. Apicella
Reviews.Content: I love this tv. It's amazing what HDTV looks like on this set. I am confused by one thing, though. It says it has 120Hz, but no matter what HD show I have on, the highest it ever reads is 60Hz. I even tried putting on a football game where is there is lots of movement, but it still read 60Hz. I checked the manual and when I changed setting to the highest option, it ruined the quality of the picture. I don't think it's the HDMI cable because that says it handles that output. Maybe Directv cannot handle 120Hz? Any insight anyone can give me on this would be appreciated. Overall, I love this television. You can't go wrong with the quality and the price.

Reviews.Title: Not enough space to describe how incredible this tv is...
Reviews.Author: Tony Jeng
Reviews.Content: So I've researched for close to a year keeping an eye on certain tv/specs/features that I want from an HDTV (this being by first), and I finally came to this model. And thank god I did. If you are a first timer, careful shopper like me, then I can tell you this is by far the best decision you will ever make about a large purchase. It is worth every penny. The resolution is amazing. I got this TV just in time for my superbowl party and it was a huge rave... and all I plugged in was an HD Antenna! That's the type of quality you get coming out. Right now I have a Blu-Ray and DirectTV plugged into it. It's hard to tear me away from the couch now. I find myself drooling at the sharpness/features/ease-of-use with this tv that makes everything look that much better. Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: An Extremely satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: M. Edwards
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is exactly what other reviewers have commented on. Even non HD movies are outstanding. It's exactly what I expected and more. I bought a Samsung 32" HD in '06 and it's still working perfectly.  Amazon's delivery was tops, they delivered the TV inside, unpacked it and connected the power to make sure the set was in working order. I was apprehensive ordering it online but the cost savings were too much for me not to take a chance with Amazon. No other electronics dealer in town could come near Amazon's price. I even got an extra 3 months warranty by registering it online with Samsung. And the best part was that I was able to get the set I wanted not what a local showroom had to offer. For the money you can't go wrong with this set.

Reviews.Title: I FINALLY DID IT
Reviews.Author: MH
Reviews.Content: Yes, I was one of the folks that just could not pull the trigger on this TV. I waited for month's, watched prices, read all the reviews, watched local sales papers, scouted consumer reports and dreamed. Well finally last week I did it. The LN46A650 showed up in my quick picks (a trick you can learn about by reading all the reviews) at the lowest price I had seen yet and I bought it. I had previously applied for the Amazon card (no interest for 24 months on this set,I say if you can't pay it off in 1 year, you can't afford it )so buying was super easy. I got it in about a week, delivery was great. The delivery guy helped set it up, to make sure it was not damaged. It looks great even on regular satellite. HD upgrade does not come till next week. Any issues I read about sound being sub par or the touch of red being a distraction is not what I have found. Hey this is one of the best TV'S on the market. If you're looking for a 46" lcd, this is the one. Look no further than Amazon, because you will not beat the price if you are patient.

Reviews.Title: I love this tv.
Reviews.Author: Jonathon E. Stark
Reviews.Content: I looked everywhere for a tv of this caliber and was prepared to pay a couple hundred dollars more. When I went to the store, I checked the reviews on Amazon and found it to be much less and free shipping. What a deal! While it did take me almost a week to get, it was FREE!!The tv itself is fantastic. The picture quality is amazing, the menus are easy to navigate, set up was a cinch, and it isn't heavy at all.There are some minor details I wish I could change, though. The buttons on the tv are touch sensitive buttons, so there aren't actually any buttons to press. It is difficult to see where the buttons are; so much in fact I rarely use them. Also, the picture-in-picture doesn't work with two components hooked up (for instance, a ps3 and cable/satellite), but with one component and "air" tv. This is the case for a lot of tvs, but I would prefer to have it the other way. Finally, the automotion plus feature (120hz refresh) makes video games and sports look AMAZING, but for regular tv it makes everything look like a soap opera (best way to describe it). While some people may think it looks better, my wife and I found it very distracting. So much in fact, we leave it off most of the time.

Reviews.Title: WOW!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Kittkat "=^..^="
Reviews.Content: I am so amazingly happy with this purchase!  The TV has an outstanding picture, everything I hoped it to be.  The delivery was smooth and easy and without damage.  Set up was just as easy.  Every moment I look at the screen I am overjoyed.The touch of red isn't a light, but just a slight tinge of red, so don't expect something to glow when you turn it on,  but it is still nice.THANKS AMAZON for the great purchase price and experience.  I LOVE IT!!!

Reviews.Title: Simply Amazing
Reviews.Author: Gerald G. Vath "Pop-Up Nut"
Reviews.Content: I simply must add my two cents to the fabulous review this set has received. It is simply stunning. I was a bit panicked, however, when I played my first movie and had not turned off the Auto Motion Plus feature. Film does look like video with it on. An interesting new way to watch your  movies, if you want to. The AMP feature has three settings plus a side-by-side display which you've most likely seen if stores if you've been shopping for a set with the 120hz refresh rate.My only complaint is with the remote. It has a few buttons that take you directly to some of most frequently used settings such as Source and Picture Size. But, the browse wheel is gimmicky. Simple left, right, up and down buttons would have been just fine.Get this set while you can. I understand it`s been discontinued.

Reviews.Title: Loving my Samsung
Reviews.Author: L. Oswald
Reviews.Content: My new Samsung is everything I could have hoped for. The white glove delivery was great. The Television has the greatest picture I have ever seen. I would definitly recommend this to anyone looking to purchase a new set.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE THIS TV
Reviews.Author: Michael Dulin "BRENT DULIN"
Reviews.Content: I love this tv. I have been looking at tvs for 2 years.. this one has it all. Ireally wanted a sony bravia to go with my ps3, but the get 120hz the price ws crazy. Best buy had this tvfor 2099.00 I gotit on here for 1402.00. I love everything about the tv. My playstation 3 is super crisp...I can see things Ihave never seen before in the games. GET THIS TV!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: THE BEST 120hz LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Sam Laghi
Reviews.Content: This is truly a beautiful and amazing television. I had problems at the beginning with the sound , however a firmware update fixed that all. The sound is not the best however I hook it up to a home theater when I am watching a movie.  The clarity is beyond any other I have seen. Features are fantastic. You can get weather updates and news via the internet. I hooked up my PS3 and watch bluray movies on it and WoW. I also like the touch of red very artistic looking. I like this so much I am thinking of purchasing a 52 inch version. The swivel is also a plus. My sister was watching a regular dvd movie on it and she was astonished to how realistic and "live" the picture quality was. I would highly recommend this television.

Reviews.Title: Eveyone is Happy
Reviews.Author: Southern Fried Jersey Girl
Reviews.Content: My mother lives with my sister and brother-in-law. They wanted a flat screen television and I was handed the task of choosing one. I just knew I couldn't find one which would make everyone happy. Apparently I was wrong...they ALL love it!! They were also pleased with the white glove service. I had done my research, but I'm still kind of shocked everyone is so thrilled (they even like that little touch of red). My sister told me that now my 85-year old mother even channel surfs!! I can finally release all those brain cells dedicated to finding the right flat screen. I'm so relieved I ordered this LN46A650!

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch
Reviews.Author: Phyllis M. Wilson "Homemaker"
Reviews.Content: The TV is great! The picture is the best we have ever had. The setup is is very easy and user friendly. The input and output jacks are great and you have enough to plug in numerous accessories.

Reviews.Title: Very Good TV
Reviews.Author: W. Passage
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this TV. It has good picture and sound. It handles video tapes and DVDs very well. I pick up many more channels than I did with my old one and many of them are HD even though I don't pay for HD service.  All in all it is everything it is advertised as being.

Reviews.Title: Great HD TV
Reviews.Author: Michael L. Jaudon
Reviews.Content: This TV, without a doubt, is a great TV.  For a first time buyer of a HDTV I was pleasantly surprised.  It has enough connection ports on the back or on the side to connect all of your peripheral devices such as a blue ray player.  It works well with my Dish Network receiver.  The only downside is the remote "wheel"(not very responsive).

Reviews.Title: The best of the best...
Reviews.Author: Kelly G. "research junkie"
Reviews.Content: I did at least 14 hrs of research on t.v.'s (plasmas and lcds) before deciding on my Samsung LN46A650, and it seems to be the best of the best for all other t.v's in it's class.  And since buying it, it has done nothing but meet and even exceed my expectations.  Not only is the picture quality excellent, but the aesthetic quality is more than I expected.  It's beautiful.  I was nervous ordering it from Amazon, but felt safe doing so with Amazon.com as the supplier.  I received "white glove" service that I didn't expect.  A well-experienced man brought the tv and hooked it up.  Also, he explained the controls to me.  All in all, my experience in purchasing and watching this t.v. has been excellent.Here's a personal story.  We got the t.v. in time to host a superbowl party.  I stayed busy and didn't get to actually sit and watch the game.  When I finally sat down with 3 minutes left, the first thing I noticed was they were not watching it in high definition!  And they watched almost the entire superbowl game that way!!  If you purchase this t.v., be sure to watch in high def, especially for big games (obviously).

Reviews.Title: Amazing Performance
Reviews.Author: KC
Reviews.Content: We have only had our new Samsung LN46A650 for a week, but we could not be happier. This is an amazing piece of technology. I am an electrical engineering professor, with some of my research involving the kind of solid state lighting used in LCD systems like this, but I really had no idea how good the picture and sound would be. The sound system we are using is built around a 10 year old 5.1 Dolby Sony receiver, with only standard RCA audio cable inputs and a fairly basic Cambridge Soundworks speaker system. I had planned to upgrade this at some point, but wanted to see how it sounds with the new TV and HD content from our local Time-Warner system before making an additional investment. It sounds so good, that there seems to be no reason to change. We used HDMI cables to connect to the DVR (from T-W) and a Samsung Blu-Ray player, which really cleaned up the former rats nest we had with the old TV. Our old DVDs look great upconverted to 1080p. In fact, we see no reason to replace any of our DVDs with Blu-Rays, since the improved quality, while obvious, does not justify the additional cost.Our purchase and delivery experiences with Amazon were also excellent.Update 4 January 2012. We continue to be very happy with this TV. It would be nice to have some of the features of the new smart TVs, but we really do not need them.

Reviews.Title: HD 46 inch samsung tv
Reviews.Author: R. Horne
Reviews.Content: This is a terrific tv. Got a good price. It was well packaged and arrived in great shape. The picture is superb and the color is true. If the economy were better, I would buy another one! RMH

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: K. Morris
Reviews.Content: I got this TV yesterday and am very impressed.  The "WHITE GLOVE DELIVERY" was a bit of a joke.  The delivery man pushed the box through my front door and that was pretty much it.  That was ok though because I wanted to set it up.  Picture is amazing and I really like the way the TV navigates through the options and set up screens.  It also looks fantastic in my living room.  I would recommend this product to anybody.

Reviews.Title: Both Samsung and Amazon get 5 stars!
Reviews.Author: J. Tuttle
Reviews.Content: First off, Amazon had the best price anywhere, more than $200 cheaper than any place I looked and I researched for over a month...PLUS free white glove service shipping!  The white glove service was excellent.  I got a call when my TV arrived at their facility and we scheduled a delivery time that worked on my schedule.As for the TV, if you have decided to go the LCD route, this is the best picture you're going to find hands down.  You won't be disappointed with either the 46" or 50" guaranteed.  I've read some reviews that said it had a bad glare with ambient lighting but I have seen nothing wrong at all and even does a decent job with direct natural lighting.  The Auto Motion Plus feature is alright but makes film look like video.  My wife makes me turn it off because she thinks if makes everything look fake.  However, it is great for any type of video game play.

Reviews.Title: Perfect picture
Reviews.Author: JZ
Reviews.Content: After days of going back and forth between the 550, 630 and 650, finally took the plunge and got the 650. Only thing holding me back from it was the glossier screen. Once I went and saw it in person, the contrast difference between the 550 and 650 was significant - the 650 is much much better. Never saw the 630 but I suspect it was closer to the 550 than the 650.The room it's in has several large floor to ceiling windows and I was concerned with the ambient light and reflections. The TV is not facing the windows so I thought I could get away with it. Took the plunge. While I can see some reflections, they're so minor I hardly notice them and suspect I would have seen them withe the 550 too.Two days with the TV and I haven't noticed anything I don't like. Love the picture!

Reviews.Title: Great hdtv for a great price!
Reviews.Author: IUBruin
Reviews.Content: I researched for a long time before making a purchase, and I am very happy that I decided on this tv.  The picture is flawless.  The only negative for me is the lack of a useful picture-in-picture option.  If you want a good pip, get a Vizio.  But even though i wanted pip, I don't miss my old Vizio a bit because the picture quality is much better on the Samsung.  I also love the addition of the red trim frame.This was my first time purchasing something expensive online and Amazon was great.  I saved a lot of money and received my product faster than promised.  My bad luck even came through and I got a tv delivered that had a small scratch on it and a little bit of a pixelation problem.  I called Amazon and they immediately offered to replace it for me at no charge, and the same two delivery dudes swapped it for me four days later.  Now there isn't a scratch in sight and the picture is gorgeous.  I have already made more purchases on Amazon since and I will continue to do so.

Reviews.Title: Awesome LCD
Reviews.Author: M. Weist "mw"
Reviews.Content: This LCD is awesome.  Color and Black Levels are great.  I did a lot of research before buying this tv, which involved many trips to local stores to see which tv was the best.  And it was this one.Let me first say that don't worry about the reflection/glare level of this tv, I don't notice it unless it is off, while watching the tv I don't see any reflections as the picture is bright enough to carry it.  I like probably many people between the 630, 650 and 750 (and even the 850).  Well all these tvs use the same panel they just add little extra things.  The 630 has slightly less contrast ratio.  The biggest and number one turn off from the other TVs is that when I was looking at them in local stores I noticed the ToC seperating and cracking along the edges.  It looked AWFUL.  While I do like the square look of the other models, I just couldn't put myself in a position that would have this quality issue.  So do yourself a favor and check out the other models in local stores to see this for yourself, look at different angles of light hitting it (it's usually on the edge right where the color meets the clear part around the bezel).  The 650 is the only model I didn't see it on (even the 950 had this problem).Picture and quality is great.  Amazing for the price level of this tv.  There are plenty of options to adjust picture and really I didn't have to tweak much except lowering the backlighting.  The Auto Motion Plus is a great feature for sports and that is about it.  If it's on during just about anything else it makes everything look sped up and unatural. So unless I am watching sports, I have it set to "Off".This doesn't affect my score as this is about the TV, but Amazon and CEVA (shipping company) was great.  I ordered the TV Friday morning, and TV was trying to be delivered that Sunday morning (unfortunetly I missed the call, but I picked it up as the place was local on Monday).  Can't get much faster than that.  Also, Amazon had best price out there, especially when it's coupled with the [....] card.So in the end, if you are on the fence about which TV to buy trust the over 700 positive reviews this tv has, and pull the trigger on this model and this Samsung.  I feel very strongly that Samsung makes the best LCDs out there.  I also looked at some Sony's, Toshiba's, and Vizio's and nothing comes close, it's really not contest that the Samsung's have the best picture.  Plasma is a different story, but this one is the way to go!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46" LCD
Reviews.Author: R. Watson
Reviews.Content: Everything was as described and on time.  TV worked great right out of the box....and white glove delivery was a nice bonus.  Great transaction!

Reviews.Title: Best tv on the market
Reviews.Author: Shawn R. Martin
Reviews.Content: You will not find a better tv for the price. It has the 120 hz for motion blur and a crystal clear 46 inch screen. Buy it, u won't be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: The best tv out there!
Reviews.Author: J. Schlichting
Reviews.Content: After months of reviewing and studying televistion sets, we decided on this one and are so pleased!!  Great picture-great sound-easy to control.  Absolutely no regrets with this tv at all!

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!!
Reviews.Author: Richard Aaron
Reviews.Content: Service, delivery, and product are amazing!i can't get over the quality of this television.The images jump out of the screen and come into my home.Couldn't be more satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Televison
Reviews.Author: T. Fox
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased a Samsung 32" LCD(720) for my bedroom in September of 2008. I was so happy with Samsung and the service that Amazon provided, I decided to purchase one for my family room.The Samsung LCD is awesome! I have my blu-ray player connected and the movie experience is the best i have ever experienced. I would highly recommend it to anyone searching for a new television. I would also highly recommend purchasing it from Amazon. I made my purchase on January 1,2009 and it was sitting in my family room on January 6th. Amazon had free shipping and their white glove delivery system is unbeatable!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 650
Reviews.Author: Cincy Mom "AE"
Reviews.Content: We've been more than pleased with the 46 inch Samsung 650 that we purchased. Amazon used an independent delivery service and had it to us within a week. The picture quality was great even before we converted to HD service. After we converted, it blew us away. Sports are the most impressive thing to watch.From what we learned from our research, the 650 model has the 50,000 to 1 contrast ratio that the Samsung 700 series (and above)have but not all the bells and whistles...recipes, workout videos, etc.We also like the "Touch of Color" feature. It's aptly named. The red is subtle and almost an accent. We hung ours on the wall and it looks great!We're very happy w/the TV and w/the service provided by Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: M. Painter
Reviews.Content: NO problem with shipping. TV was easy to set up and has a great picture.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: M. Theisler "hcoohc03"
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome TV! I have seen quite a few panels and this is the best by far!!I would recomend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Simply Magnificant TV
Reviews.Author: S. Mansfield
Reviews.Content: Without a doubt the most amazing TV I've ever seen.  The picture clarity is as advertised and I've had no problems with the unit since I received it a few weeks ago.  Easy set up and it was delivered on the scheduled day.  As others have said, the sound quality is a bit weak, but I can live with it without complaining.  The remote is easy to navigate thru. Simply amazing and I'm thrilled with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: 46" 120Hz Samsung LCD works fine
Reviews.Author: Harold Kyriazi
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived quickly (less than a week) and in good shape.  It was a bit hard for one person to unpack, it was so large.  But, I managed, and also was able to carry it upstairs by myself (it weighs only about 60 lbs).  The most interesting thing about it was actually the box, as it was two separate pieces -- top and bottom -- with them connected by two large, plastic, collapsible rivets.  Very interesting evolution of fastener technology!

Reviews.Title: Great Quaility
Reviews.Author: J. Byers
Reviews.Content: This TV has great picture quality, and easy to setup.  I would not hesitate recommending this TV to anyone with no regret.

Reviews.Title: ln46a650 Is SWEET
Reviews.Author: AK
Reviews.Content: With over 2 months of watching this TV price jump on amazon I was able to find a better deal elsewhere about a week ago. Not to mention a steal on a Blu Ray player. Anyways, this TV is the best for its price range. The Super Bowl was amazing on this TV and when you match it with a Bluray player, simply WOW.Picture is amazing. Have not had any issues with glare. Room lights also do not affect the picture as much as you would think. Keep in mind that your HD source (Cable, Dish or Antenna) will influence your picture. I was impressed with just using a basic antenna. However some SD stations kinda lack.The sound is relatively good. No complaints. Have not experienced any sound gaps or jumping as previous reviews note. Matching it with a sound system is my next step. You don't put cheap tires on a ferrari do you?4 HDMI inputs are also a plus.Cons are few: Remote looks could be improve upon. Kinda wimpy when paired next to a sony. The Power ON/OFF sounds are lame. But you can atleast turn it down or off.I am not disappointed with this TV. To those that are interested: Price on this TV should be dropping more (if you've noticed amazon and selected stores...), but stock will be getting low as the 09 Models are released. Dont wait too long!

Reviews.Title: Great LCD for the money!!!
Reviews.Author: J. Messer
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with the purchase of this LCD.  What a great picture!  The 46" size is plenty big for the home theater experience.  I keep looking at it and think how ridiculous it would be to go any bigger.  I love the fact that the TV has plenty of input options for sound and video.  I don't own blue ray yet but my DVD progressive scan looks fantastic with most recent DVD releases.  The HD channels are awesome and the brightness and contrast levels are fantastic with plenty of options to adjust these to your liking.The only negative thing I can say was although the TV was delivered in a short amount of time (6 days), I was disappointed when I was told by the delivery company they would be there on a Saturday between 1PM and 5PM and they didn't show up until closer to 8PM.  They call it the "white glove" service but these guys tracked all kinds of dirt and slush from outside all over the hardwood floors.  This was not too big of a deal but I would tell anyone who uses this service to beware if they have nice carpets and floors they don't want soiled.

Reviews.Title: Just like everyone else is saying.  This tv is spectacular!!
Reviews.Author: Dr.Graffin "Gaming God"
Reviews.Content: I did not buy this tv (LN46a650) through Amazon, so I can't comment on the delivery through Amazon, but I did just receive this tv last Friday so I can comment on the quality/features of it.  Here's my setup and what I use it for:-HD Cable via HDMI through Comcast.-PS3 via HDMI.-Xbox 360 via component.-Wii via component.-2 floor standing front speakers with an older receiver using digital optical cables for all previously noted sources (8 year old receiver).I had previously had a 30 inch, 3 year old, 1080i CRT Samsung and upgraded to this model.  I sit about 7.5 feet from the screen.  On my previous set I had HD Cable via component, and on this new set HD cable reception is very good.  I had already experienced HD on a decent set, so I wasn't blown away by it, but it was everything I had expected.  I expected perfection and that's what I got.  No overscan, clear, bright, and detailed picture.  No complaints and great quality.  I watched the Super Bowl on it and I didn't notice any motion blur at all.  Lots of options for tweeking the picture settings.  I'm getting professional calibration in about a month, so I'm going to assume the picture will be even better, but out of the box the settings are quite nice and I'm pleased.While I wasn't "blown away" by HD Cable, I was blown away by Blu-ray discs on this tv.  Whether it's the 1080p, or the set itself, or a combination of both, I don't know, but what I do know is that movies like The Nightmare before Christmas, Big Fish, and Wall-E, look outstanding (the 3 BRs I have).  Almost 3D at times (often, multiple, multiple times through the movie!!).  You can see all the details and clarity in the picture.  It's almost memorizing.  I'm a new big fan of Blu-ray!!Gaming on this set is nice.  It's a decent upgrade in size for me, and gaming is very, very decent.  It's big enough, bright enough, and I have yet to notice any lag input with my games (via HDMI2/PC and game mode on the component connections).  So gaming is good and just what I expected it to be.The only cons of this set would be SD cable kind of looks crappy.  It crops the picture on the sides, and of course the clarity isn't that of HD.  Nothing I really didn't expect, and of course the picture is more than watchable.  The sound on the tv I can't comment on as I have it hooked up to my stereo speakers.  If I had room (and the money) for additional surround sound pieces, I would pick them up, but at this time, I'm more than satisfied with the sound through my stereo speakers.  I have no clue why lots of people complain about the remote.  It's no modern marvel of technology, but it's simply a remote.  Easy to use and responsive.The ToC bezel is a non issue.  I don't notice it unless I look for it.  The same can be said about the reflective screen.  My room has a ton of light in it during the day and the tv looks great.  Of course look for reflection in any tv during a black screen, and I think you'll be able to see it.  All in all, with all of the HDMI ports, 2 components, and various other connection options, this tv is just as great as everyone says.  There's no reason not to get it.It's a great modern LCD that's definitely worth the money.  I don't see any other tv in this price range, with the features it has, this size, backed by a quality name like Samsung, and with as many positive reviews comparing to this set.  Coming from someone that is fairly specific about the quality of his tv and did his homework for 3 plus months on this very set, pick up this tv.  As hundreds of others have said, you won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: As good as it gets
Reviews.Author: Milton "mtn biker"
Reviews.Content: This TV rocks. It was easy to setup and the picture is gorgeous.  I only have HDTV from comcast hooked up but the picture is amazing.  My old DVD player movies look pretty good, Im hoping to get a Blu-ray player sometime down the road.I got no complaints about the system. the sound out works really well I have the optical sound going to my receiver and it works great.  I use a universal remote and that works fine as well.  I got no nit picky comments to put out there.  Its a great TV and was worth waiting for the price to drop for me to pick it up.

Reviews.Title: I know I could live without it, but thank *somebody* I don't have to!
Reviews.Author: Donna F.
Reviews.Content: I've been waiting on the price on this one until I just couldn't stand it! I wouldn't care if I had paid $200 more for it - this is stunning! There is a huge window right next to it that has pretty much direct sun (new room, no blinds yet) and I've had no problem with glare. I am very particular about this. The picture is so gorgeous, I saw nothing that compared in stores this past 3 months as I was looking. Had a friend over yesterday and it was very annoying when he kept exclaiming all through the movie about how sharp, detailed, beautiful etc etc ad nauseum about the picture. I also saw nothing like the price Amazon sells it for! White glove delivery is something of a joke. Love Amazon, but Ceva in AZ ... The guy who brought it was kind of rude, and when I said he was supposed to set the TV up to make sure it worked he flipped it on and said "There's your picture." ??? No Dish hooked up, DVD or otherwise. A test pattern is a picture?? I laughed him out of my house. No tip for that dude.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650
Reviews.Author: William Bloodworth "Bill B"
Reviews.Content: You just can't go wrong with this LCD telivision and the white glove delivery for the price. The telivision is awesome. I had to deceide between it and a sony. I made the right choice even tho they are close. It was deliveried within a week and they hauled out the old TV. No charge.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650
Reviews.Author: Michael Conklin
Reviews.Content: I have owned my Samsung for three weeks now and it is everything I hoped it would be.  The white glove free delivery was great.  When the delivery people left my tv was ready to use.  Out of the box I finally decided that the picture was over boosted so have done some playing with the brightness and contrast to tone down the image.  Otherwise, I am quite please with the Samsung and find the 46" size to be the correct choice for me.

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture!
Reviews.Author: Shawn Martin "tvcritic"
Reviews.Content: It doesn't get any better than this.  The best 46 inch tv on the market.  Check the other reviews.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650 is great!
Reviews.Author: D. Yanashot "DAY"
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LN46A650 46 inch LCD HDTV is fantastic.  It looks great (TOC) and delivers a great picture!  Easy to set-up.  If you buy this LCD Television you will not be disappointed!!!

Reviews.Title: Flatscreen TV
Reviews.Author: A. Vandehey
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the timely shipping  and deliveryof our TV, it works very well for us.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Scott Madvig
Reviews.Content: I shopped around for a while for a larger LCD HDTV and finally decided on this model. The contrast ratio and the 120hz refresh makes, even standard, DVD movies look amazing. I have my PS3 hooked up with an HDMI cable and it looks fantastic! The TV puts off a little warmth, but with a screen this size, that is expected. I regret nothing from this purchase and the shipping was a day early, even with the supersaver free shipping!

Reviews.Title: Best HDTV for the money
Reviews.Author: B. Wagner
Reviews.Content: By far the best tv i've seen or had.  Puts all my friends/family tv's to shame.  With the 120Hz, it makes regular tv seem like HD.  I hooked up my PS3 to this tv and it's unbelievable how clear everything is.  For the price, you really can't beat this type of quality.  If you want a HDTV, look no further, this is the one you want

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: tc2percent
Reviews.Content: This TV is absolutely amazing!  Everything looks so "real".  We have HD TV and it took me a couple of days to get used to seeing the picture look like I was there.  Almost like a documentary movie.

Reviews.Title: Complete satisfaction
Reviews.Author: Richard E. Beaver
Reviews.Content: Great price.  Delivery was earlier then expected.  Product was delivered, boxes were removed and setup was easy

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650 LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: W. Jay Johnson "calljay"
Reviews.Content: Purchased through Amazon.com--Service was excellent-Delivery was prompt-Am very satisfied with the TV and would purchase again through Amazon--

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Oscar Stephens "os"
Reviews.Content: I had bought a Samsung 32 inch before and it got stolen. I upgraded to this series 6, 46-inch TV a couple of weeks ago and so far I am very satisfied. I love the Samsungs and when I searched for a new TV I even didn't look for another brand.I still remember my good friend bought another samsung, 42-inch,  for $2200 a couple of years ago. If you consider that, I think it is amazing how fast the technology has improved and the prices have dropped.My friend is already thinkiing about upgrading to a new one (his TV does not support 1080p), so I think the best thing about this TV is that the Series 6 has pretty much all the features that you will need from years to come without feeling that you need to switch it for a newer version in the next couple of years. I am planning to keep this TV for at least 8 to 10 years.Pros: great image, size. I read other comments saying that the image looks "too real" and I have to say that it is true; however, the TV has pre-set modes for images and when you set it up on "game" looks just fine and perfect. The other pre-set modes look might make it look a little different to the type of image one is used to.Cons: So far I can't think of anything except for the "touch of red" which I am not crazy about. I heard about "sound" being a big con, but I have my TV conected to an independent sound system, so I cannot really tell.I will totally recommend this TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: Super Price--Super Service--Super TV
Reviews.Author: Barry C. Padgett
Reviews.Content: After weeks of online and store-visit research, I finally decided on this particular tv and on amazon.com as my place of purchase. I am satisfied that I could not have made a better choice either way.  My Samsung was delivered in less than a week after placing my order on-line, with the delivery company calling to set up a delivery time at my convenience, and bringing the tv into my home and setting it up.--As far as the tv itself is concerned,I could not be more pleased.  The picture quality is fantastic even on non-HD programing, and HD channels are incredible.  The tv looks great, works great , and I would recommend it unequivocably to anyone in the market for a flat screen tv!

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: D. Vilensky "DV"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV from Amazon in early december 2008. At the time it was selling for $1,928.99 and included a free Samsung blueray player. They also delivered the TV, took it out of the box, and set it on my TV stand.Ive had the TV for a few months now, and I am really impressed. The picture is great! I have no complaints and would recommend this one to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Thrilled
Reviews.Author: Leenerdl "The Queen"
Reviews.Content: We are absolutely thrilled with our 46" LCD Samsung flatscreen TV. The setup was so easy and the picture is great. The total experience with Amazon was superior. Will definitely order more products.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Steve Thunderduck
Reviews.Content: TV is fantastic.  delivery was on time, picture is great, sound is fine.  people that complain about this tv either got a lemon or they are really spoiled.  i had a regular tube tv until this one and i will never regret the decision to get it.  it makes tv watching so relaxing.  get it.

Reviews.Title: Exceeds expectations!!!
Reviews.Author: Jim Mccarter
Reviews.Content: Recently purchased Samsung's LN46A650 LCD model. Hours of research led me to my decision regarding this purchase and it was justly rewared with the HD Cable servicing thru my cable provider. The technician dispatched to convert me to HD was complimentary about the unit before installation. After installation both of us were so impressed with the quality of reception that I was unable to focus on the instructions he was imparting on DVR'S ect. Still haven't recovered from the amazing quality of this set and it's reception. The combination of Amazon, Samsung and Pilot Air Transportation is a true winning combination.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Alyssa N. Kelly "Lee"
Reviews.Content: Fantastic Reception.  Easy to set up and use.  Best TV I've ever purchased.  Will only buy Samsung in the future.

Reviews.Title: WOW, WHAT A VIEWING EXPERIENCE!
Reviews.Author: RESEARCHER "AMAZON FAN"
Reviews.Content: THE SAMSUNG LN46A650 WORKED WELL RIGHT OUT OF THE BOX.  AMAZON DELIVERED IT IN RECORD TIME.  THE TV VIDEO IS VERY GOOD, BUT TO GIVE THE FULL EFFECT OF 1080P, YOU WILL NEED HD CABLE OR  HD SATELLITE.  THE 46" IS A GREAT SIZE, BUT IF I HAD IT TO DO AGAIN, I WOULD GET THE 52".  HOPE THIS HELPS.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Timothy J. Boudreaux "-T"
Reviews.Content: Was nervous about ording something like this online but was not disappointed. White glove delivery was superb, TV was absolutely amazing!! Could not be more satisfied. If your nervous about taking the plunge don't hold back amymore. Click BUY!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung a hit!
Reviews.Author: T. Anderson "TNator"
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased a 46 inch Samsung LCD (650 series).  Cevas delivery person showed up early in the morning, unboxed the set, and set it up.  Person was very polite and helpful.  Buying from Amazon and not having to even touch the TV until it was set up definitely rocks!  The reflection from the TV, a point of concern listed by several persons, is not an issue any more than it would be on a CRT TV.  I prefer it because the colors come through much better than a matte screen.  Set up was easy through the remote.  The wheel on the remote is not bad, and I often push the outer ring in whatever direction I want rather than trying to turn the wheel with my fingers like an IPod.  This is effective.  I have no complaints about the set, and although red is not my favorite color, the Touch of Color red along the outside of the TV frame actually looks good. Buying this set is a no-lose proposition, and I think this set is all you really need vs. buying a few more bells and whistles in the 750 or 850 series.  The 950 series has LED backlighting but the cost of that set is much higher; to me the 650 screen has plenty of brightness.

Reviews.Title: No Complaints, Great TV
Reviews.Author: Chuckbo
Reviews.Content: I really like the TV. And delivery from Amazon was trouble free. Glad that I waited for HDTV LCD but don't know how I lived without it.

Reviews.Title: nice tv @ a nice price
Reviews.Author: Michael L. Sikora "mls-Go Steelers"
Reviews.Content: this was a nice buy and price from amazon. tv is wonderfull and shipping was on time. would recomend.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650 46" 1080p Review
Reviews.Author: Willliam H. Winters "papaw"
Reviews.Content: We were a little concerned about the touch of color when we checked some earlier reviews. We stop at Best Buy to check it out and decided it added a nice touch to the over all appearance of the TV. When we compared the over all picture quality in the store to other TV's we were very impressed. Since we have had it in our home for srveral weeks now we are more than impressed. The touch of color is hardly noticable and adds a nice quality touch to the over all appearance.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ellen G. Welsh "egw45911"
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived earlier than I was told it would be here :) and it is terrific. The color and sound are excellent

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: K. Waring
Reviews.Content: Alls I can say is this TV is great. I've had no issues with it whatsoever. If there is anything bad to write, it would be that non-HD channels are a bit blurry compared to a regular TV. But, I mostly watch HD now so I love it!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: D. Gerber "accelerate"
Reviews.Content: What can I say this TV is great. It still blows me away. I havent had any issues with my TV.

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV
Reviews.Author: Peg "Happy Mama"
Reviews.Content: We have had this set for a month on FIOS and love it. Great Picture on all channels, but terrific on HD channels. Also like the fact that it swivels on its base, eliminating the need to mount  a wall bracket on our built-in bookcases.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: R. Nimmo
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LN46A650 46-inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV is absolutely the best picture I have ever seen.  I bought one without ever shopping around simply because my parents bought one a few months before I did and I had the advantage of benefitting from their very careful research and seeing their tv in action.  Also I knew that Amazon was safe to buy from since they also purchased theirs online.  I couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: MK
Reviews.Content: Simply a great LCD TV.  Amazon white-glove service was top notch.  No regrets whatsoever.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of Color
Reviews.Author: Thomas Yuan
Reviews.Content: very crisp very clear, i love hd. especially when one starts working, after working 8-9hr days and dealing with customers and what not, you simply just want to detox and enjoy yourself, this tv does just that. couple of things, make sure you establish proper viewing distance before you purchase this, hd is all about proper viewing distance. the samsungs have glossy screens so it makes the picture look even that much better, the colors pop more and it seems like the details are richer. however, the glossy screen is not for everyone. some people like regular anti-gloss screen, think macbook v. mac book pro's, look at the screen. hence, this tv is ridic, especially nice since the super bowl is coming up, definately a great buy. it is a bit on the pricey end, but if you are already into the 1000's might as well put in a few more hundreds to save yourself the "what if" notion. this is young mula speaking, shout out to the six too sick.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, reasonable price
Reviews.Author: Walter Horylev "Walt Horylev"
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Samsung LN46A650 46-inch 1080P 120Hz LCD HDTV a month ago.  The picture right out of the box was beautiful.  Watching NFL football from 10 feet away is like being there on the sidelines.  This TV makes watching any program more enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: Great TV- Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: S. Williams
