Reviews.Content: This is very highly rated LCD by CR and worth every penny.  I was very impressed with the efficient delivery and set-up.  I was nervous about making such a large purchase on line, but was as smooth as could be!  OUTSTANDING!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Picture
Reviews.Author: garz628
Reviews.Content: Pros: Beautiful Picture, High resolution photographs look spectacular using USB interface, lots of cool little featuresCons: PiP almost worthless, USB does not play MPEG videos, wheel remote lags to the point it is almost useless, Infolink does not deliver all RSS feeds, only those preset by samsung (why?).

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Joe Hank
Reviews.Content: I got this from Amazon two weeks ago, and it is fantastic.  I bought a Blu-Ray player and upgraded my satellite to HD.  I use an Onkyo Home Theater System.  Everything works great.  The picture is amazing.  I'm happy.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Content: Had a 35 inch Sony flat screen.  Was replaced with this 46 inch unit.  From what I can tell, all flat panel units don't do as well producing the exact picture. Neither does this one.But, this 46 inch unit does a great picture.  Love it.Excellent service by delivery.  Can't ask for more.

Reviews.Title: Great TV with amazing pic quality and a lot of features
Reviews.Author: Nagendran Thampi
Reviews.Content: I ordered this just before christmas and received it in the first week of January.  This TV produces great results out of the box.  I didn't make much changes to the settings and still the picture quality is great.  The sound quality is not that great.  But, I don't think that is such a big deal, because, you need to have a home theater system when you buy a TV like this.  Over all a great product worth every penny.  So far, it has been performing great.

Reviews.Title: All that I read it was!!
Reviews.Author: K. Wilson "sirchan"
Reviews.Content: I did probably two months of research before I purchased this tv.  I knew it was either going to be the Samsung 46" 650 or a Sony XBR6.  I previously owned a Sony lcd and I always said that that would be the brand I would stick with.  After reading many reviews and magazines, the only thing left was to go check out both lcds in the store.  Let me tell you, the Samsung picture blew me away!  This tv is all that the reviews said it was.  Amazon did a great job with the delivery. Colors literally pop off the screen and the black levels are amazing.  Blu-rays like Dark Knight, King Kong and Kung Fu Panda look incredible!  I can't say enough about the picture and hooked up with my 7.1 Onkyo system, I'm loving it!

Reviews.Title: Stellar product and service !
Reviews.Author: Selective Shopper
Reviews.Content: Beautiful television. Excellent picture. Easy to set up. Quick Delivery. Whole experience exceeded expectations. Gotta love Amazon! I also bought the 5 year Samsung extended warrantee through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture
Reviews.Author: lappadappa
Reviews.Content: Our first LCD TV and we picked a winner.  The picture is absolutely beautiful, crisp and clear.  I wondered if the touch of red around the perimeter of the screen would be a distraction, but quite the opposite.  It really is quite attractive, and blends in well with the picture.  Just barely noticable.  Easy remote, but honestly I use the multi-purpose cable box remote more often.  In terms of quality: after researching the many available brands, it seemed clear that Samsung was always among the highest rated.I bought this the evening of Dec 22 and it was delivered the morning of Dec 26, with standard (free) shipping.  Amazing!  Also, the 6 months same as cash has made it quite attractive.  In Kentucky, sales tax (6%)IS applied to the purchase price (maybe because Amazon has several big shipping facilities here), so I didn't really save anything there...still a much better deal than Best Buy or the now-defunct Circuit City.One tip: no matter the LCD TV you choose, make sure and get the HD Package from your cable provider.  I know this sounds like a no-brainer, but for those of us not accustomed to HD...it is UNBELIEVABLE.  Almost like 3-D especially with sporting events.  Good luck and ENJOY!

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Blue Ray
Reviews.Content: Great TV. Best in the lot. 6 series has many features. definetely recommended if price is not a big issue.

Reviews.Title: My first LCD TV
Reviews.Author: William Cordaro "Senior citizens rock"
Reviews.Content: Product is well designed. It is easy to use the menu and the picture quality is excellent. Samsung had good reviews in consumer reports an is one of the resons I was willing to buy this over the internet. At the time I purchasced this Tv, Amazon had the best price so it was a no brainer for me.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Beautiful Picture
Reviews.Author: juj
Reviews.Content: What can I say about this TV that hasn't already been said. It arrived on time and in good condition. Even though my old TV was a 40 inch tube Sony Wega with a blurry picture, it doesn't disqualify me from saying that the picture quality of the Samsung 46 inch TV is stunning. I bought a $62 Toshiba upverting DVD player locally to go along with it. I also have a XBox 360, Wii, and a standard definition DirecTV connected to it. All do very well. I was worried that a standard definition signal would look terrible, but as long as you keep the picture setting at 4:3, it looks great. I have an HD DVR on order. Just another week and a half a way. I can't wait to watch hockey in HD.Only negative that I can see is if you have more than one standard RCA connection device and no surround sound receiver, you will need some kind of converter or switch since the TV has only one standard RCA (white, red, yellow) connection.Folks, I saved $600 buying from Amazon over the best local price. High Quality and great price. How can you go wrong?

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: It's GREAT......Great picture, Terrific HD, easy to use remote.....still figuring out all the terrific gadgets.  Love it with my Playstation 3 and the Blu Ray Player...It's almost like watching TV in 3D.  Love it...Love it...Love it!!!!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: MN DIY'er
Reviews.Content: This TV is fantastic.  Picture is great - glare is not really an issue either with our big picture window or 2 lamps on the opposite wall.  We are thrilled with this TV!!

Reviews.Title: Great LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: R. Chew
Reviews.Content: The Samsung was delivered ahead of schedule.  Kudos to Amazon!  The setup was quick and easy.  The picture is absolutely amazing.  I can't wait to add a blueray player.  I would highly recommend this unit!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Touch of Color LCD TV
Reviews.Author: John T. O'Connor
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with the Samsung 46" Touch of Color A650 TV. The price, delivery and set-up was excellent. I would recommend the TV and Amazon.com to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Amazon up, White Glove down
Reviews.Author: Fred A. Pfeffer
Reviews.Content: After watching the prices on Amazon for over a month, I ordered the Samsung 650. I thought I oredred it through Amazon. I realized a few hours later that I had ordered it through a third party. This would have negated my two years no interest with my Amazon credit card. Amazon was very helpful the next day in guiding me through the proper method to cancel that order. A week later I reordered through Amazon. You have to be carfull to watch that little box on the Amazon web page that says sold and shipped by Amazon. Sometimes that changes to a third party. I just wasn't paying attention. I was not very impressed with the white glove delivery by CEVA. It was just one man. I had to help him with it once he got to the door. Once he got the TV out of the box, he bear hugged it to put it on my TV table. With his coat making contact with the screen. I think the screen was still wrapped, but I'm not sure. In any event, I think he could have handled it better. He just seemed like he was in a big hurry to get to his next stop. He did plug it in to make sure it was working. One to five stars, I'd give him a two. I love the TV. I was very satisfied with Amazon. The delivery guy delivered the tv. But without the white gloves.

Reviews.Title: The best picture of all HD LCD TVs I've seen
Reviews.Author: M. Lawhorn
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV from Amazon several months ago so I've had plenty of time to check it out and compare it with several other new sets purchased by friends and family.As a graphic artist I work with color on a daily basis and was immediately impressed with Samsungs picture quality when I compared it with other major brands at local retailers.I really couldn't be happier with my choice. There are plenty of connections and the sound quality using the HDMI cable to my surround reciever is outstanding.This was my first major purchase from Amazon and initially I was hesitant to purchase on-line and have a large item shipped in but after negotiating with local retailers, the best I could do was still nearly $300.00 higher than Amazon's price which included shipping. My wait was short and the "white glove" service was great. Everything was carried in, unpacked and checked out to my satisfaction before they had me sign off on the delivery sheet.You can't go wrong with this TV and Amazon.com

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased With My Amazon Purchase
Reviews.Author: Stephen D. Frankum
Reviews.Content: As a 69 year old guy not too well versed in television technology, I was apprehensive about a big cost item for a HDTV, never having one before.So, I did quite a bit of research in advance online and in consumer reports.For example: [...]. Happily, I believe I made the right choice, buying the Samsung LN46A650 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with the Red Touch of Color and through Amazon which was by far less expensive than anywhwere including military base exchanges.Great picture, a beautiful piece of work all around.The red is barely noticeable and I wonder why it's even mentioned in the Samsung ads as buying "red" could be a turnoff. So far no operation problems.Steve in San Diego

Reviews.Title: good purchase
Reviews.Author: R. Stone
Reviews.Content: I did quite a bit of research before I bought this.  The last LCD I had was 1.5 years old before it started to shadow really bad (toshiba 42").  I narrowed my search to the Sony Bravia, LG, and Samsung.  This product seemed to be comparable to the Sony but more affordable and just a little better than the LG at the same price.I also bought a new Samsung home theater and the systems work seamlessly together.  I think it is best to match products to minimize remotes and maximize functionality.If you are not used to this level of clarity and refresh rate it takes a little time to get used to seeing it.  Once you get comfortable with it, you will love it.

Reviews.Title: 46 inch flat screen Samsung
Reviews.Author: Sandra Franks "minister"
Reviews.Content: We received the tv quickly, had a very favorable experience with delivery and set up.  The picture is clear, bright and of exceptional quality.  It is everything I hoped it would be.  Very positive experience.

Reviews.Title: Very happy!
Reviews.Author: Sunnyboy
Reviews.Content: New Samsung TV works great.  Is everything promised.  Delivery was right on time.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Quality, AnyNet+ Needs work
Reviews.Author: Christopher A. Bevers "ChrisB"
Reviews.Content: The picture quality and ease of use is wonderful, just as expected.  The only issue for me is that I purchase all samsung products (BluRay and Reciever/Amp) so that I could use the AnyNet+ system which allows the control of all the products with one remote.  It works, but it is flaky at times, not connecting, saying "mode not supported" etc.  Hopefully Samsung will upgrade the firmware on this and get it working 100%, right now it is about 80% there.

Reviews.Title: JUST BUY IT
Reviews.Author: DON304
Reviews.Content: STOP RESEARCHING, JUST BUY IT. I WASTED THREE MONTHS BEFORE I BOUGHT THIS GREAT TV. COULD NOT BE HAPPIER. I'LL BUY ANOTHER ONE WHEN I SAVE SOME MORE MONEY.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46" LCD TV
Reviews.Author: RV Handyman "Al"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV in December 2008 and it was delivered about 1 week before it was scheduled.  The delivery man brought the TV in the house and helped set it on the stand.  He was very conscientious about having me inspect the shipping carton before we opened it up.This TV is everything it was touted to be.  It was very easy to setup.  I checked the firmware and found that it had the newest update already installed.  I really like the remote with its lighted buttons and its relatively large buttons.  It is also lighted but can be turned off with a button on the remote.  Amazon's service was also appreciated.

Reviews.Title: Impressive HDTV but,
Reviews.Author: T. A. Wilder Jr.
Reviews.Content: I've enjoyed this set since December 23, and have found the picture to be excellent. However, the sound system leaves something to be desired and is the only disappointment I have. I originally was disappointed with this set, but my problem was reception from Dish network. I tried to go to Dish Turbo and was denied because I was told it was for new customers only. I now have Directv with HD channels and the picture is excellent. The Amazon delivery was excellent with the driver bringing the set into my house and setting it on my stand. Amazon is OK, but if I had waited until the following morning after I ordered, The price was $40 cheaper..I'm very satisfied with Amazon service and this excellent HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely gorgeous TV.
Reviews.Author: G. Peralez "Skynex"
Reviews.Content: I can't really think of any new great things to say about this tv that haven't already been said.  It looks amazing, I love this tv, and it's worth every penny.  My only complaint about the tv, is that sometimes when I'm playing my xbox and have my headphones plugged in and I switch to watching a movie on my xbox 360 the sound will start coming out of the tv speakers and the headphones.  I don't know why it does this, but I'm not too concerned with this because my living situation that makes me use headphone as to not disturb my roommates is temporary.  Just something I felt other people might want to know.  I still love this tv, and wouldn't return it at all.As for the cheap remote everyone is talking about, I don't mind it all that much.  The scroll wheel can be a little difficult to use if your not used to it.  I kind of like it, although I will be replacing it with a Logitech Harmony 890 when my gf moves in because she won't be able to figure out the army of remotes I have for the living room.I was a little disappointed with the white glove delivery though.  I got the email from CEVA telling me to contact them to setup an appointment for delivery, which was ahead of schedule, so I was very excited.  We setup of the appointment for the next day between 9am and 2pm.  They also told me that they would call 30 minutes before they showed up.  I get a call the next morning around 11 from my roommate saying my tv was delivered already.  No call from CEVA.  I get home and its sitting in the box unopened.  What happened to the call and unboxing it and setting it up before signing?  But The tv was perfect anyways, so it's all good.  Man I love this tv.  Still way cheaper then buying from a brick and mortar store.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Z. Balaporia
Reviews.Content: The TV is awesome.  Great picture and great features.  Just a word of caution on the "white glove delivery" service.  Don't expect much.  I had to help the guy unpack the TV and lift it into place.  I don't mind that.  I just wished he hadn't tracked snow into the house and onto the carpet.  But back the the TV, I love it.  Got the DLNA features working pretty easily too.

Reviews.Title: Good Looking TV
Reviews.Author: RL Johnson
Reviews.Content: This is a sleek and well-designed television that I recommend highly, with a few minor caveats. First, the TV looks great in the room. It wastes no space, its glossy black finish is sharp, and its lines are sleek. As for the touch-of-red color, this is a very, very subtle effect that adds a small touch of distinction. I would not hesitate to purchase this TV based on any concerns about the Touch of Color feature.When you are seated directly in front of the set, the picture quality is outstanding. As you move off to an angle, the color saturation begins to deteriorate, as is common with LCD screens.The connectivity is generally excellent, with 4 HDMI inputs. The only criticism I have regarding connectivity is relevant only if you have older components that require using S-Video or RCA cables: the TV has only one S-Video/RCA input and it is on the side, rather than tucked neatly away in the back.Regarding sound, the internal speakers are acceptable and the sound output does a good job of sending audio signal to external amplifiers. My only criticism here is the odd way in which changing the volume requires repeated taps of the remote's volume button. Unlike with other TVs, you can't just press and hold the volume button until it reaches the desired level. Instead, you must press the volume button repeatedly, as the volume increases or decreases by a single digit with each press.Other than the odd volume control, the remote works well. Although I agree with other reviewers that the wheel control is finicky and a bit annoying, the remote is designed so that you don't really need to use the wheel, which operates controls that can be navigated easily with regular directional buttons placed around the wheel. The on-screen menu is reasonably intuitive and allows one to navigate an array of picture settings that is both impressive and potentially overwhelming. I recommend that you start with the excellent calibrated settings offered by CNET (go to [...]) rather than the factory defaults, and then make adjustments to your taste.Finally, Amazon's delivery was efficient and as promised. Overall, this is an excellent product and well worth a purchase if you can get it for about $1500 or less.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: KF
Reviews.Content: I looked for over a month to find the perfect TV for my house, and I settled on this Samsung because it has all of the features that people say are important (1080p, over 40 inches, 120 Hz) and it was a great price because it's not the most recent model.  The picture quality is fantastic, and I was able to set it up easily because the manual was well-written and provided clear explanations of the features.The 120 Hz was a feature I had been told was vital for watching sports, and that is true, it makes it seem like I am on the field with them. But I would have liked to have been told that it makes movies and some TV shows look "too real" and they appear like soap operas or BBC shows.  That's an easy fix however, if you just turn the 120 Hz off when you want to watch movies.I love this TV, and I am very happy with getting it from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650 Review
Reviews.Author: Robert Dooley "rdooley"
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with our purchase of the Samsung LCD TV.  The picture is awesome.  The delivery was very fast.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Texas Time
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV, I am not a techie so I am going to skip that part and go to the fluff part. First of all I have  west French doors with a transom window over it. I do not have a glare issue in the daytime, afternoon ever unless I completely open the French doors and the sunlight is flowing in. With the doors closed and the blinds partially opened I am not having any kind of glare issues. I nearly bought the 630 instead of the 650 because of my west window but I liked the features of the 650 better. I am very happy I chose the 650, no glare issues. Now about delivery. Amazon shipped on a Friday, CEVA called me on Tuesday and delivered Wednesday. The delivery was perfect, they called a half hour before arriving. They removed the TV from the box and attached it to my cable box for me. Perfect delivery, I didn't have to pay tax and all my friends are jealous of my new TV.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Picture
Reviews.Author: xgasman
Reviews.Content: Easiest setup of any TV we have purchased, connected cables from DVR, plugged it in, selected type of input and we are viewing our shows.Every seat in the room has a clear astonishing view of the program or movie we have on. Went from a 36" 4x3 aspect tube type TV and the results are amazing.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Lois E. Wilson
Reviews.Content: I researched many TV's before purchasing this set.  I am totally pleased with this product.  It has a great picture, was very easy to set up and to learn to use.  Perfect size for my room and needs.  The price was excellent, lower than any other place I saw this set, especially with the free shipping.  I am totally pleased with this unit and everything about it.  I would recommend this TV to anyone who is looking to buy a new unit.L.Wilson

Reviews.Title: Len
Reviews.Author: Len ShulmanTalon Enterprises
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of ColorDelivery and installation went smooth. The picture is the best I have ever seen on an LCD TV.I am very pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Better than Sony
Reviews.Author: John G. Kuldau "hipshotman"
Reviews.Content: This really is a nice TV.  I have a 40" Sony Bravia, and the picture of the Samsung is better, and its less expensive.  Occassional artifacts with really quick motion, but overall, I am very, very happy with the TV.  Amazon was great as well.  They delivered and set up the TV for me, which was a nice touch.  Just click the mouse and a week or so later - your TV shows up.

Reviews.Title: Just amazing.
Reviews.Author: C. Bruckmann
Reviews.Content: This TV is just amazing.  The clarity of the picture watching the NFL playoff games this weekend was stunning.  Looks great even in my family room which gets tons of sun.  My neighbor has a 52" from a different company, and has admitted he is jealous of my 46" b/c the picture is so much better.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46-inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Austin Bear
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful product.  Extra clear picture and no problems so far.  We are very pleased.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG
Reviews.Author: Y. Pichette
Reviews.Content: What a great picture! I spoke around and did some research and found this model (650 series) to offer the best picture of any tested HD TV.Glad I waited, like sitting at the game.

Reviews.Title: Simply Amazing at Amazon
Reviews.Author: Looking For Samsung
Reviews.Content: I researched this TV at Best Buy ($1900), Circuit City ($1600), and Sears ($1900).  I also read the previous reviews and researched the set on line.  It has every possible top of the line feature I was looking for  -- 120 Mhz, 1080p, 4ms, and a 50,000:1 contrast ratio.  My only concern was purchasing the set on Amazon and being uncertain about the delivery.  Granted it took longer to receive the TV this way, but there was NO delivery charge (no delivery hassle) and no taxes are paid when you purchase on line (taxes are to be paid at time of tax filing).  Since I was in no hurry I decided to purchase the set and it was a great experience.  NO HASSLES.  I purchased on Jan. 3 and on Jan. 9 (not expected until Jan 13), I was watching a beautiful picture on the 46" Samsung screen.  Just in time for the NFL playoff games!  This is a great LCD TV and I would not hesitate to purchase from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: We like it
Reviews.Author: Leo Liebl
Reviews.Content: This Samsung was rated top of the line in Consumers Report.  It really is.  I've been an electronic technician for 60 years and it produces video and audio like I've been trying to achieve for all that time.  The technology is finally here in HD to accomplish that.The price from Amazon was just about the best in price comparisons.  The only thing that didn't make us happy was the delivery guy.  The sheet said he was supposed to unpack and remove the packing.  He was a little late and didn't want me to state the time on the delivery sheet and didn't offer to unpack it.  Apparently not the fault of Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A560
Reviews.Author: Laurie R. Hallman
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with this LCD.  We also have a Sony XBR5 that we purchased 11 months prior.  I think the Samsung is right up there with the Sony.  I have not had any issues with the remote control like other reviewers have shared.The White Glove Delivery by Amazon absolutely rocks!  Two guys brought in the TV, set it up on a shelf for me, connected it to my cable box, waited until it came up and programed it so it would work with the cable box.  Then they showed me how to work the remote.  They couldn't have been more professional if they tried!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture
Reviews.Author: L. Olszewski
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with this television.  We started out to buy a Sony and found out that this tv has the same great contrast ratio as the Sony XBR which costs at least $700 more than this one. So far we have been problem free and can't say enough about this 46 in Samsung

Reviews.Title: Fantastic picture, sound and quality
Reviews.Author: J. Yokum
Reviews.Content: Purchasing this 46" television was the first large purchase I have ever made on a piece of electronics.  I accomplished much research prior to the purchase and was extremely satisfied.  The picture and sound quality are phenomenal for the price I paid.  The "Touch of Red" color is barely noticeable if that is a concern for you.  Samsung definitely has an edge on the market by offering this tv at such a low price.

Reviews.Title: LN46A650 -- worth the extra money over the LN46A550
Reviews.Author: A. J. Angus "Neo"
Reviews.Content: To put it simply, this TV is excellent. I have had it for the past few weeks and I have no complaints at all about it. My decision was between the A650 and the A550. I had read various reviews about both of them, but I didn't know if the A650 was worth the extra $300 or so at the time. I ended up initially buying the A550. It was great for everything except for sports. The lack of the 120Hz Auto Motion Plus really makes a big difference for sports. For everything else, general TV watching, DVDs/Blu-Rays, and PS3 action, I had no problems. So if you're going to be doing any major sports watching, I would DEFINITELY recommend getting the A650. Or you will end up like me buying the A550 and returning it a few days later. Check for bargains on Amazon's Warehouse Deals site. I ended up buying a refurbished A650 that was only $100 more than a brand new A550. Definitely worth it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing HDTV
Reviews.Author: Peter Eisenmann
Reviews.Content: I read, researched, waited, saved $, and finally decided on this HDTV on Christmas Day (Santa gave me some Christmas money). I have no regrets. Everyone in the family is excited about the set.I love the quality of digital TV signal for sports. The 120hz and 4ms rates leave no blur and the detail is fantastic. I can't wait to upgrade my old Sony AV receiver and DVD player. I am running the signal through component cables and am happy with the  DVD player - I will be upgrading to a Blu-ray player later in the year and will use the HDMI inputs.The Wii that my wife plays looks great with optional component cables attached (I got mine through eforcity here on Amazon for a few bucks - much less that the name brand cables). The detail is blazing and Guitar Hero rocks.The amount and type of inputs is more than sufficient and allows for a LARGE variety of components to be hooked up.To top it all off I am using a logitech harmony remote (ordered here at Amazon last year) to control all of the components. It is so smooth and easy to go from watching TIVO, playing Wii, watching a DVD, watching TV, listening to my iPod, or using a DVD/R - VCR player. Life is good!I hung the set with a Cheetah mount found here on Amazon and it looks great! I have a review there if you are interested.Last thought - the White Glove service was excellent for me. I took the initiative and called the local hub (get the number from the cevalogistics.com web site) and had a contact already in the loop BEFORE the unit shipped. I work for a major shipper and would not trust them with this type of item. Use the white glove service!

Reviews.Title: Extremely nice TV and easy to use out of the box
Reviews.Author: J. Grosz "JWG"
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LN52A650 52-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of Color is the best TV I have owned, and my 2nd HD TV.  The TV worked out of the box with easy and convenient setup (took less than 5 minutes to plug everything in.After initial setup of time and such, default colors were better than the customized setting on my other TV (including another HDTV).  I typically us AVS forums to get good color settings and haven't even bothered with this TV.120Hz processing has not created any noticeable screen jutter than I can see or tell, nor could my brother-in-law when watching with me.  HD sports look absolutely amazing.Some people complain about the glossy screen and light reflection in a bright room.  Unless the sun is shinning into the room through the window directly, this has not been a problem.  And what little there is has been no worse than any other TV I've owned.The preset Entertainment settings for audio and video are also easy to use from the remote and good settings.  It makes it nice to easily change from a bright daylit room to a darker room by switching to/from the Cinema/Movie setting and not having to do custom changes in the settings menu.The ability to customize audio/video settings for each independent input is also nice.  It allows you to customize to the source which depending on if it is a game system, DVD player, etc. may vary your desired settings.The picture quality is also very strong, at 52" and 1080p I lose most if not all screen door effect after moving 3-4 feet from the TV.  The newslink feature to get local weather and news through USA Today is a nice plus, but one I don't use since we get the same features from DirecTV plus their on Demand service.I have been extremely pleased with this set overall and would definitely buy another Samsung TV.  It was also rated #1 overall LCD by Consumer Reports and received very high ratings by cNet - I would definitely agree with them.WHITE GLOVE DELIVERY:I also had an exceptional experience with Pilot who was Amazon's delivery partner.  Once I received my tracking number from Amazon I was able to easily send an e-mail to Pilot asking them to call a specific # to schedule delivery.  I was able to do this right from Pilot's website.  They returned the call within 24 hours and had great options availble for accepting delivery.  Once shipped, the TV was to Pilot within 3 days and could have been to my house within 4-5 if I'd wanted earlier delivery.They also, as promised, unboxed the set placed it where we wanted it and offerred to take the box, which we chose to keep.  They were not able to fire the TV up due to cold temperatures, but would have if they could have.Overall, a great buy and great purchasing experience.  I was hesitant to purchase such a large high price item online, but couldn't have been happier.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Craig Harris
Reviews.Content: Before setting it up, I thought the TV might be a little large, but it is amazing how quickly you get used to the size.  The first day after putting it up, the kids had clicked on Harry Potter 5, and when I walked in the room, the courtroom scene was going on.  It looked like I was watching a play.  My 16-year-old actually thought it was a bit freaky.  (Of course, you cannot tear her away from it.  Go do your homework, Chelsea!)  We got it with a Panasonic home theater, and put it on a raised stand so that it can swivel.  It is absolutely wonderful!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Lime away "DJ"
Reviews.Content: I did a ton of research before purchasing this 46inch TV. Basically came down to this or the Panasonic 850 series plasma; I just found the screen too reflective on the plasma, and (to me at least) the pixels seemed more visible / less smooth.Anyway, the Tv came via Amazon's white glove service, and the delivery man was very pleasant and helpful in getting it set up and moving the old tv to another room.In terms of appearance and performance I couldn't be happier; this is a great quality television. Before I had DirecTv's HD service hooked up, I was a little worried since the quality of the Tv highlighted the flaws in the standard def signal, but as soon as I put in a DVD (not even Blue-ray at that point) I was blown away. One week later HD was set up, and I will never look back!!There are a bunch of other features that I plan on utilizing at a later date (like hooking it up to the internet and my computer). I'll update this when I do.Trust me when I say that you will not be disappointed with this TV!!

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: L. CHEN
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN52A650 52-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of ColorSamsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of Color

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: KarenS
Reviews.Content: This is my first HDTV but the picture is spectacular and I think the sound quality is great.  We have had the TV for 2 weeks and we are incredibly happy with it.When comparing we looked at a Vizio and Sharp I am very happy we went with the Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Worth it
Reviews.Author: Shashi Putturao
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying the high quality pictures on this HDTV. Add ons like anynet and connecting usb media directly to HDTV is really cool.Only thing I didnot like is the quality of sound. Treble is ok but bass is really low. I am still trying to see if I can explore it a bit more and see I can get a better sound.Overall this HDTV is great and I am happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV but sometimes it freezes
Reviews.Author: Chastity Richardson
Reviews.Content: I've had this tv for about two weeks now and it's great. This is my first time ordering from Amazon and it was a pleasant experience.  However, I've noticed lately that at times the tv will freeze and I have to change the channel to get it right again. Does anyone know if this is an issue with the tv or with the cable? Has anyone else had this issue? Just wondering because if it's the tv, I want to return it before my time is up. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Extremely happy with this purchase and white glove delivery
Reviews.Author: S. Curry "Shushane"
Reviews.Content: Extremely happy with this purchase and white glove delivery. Ordered on Tuesday night CEVA called Sunday afternoon and offered to deliver it that next day I was unavailable that day so I had it delivered the Wednesday before thanksgiving. WOW!!!! what a amazing picture out the box.  Tweaked a few things and I am very pleased with the performance and picture of this set.Amazon customer service is excellent. Several days after I ordered this they had a Samsung 1500 Blu-Ray player promotion. I asked if they could extend this offer to my order since I have yet to take delivery of my TV.They told me to go ahead and order it using my Credit Card and they would refund me within 3 business days. I did as they asked and I was credited within 24 hours.  I would definitely use Amazon again for this type purchase.

Reviews.Title: HD tv
Reviews.Author: Patricia J. Eschwie "peej53"
Reviews.Content: LOVE my Samsung HD tv, the clarity and size of the picture make for an incredible viewing experience.  I would recommend this tv to anyone.

Reviews.Title: HD at last
Reviews.Author: R. E. Jodoin "physicist"
Reviews.Content: This LCD HDTV is excellent.  We had an old 50" projection set, but the higher resolution makes an incredible difference.  I compared several brands, and the Samsung has as good or better a picture than every one I've seen.  One bit of advice - don't spend big bucks on an HDMI cable.  You can find them for under $30 and they work perfectly fine.

Reviews.Title: Just Awesome
Reviews.Author: B. Brigadier
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from a 32" Olevia to the 46" Samsung TOC and I am just blown away at the quality of the picture.  Both SD and HD signals look very impressive on this set.The shipping for this was very fast.  I ordered it on Black Friday and about five days later I received a call that it was ready to be delivered to my home.  CEVA was the delivery service, and they carried it up to my apartment, unboxed it, set it on my stand and they waited for me to power it on to confirm all was ok, just as the White Glove service advertised.  I was very satisfied with the delivery service, however, they do not deliver on Saturdays as I was led to believe.

Reviews.Title: Very nice 46 inch LCD Video
Reviews.Author: William J. Donohue
Reviews.Content: More than happy with my new Samsung TV. Very good picture, easy to setup , easy to use in conjunction with Home Theater system.  Free delivery was prompt and they took it out of the box and placed it where I wanted it and made sure it worked before they left.  No problems making a purchase like this on the internet.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Mayo
Reviews.Content: Could not be happier with the product or the supplier.  Amazon.com charged a competitive price with no delivery charge.  No one locally could beat the deal.  TV was delivered several days ahead of promised delivery date.  I would recommend this product and supplier to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Preliminary review is good, but...
Reviews.Author: Patsfan "Patsfan"
Reviews.Content: So I got my new Samsung today. Service from online purchase to delivery was excellent. CEVA called me yesterday and delivered the TV today, which is great. I won't have my high def. cable until Tuesday, so I can't really judge the picture yet. I'm also getting a Sony PS3 shortly.Here's the problem. Upon initial inspection, the TV looked clean. However, after CEVA left, I inspected the TV frame and screen close up with a flashlight, and there are micro scratches all around the frame. There is even a small scratch on the screen, but it is not perceptible with the TV on. I may have Amazon replace the TV.I'll update this review once I have my high def set up.Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of Color

Reviews.Title: Flawless TV and Delivery
Reviews.Author: L. south
Reviews.Content: Got it for a great price and the shipping to Nashville was flawless. The TV is amazing! Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: NKC, MO
Reviews.Content: This TV is excellent and price on Amazon was excellent as well.  Read several reviews discussing "halo" issue and glare issues but I have experienced neither and my room is fairly bright during the day due to the number of windows.Picture quality is excellent and to me is better than similar sized TVs I have viewed of other brands.I was cautious about such a large purchase being shipped, but the shipping was great. I ordered the TV the Saturday before Thanksgiving and the shipping company Amazon uses called me Wed night to schedule delivery on Friday - several days ahead of the projected delivery date.  I would recommend this TV as well as ordering through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: meets all our expectations
Reviews.Author: Keely "inkster"
Reviews.Content: After a ton of meticulous research -- okay, reading loads of online reviews, and visiting stores -- I decided this was the TV for us, a family who loves watching movies cartoons and playing Wii.We went with Amazon, because, free shipping and no tax and the best price made it a no brainer.It arrived earlier than promised, the white glove delivery was perfect, set up was easy and the picture isreally amazing. The only problem is HD is so much better than regular TV you become addicted to all the HD channels! the Science channel is now my eight year olds favorite, which I guess is not such a bad thing.Seriously if you are after something that looks really sleek, yet unobtrusive, with great picture quality and easy set up, choose this TV!

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: Juan Enriquez
Reviews.Content: Replaced a Vizio VO47lf which I though has awesome PQ, I cant believe how much better this set is. I researched all Samsung LCD TV this one is by far the best value!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: De Marco Santana "Ralph 555"
Reviews.Content: Prior to buying this TV, I did a lot of research.  I compared Sony to Samsung, the 2 major & popular brands: I found that Samsung offered higher contrast (50000:1) compared to Sony, which offered (30000:1); however, Sony offered true colors but it cost much more!  I have had this TV for 2 months now and experienced no problems with the shut off issue as Samsung and other buyers described.

Reviews.Title: Great set and viewing angles
Reviews.Author: P. Adam
Reviews.Content: This set is the perfect size.  I was concerned about the viewing angles since we have the set surrounded with seating, but the picture is the same quality from every angle.  I only wish that the stand were a little lower, but that might impact the sound with the speakers on the bottom.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: T. Steiner
Reviews.Content: I did my homework on this TV and thought this was the best quality TV for the money.I was right! The picture is great and the price I got from Amazon was as low as any other company on-line. It was shipped to the house with no problems. The picture is so clear it is hard to quit watching this television. I am looking forward to buy many other big ticket items through Amazon ( I love their free shipping and no sales tax).

Reviews.Title: A satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: S. Scott
Reviews.Content: I read reviews on other products, specifically Sony and decided to go with the Samsung 46 inch model 650 TV. Ordered with the Samsung BD-1500 as a package.I installed the product using the colored easy to follow guides without any problems and got the perfect picture etc. The reviews that had problems did not happen with my installation. The red touch of color is minor and does not light up, hardly noticable. The reflection on the screen is only when the Tv is off, no problem! Buying from Amazon was a easy great price deal all the way to receiving the product, I will buy from them in the future because of there Customer Service.

Reviews.Title: Just buy it
Reviews.Author: NCshopper "Dave"
Reviews.Content: This tv is awesome! I just got my hd satellite receiver hooked up today and the picture is amazing. Don't worry about how a standard def station will look though, I've been watching it for a week and it still looks great. This tv looks beautiful just sitting there not even turned on! Like other reviewers have said, the touch of red blends nicely and looks very good. If you have any hesitation buying a high dollar item from Amazon, don't. They always have a lower price on most anything you want to buy, the shipping is fast and no tax is a huge plus. I had my tv in one week. I can't comment on the delivery service because I just told them to deliver it to my office. It was packaged very well and the box was in perfect shape. If you have been researching tv's for a while like I have, don't wait any longer. This is the tv to get and the current price is hard to beat. If you have been considering the A530 or A550, don't do it unless you just can't afford this one. The 120hz, 4ms and 50,000:1 contrast is such an upgrade for a few hundred dollars more. I'm glad I talked myself into it.Update 1-12-09 I watched the Christmas day parade and the New Years parade with the dynamic setting turned on which also enables the digital natural enhancement setting. Like a few other reviewers have said, you can see a bead of sweat on a persons face. The detail and color was incredible! You may as well have been there in person. I am very pleased with this tv!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: siguy
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV and Samsung BD-P1500 Blue Ray Player together. Simply put...great price, fast delivery, easy set-up, perfect picture right out of the box. Can't come up with anything negative to say about it. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Amazing
Reviews.Author: J. Young
Reviews.Content: Everything about the 6 series is amazing.  First, the shipping was light years quicker than expected.  I had my tv by the end of the same week in which I ordered it and they were there when they said they would be.  I was speechless when I first plugged this TV and remain that way a month later.The ease of use is the factor that I appreciate the most and least expected.  I don't have to worry about manually messing with which resolution or aspect ratio the screen should be set on for a particular source (cable, gaming system, Blu-ray) because it does it for me.  I just turn it on and enjoy.  It also did a good job at auto-programming the channels and finding my over the air local HD channels without hassle.You really can't go wrong purchasing this 6 series.

Reviews.Title: The best selling TV
Reviews.Author: V. Ivanov "tech savvy"
Reviews.Content: Excellent LCD!!! It's the best selling LCD for last few months, with reason. Picture is excellent with everything I have connected to it.Has a special, brighter than other brands screen. The specks are the best available also. Don't see a reason to buy the 7 or 8 series Samsung for lot extra $, they have the same picture, just some more info links...But come on, who looks for info on his tv- that's why we have computers!Highly recommend! If you have more cash, consider also Samsung LN52A650 or LG52G60(70).

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46 LNA A650 HDTV LCD
Reviews.Author: Michael Kellum
Reviews.Content: This television is absolutely beautiful. The picture is crystal clear. Would highly recommend. The speakers are a little weak, but will be enhanced with a Home Theater System of your choice.

Reviews.Title: Great great great TV
Reviews.Author: Jon Lieberman
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. It has exceeded all of my expectations in picture quality, sound quality, ease of use, and even style.I would not hesitate to recommend a samsung tv to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Best Deal, best picture
Reviews.Author: dnk
Reviews.Content: Decided on the A650 46" after a lot of research comparing it with Sony, then ordered it before black Friday when Amazon basically threw a blue ray player in with it which made this the best deal around.  I had shipping issues which Amazon took care of without much hassle (Let's face it, you can't beat dealing with actual HUMAN customer service).  The TV did not disappoint, with really, really great picture.  The remote is a little tough to deal with, but not bad.  Had it almost 3 weeks and so far so good!  Xbox looks incredible, blue ray looks incredible..

Reviews.Title: Great picture! Sound could be better
Reviews.Author: S. Cherukuri
Reviews.Content: I just bought my 650 series TV (46") from Amazon and love the vibrant and stunning pictures this TV provides. My only reason for giving 4 stars is the sound. If you are going to watch sports and movies, you might want to use the receiver for the sound as the built-in speakers are really not up to snuff. The 120 HZ refresh rate is good to watch sports but occasionally, I do notice some blur but not to any major concern. Overall, I think 650 series provides value over 750 and 850 series TVs.

Reviews.Title: Rich
Reviews.Author: Good Will
Reviews.Content: I just went past the 30 day warrenty and I'm super pleased with this TV.Although I don't really use most of the options that it comes with I do like several that I do use. It's nice to have all the inputs and outputs available. I like the sound level equalizer. I use the different screen lighting options all the time. The remote is execellent. This is My first widescreen but I've watched several others by friends or relatives and this one is the next step up.

Reviews.Title: The BEST HDTV!
Reviews.Author: R. Duet "duetpebble"
Reviews.Content: Samsung delivers exactly what I have come to expect from them - the best looking picture at an affordable price. Everything about this TV is great, the way it looks, the picture and the easy setup.Rick

Reviews.Title: An Excellent LCD TV
Reviews.Author: John Q. "JQ"
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LN46A650 is a great TV! It is exactly as specified; there were no surprises. The box was delivered to the desired location upstairs in our house and unpacked by the "White Glove" delivery men. They tested it and offered to carry away the packing materials. The TV is beautiful to look at, on and off, and has an absolutely outstanding picture. We already have LCDs from Sony, Sharp and Dell, as well as a DLP from Samsung. While these are fine units, this Samsung is by far the best. In my opinion, Samsung is now the top brand of LCDs and, as far as TVs overall, is surpassed only by the Pioneer Elite Plasmas.Highly Recommended!

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: KS mom/grandma
Reviews.Content: We purchased the Samsung LN46A650 46 inch TV to replace a VIZIO we had purchased at a local retail store. The LCD screen on the VIZIO was in need of replacement after only 1 year. We have been extremely happy with the Samsung. Our guests comment on the wonderful picture. My husband and I were amazed at how easy it was to set up.  I would recommend this product to friends & family.

Reviews.Title: No Buyers Remorse Here
Reviews.Author: G. G. Husted
Reviews.Content: This TV, for lack of words, is outstanding.  When I first hooked it up I wasn't getting HD feeds through our satellite.  The picture was good alright.  Then I decided to try our broadcast HD channels.  An MSU football game was on.  And WOW.  Now that's a picture.  It's like looking out a window at the game.I like the way you can fill the whole screen with a picture without stretching the picture horizontally for non 16 to 9 feeds.  The touch of red bezel is not over whelming, and goes great in our room.  Which happens to be a deep red color.

Reviews.Title: satisfied with all aspects
Reviews.Author: Basil Dubrosky
Reviews.Content: Beautiful color, crisp HD picture with no glare.  Touch of color in the frame is very subtle and classy.  Purchased on Sunday and got delivered on Friday morning.  Ceva delivery called to arrange delivery and were on time and did a wonderful job unpacking and setting up the set.

Reviews.Title: Samsung series 650 LCD TV
Reviews.Author: James M. Pizzola "Jim P"
Reviews.Content: Have not had the product very long, but so far there has been no problems, just enjoyment.

Reviews.Title: Great experience
Reviews.Author: Capt D
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of Color I must say my experience with this LCD TV has been great.  It was very easy to install with two people.  The setup up was easy enough by  following the directions.  I am pleased with the picture and colors and the great sound.  With the experience I have had with this TV I would certainly recommend it to others.  I also need to mention the great price we paid on Amazon.  We saved $100's by buying on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: samsung 120Hz
Reviews.Author: Gistropod
Reviews.Content: This TV exceeds my expectations.  Automotion Plus feature looks like things are shot with a handicam!  Turned it off TV still displays in 120hz.  Great Buy and Amazon delivery was excellent.

Reviews.Title: Wow! fabulous product!!!
Reviews.Author: Neil Kingston "nk"
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv a week back; easy installation and auto tuned to the cable connection. Several HD Channels tuned up in addition to all other regular channels.Pros:Pretty amazing picture quality, particularly with HD Channels; exceeds our expectation. See to believe!Good sound quality.... and what more we want from a TV!ofcourse, all other supporting features very well meets our expectations.Cons:Impacts our mind and glues us to HD channels (even when we do not like the program much!)Thanks to Amazon for prompt order processing and delivering well within the stated timeline with free shipping.Thanks to Samsung for delivering such a wonderful classic product for us to enjoy.PS:Also, I purchased a "Bush Segments TV/DVD Video Stand" at walmart.com ... which blends beatifully for this TV.

Reviews.Title: Another Positive Review
Reviews.Author: hanzinator
Reviews.Content: I won't add a whole lot here because there are plenty of people who have given a  thorough review, but this is one great LCD.  So far I have no complaints and the picture is stunning.  I had no trouble with the delivery and everything went smoothly.  Get yourself a blu-ray player if you don't have one because watching a blu-ray on this tv is like watching actors through a window.  The detail is so great it is almost spooky.  Look no further.

Reviews.Title: Problem on Delivery
Reviews.Author: Lynn Sharp
Reviews.Content: I would have rated this product with 5 stars if it had arrived with no issues. We had to have the entire board replaced as it had a distortion through the speakers when the TV and DirecTV receiver were turned off together.The picture quality is fantastic and the service to replace the board was done immediately. I am very pleased with the TV and have no problem recommending it. I believe my problem was a very rare issue. This is my 2nd Samsung and I am very happy with both of them.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME HDTV COULD'NT ASK FOR MORE
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Navarrete
Reviews.Content: After a lot of research and reading about samsung HDTV i can say now that this is the TV i wanted for so long. I bought the LN46A650 on cyber monday thinking that the price was gonna go lower but it didnt, so i ordered online( early on monday) and got it on friday morning...wow it was very fast. They were very professional when they called to letting me know that they had the TV ready to deliver. I can just say that this tv ROCKS. The touch of color is amazing, the picture is so so good...in other words, this is the tv that you will be happy with. Thank you AMAZON you guys made a happy costumer.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Wonderful TV
Reviews.Author: J. Roest
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for about 24 hrs.  It is simply great, right out of the box.  I am watching Monday Night Football and it looks like the game is being played inside the TV!  As far as the glare issues go, I have a lamp directly behind me, facing the TV and I have no problems at all.  The TV has adjustments to compensate for the lighting.  If you are thinking about buying a new TV, you must get this one.  I have been watching on Amazon for about 3 weeks and got tired of them jacking around with the price, when I could drive downtown and get it for the same price.  Purchased at Circuit City for $1500 out the door and a 60 day price match guarantee.  I compared this TV's picture against the others in the store and it was hands down the best.  Happy watching.

Reviews.Title: You don't have to mill around with this set.  Just buy it.
Reviews.Author: Gregg M. McGlasson "Kingspiper"
Reviews.Content: I, like so many other guys (and gals), who before a major purchase do all the research.  Watch, listen or read anything about the product and reviews.  Wonder and worry about paying too much and the technoligical reliability or repair issues. Compare product after product looking for the best bang for the buck.  It took me over a year to finally decide to buy this TV.  I then waited a few months more, as I saw the price dropping.  BOTTOM LINE:  THIS TV ROCKS!The weight of the set is very light 49 lbs. if I remember correctly.  That helps when it's only me and my lovely 125 lbs. wife trying to move it around and attach it to the mounting system.The picture is fantastic.  I was very concerned about the glare issue others have raised, since I do have a rather large picture window in the room. Luckily it has not been a problem at the current angle the tv is set and I do not believe that it would be an issue anyway.  The picture can be set to higher lighting conditions and in my opinion it seems to compensate very well.The touch of red surrounding the screen is very elegant and exudes refinement. I spent a whole day reading through the 115 page manual trying out the different functions and just having a ball.SETUP: The box comes with some pop out plastic plugs at the bottome center.  Once removed the top slides up and off easily.  This is a great feature that bypasses box cutters and the stress of their deployment.We pulled off the mounting bolts from the back and measured up the new ones supplied with the mount. We bolted on the supports and proceeded to remove the stand. The bottom stand is a little stubborn to get off. By detaching four small screws at the bottom rear of the set you can disconnect it from the stand.  Use a magnetic screw driver with a phillips head since they are located in deeply recessed holes.  The last one would not come out until we lifted the set up to relieve the weight on the screw.  We replaced the hole left by the stand with a supplied cover that snapped in perfectly.  We the mounted the TV to the stand, connected the various HDMI (there are 4 ports, yes really 4 of them!) within a few minutes of setup menu's, we where watching the Mummy Returns on DirectTV in HD.Then the WOW's started. My wife walked in and said, "WOW!"  My teenagers each walked in and said, "WOW! Cool!"  And finally I said, "yeah, WOW!"I was very pleased.The only con to this whole experience was the CEVA logistics delivery.  I would tell them what time I was to be at home and they would show up at a completely different time when I was gone. It took me three days and several long tirades over the phone to get my shipment. They also left the packaging for me to dispose, disposal is supposed to be included with the "White Glove" service.  Oh well, I still am very, very pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV Purchase
Reviews.Author: bydarivr "Sandpiper"
Reviews.Content: Great service, TV received earlier than promised shipping date. I am very well pleased with this company.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Norm
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Samsung LN46A650 46" LCD TV from Amazon.com on November 12, 2008.  This is the best TV that I have ever owned.  Right out of the box with no adjustments, the picture was perfect. I received the television with the white glove delivery and it was as advertised.  The trucker called me the night before and showed up as promised. I am very satisfied with the television and would recommend it to anyone that is looking for a real nice unit.

Reviews.Title: SamSung 650
Reviews.Author: J. Breuer "JDB"
Reviews.Content: PRO:Everything looks great. Picture is great when using HDTV. I think better than any TV for this price. I paid only 1507 dollars with no tax and free shipping. I looked at Circuit City and Best Buy and they sell about $1899 to $2099 plus tax.CON: Only problem is the remote control. It has short battery life if you leave remote's light on. It happens three times for the past two weeks.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!  Service and TV
Reviews.Author: S. Little "lovelibros"
Reviews.Content: Read and re-read all reviews before I pulled the trigger on this set.  So glad I did.  CEVA was outstanding as far as delivery man and office personnel when I called about delivery...tv was delivered 6 days before Amazon said and this was during the holiday season!Picture is spectacular!  Had a problem with the audio completely shutting off on the tv; but, will call cable and hopefully will fix the problem.  Red bezel looks great and I don't have any reflection problems.  Remote is fine...Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: Lives up to all the hype
Reviews.Author: Peter Venetoklis
Reviews.Content: I did my research, both here and elsewhere, and bought this unit a few months ago.  Add me to the list of people who give it top honors - outstanding picture quality, outstanding functionality, all in a neat package.  The normally listed negatives - glossy screen, red colored frame - are non-issues for me.  I barely noticed the red color, and I have not had any situations where the reflectivity of the screen has diminished the image quality.  Terrific unit, so much so that I'm buying the 52" model.Some people have commented that some of the most in-depth reviews on this model look like they were written by the Samsung marketing department.  To them, and to those who might believe them, I say judge the product for yourselves before assuming that gushing reviews are fake.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: golf lady
Reviews.Content: After looking into a lot of LCD tv's I decided on the Samsung and I have always been a dedicated Sony person, but this tv is a very attractive one with a picture that is one of the best I have seen in the price range that won't empty your wallet. I have had many people at the house, and they have all said they can't believe how natural and clear the picture is.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: A solid purchase.  Excellent contrast and black levels.  Great delivery service although took over 1 week for tv to arrive and required a phone call to setup an appointment.  TV looks great and is smaller form factor than similar bravia models.  Even regular DVDs look great on this screen.  Thanks to amazon for a great price, promotional offer, and most of all FREE shipping.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Jim620
Reviews.Content: We got this TV in perfect condition from Amazon with their white glove delivery. The picture is great and we like all the features. I wish our cable company was half as good.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased With TV and Delivery!!!!
Reviews.Author: Marilyn D.
Reviews.Content: The television arrived even before it was due! Thank goodness for the opportunity to track the order. Because we needed to rely on a neighbor to let the delivery person into the house, the tracking paid off!Everything promised in delivery was there--even went above the "call of duty."We are enjoying our Samsung 46" HDTV immensely.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievably clear & crisp picture! White Glove Service better than expected also
Reviews.Author: Wildcat75
Reviews.Content: I previously owned a Sony Grand Wega 42" LCD for the last three years. This Samsung blows it out of the water, NOT even close! My experience with "White Glove" service was better than expected and fairly fast.I would highly recommend this t.v.

Reviews.Title: WOW!!! What a great TV, worth every penny!
Reviews.Author: The Grim Meeper "gmeeper"
Reviews.Content: I got this TV a few weeks ago, I can't imagine watching anything else now.  We have a home theater with the works (HD projector, theater seating, 7.1 surround sound,...), but picture quality doesn't compare when you activate the 120Hz option.  It makes everything look like live action as opposed to film.  Takes a little getting used to at first, but once you get used to it it's really hard to watch anything else.  Although I'd recommend turning the 120Hz option off when watching anything with special effects because it makes it shows every flew and makes it look really cheesy.  We watched Spider-man 3 on Blu-ray and most scenes looked amazingly real, but when he shoots his webs or fights Sandman it looked terrible.  I'd highly recommend this TV to anyone.  Plenty of HDMI inputs, good sound and internet connected for personalized stock/weather/news info.  Kudos to Amazon for delivering this TV with white-glove service in only 3 days.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely one of the best out there
Reviews.Author: R. Garland "Robert Garland"
Reviews.Content: When we finally had everything that we needed to explore the full cababilites of this tv set, all we could say is WOW!  This is by far the best tv I have ever owned.  We have not even set up the custom settings yet but it still looks amazing with its plug and play feature.  I would highly recomend this set to anyone who is looking to upgrade or need a new set.

Reviews.Title: Exceptional HDTV & White Glove Delivery
Reviews.Author: Midnight Shopper "Joe"
Reviews.Content: Exceptional HDTV from Samsung who is rated #1 in all reviews. Amazon has a great price and the White Glove Delivery was wonderful. I looked at the local electronic retailers and already knew this was a great television with up to date features. I believe this is the best price and delivery available. You will not be disappointed!  Great Buy! Thank you Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Top Quality HD TV!
Reviews.Author: Renae Prinsen
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of ColorI am very happy with my purchase.  This is a great TV with an unbelievable picture.  I actually feel like I'm at a movie theater.  I've never seen anything like it.  My whole family is loving this TV!

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650
Reviews.Author: L. Keszler "LKeszler"
Reviews.Content: This television is great.  I read several negative reviews about glare/reflection and the trim color but did not experience the issues others did.  The picture clarity is great.  Having the older tube style TV, this TV needs less space with half the weight.  Sound quality is good.  I also read in a previous review that the table stand does not pivot.  Mine does.The white glove delivery provided by Amazon was excellant.There are computer link features on this TV that I'll never use but its nice to have if needed.As with any LCD HDTV, HD service is a must if you want to view the clear and crisp video you see at the local electronic stores.

Reviews.Title: Best TV ever...surprise it is even better than Sony
Reviews.Author: EDGARDO CEBALLOS
Reviews.Content: I was sooo much biased to the HDNA SONY before buying this, that I took 4 additional weeks to choose this one. I kept reading customer reviews, I went to stores to see the TV, until I was convinced: it is way more bang for the bucks. So I saved money and I've got a TV that surprised me.I definitely recommend it...great in every aspect.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650
Reviews.Author: Michael E. Moore
Reviews.Content: This TV has a great picture.It is a pure pleasure to watch high definition TV now. Even after a month I could not find a lower price for the same TV. I have no regrets buying this set from Amazon.com.

Reviews.Title: BEST TV EVER!!!
Reviews.Author: bestdeal08
Reviews.Content: I purchased this model over 4 months ago so I had the opportunity to go through all the settings try out my xbox, ps3, regular dvds and blue ray disc. This tv is amazing! I was thinking about purchasing a sound system to go along with this tv but after playing my cd's and listening to music on it I realized I would just be wasting money.  Picture quality is great especially when watching football in hdtv. It comes with 4HDMI ports which is all I needed to hook everything up including my laptop when I would rather work/browse on the big screen instead of using the laptop screen. At first I wasn't going to purchase this tv because I thought the touch of color might be overwhelming but it wasn't at all, this is a must have.

Reviews.Title: fantastic TV ,fantastic delivery service.
Reviews.Author: leo
Reviews.Content: First of all,the no.of reviews are already an indication of popularity of this particular lcd TV.It's just amazing ie..the ease of use(plug &play;),the clearity of picture.The TV looks great even when its off.courtsey of good looks and touch of colour.The TV does have a wiselink(usb port)which i havent used till now.The remote control is easy to use and there is no glare problem with glossy screen unless u r throwing a 100 watt light directly onto the screen(my tv is just opposite to a big glass window with no curtain,I stay on top floor)The service from CEVA is nothing short of great.WOW!white glove service is as advertised.My first experince with CEVA and its a very good one.Far exceeds the expectation and made me tip the guy.The gentleman delivered the TV at exact time with explaination of remote function and setting up the tv.He checked,if it works fine including sound and picture.He showed no signs of hurry and was very courteous.All in all the happiest experience while buying a tv just becoz of amazon and CEVA(fantastic combination).Anybody in market to buy a tv must give this lcd tv a serious look.Offcourse u can spend 1000 dollars more and may be even get a better tv.But this tv is best value for money compared to any other brand with similar features and specifications(includes sony/sharp).Buy it,you will not repent.

Reviews.Title: Best quality for the price - an amazing TV
Reviews.Author: John E. Snyder
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV after literally months of reviewing similar sets and brands, and I finally decided on this one after Consumer Reports named Samsung as the best LCD television brand.  I also purchased it on Amazon because of positive feedback I read on the site about the free 'white glove' delivery service and also because it was FAR less expensive at Amazon than in any store (up to $500 less than some big name stores, not including the additional savings from not paying any sales tax).  The feedback on Amazon about this TV is all true - this television is unbelievable.  The picture quality is so excellent that it looks like you are watching things (the news, sports, TV shows, movies) with your own eyes... it makes watching my old tube TV's simply unacceptable.  The white glove delivery was fantastic - the deliveryperson set up the set and made sure it was undamaged and working perfectly before leaving ... and then he disposed of all the shipping materials for us.  Look no further - this is the best TV, at the best price, with the best delivery service... a great deal all around.

Reviews.Title: Stunning Picture & Great Looking TV
Reviews.Author: P. Seth "as526"
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this from Amazon.  First about Amazon customer service.  Not only was the TV deliverd free of cost - but within 2 days...2 DAYS - Best Buy and other stores take upto a week sometimes to deliver so I am not sure why buying from a store even makes sense anymore, not just in terms of cost - which you can not even compare but just the all inclusive white glove delivery.  I did a lot of research on this and can say - this is an absolutely stunning TV - looks great, the TOC is subtle and not tacky as I was afraid when I first started exploring.  The picture quality is superb - I do have a blu-ray DVD player although I think a regular full HD dvd would be good enough given the cost associated with the whole package of buying those Blu-Ray DVD's.  There is a difference, but not being an early adopter, not sure if its worth all that much.  The remote can do with some upgrades - its effective not very efficient.  All in all, extremely satisifed with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Picture and NO Glare
Reviews.Author: P. Kreitler
Reviews.Content: My wife and I purchased this TV after a lot of research and review reading.  We had narrowed it down between the Samsung LN series and the Sony Bravia series.  A couple reviews about shadowing for the Sony steered us to the Samsung.  We are EXTREMELY Happy with our choice.  We looked at the 550, 650, and 750 versions side by side in a store and decided the 650 picture was the best for the money.Out of the box, the TV was easy to set up.  We don't have BlueRay yet, but standard DVDs and HD TV are incredible.  Everyone who comes over to watch is blown away by the picture.  And that is from others who have HD LCD TVs at home.  And, they paid more for theirs... ;)We have our LN46A650 in our great room adjacent to some VERY Large glass windows.  In the afternoon the sun pours into the room.  We've watched a lot of football this fall in the afternoon and the sun has not been an issue at all.  The screen just powers through and there is NO glare what-so-ever.  We have found that the Dynamic Setting on the TV works very well during the daylight.My only complaint about this TV is that it does not have dual coax cable inputs like the older Samsungs.  I have to use a switch to change between satelite and cable.  Not too big a deal, but I still wish they had kept that nice option.Definitely buy THIS TV!

Reviews.Title: Great Samsung TV & BD player from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Raj Franklin "Book lover"
Reviews.Content: I did lot of research on LCD TV before purchacing LN46A650 from Amazon.I submitted the oreder on 11/28 and I got TV on 12/7 (2 days prior to scheduled delivery date). Amazon service is amazing. I called customer service before ordering the TV, before shipment and every time they answered all my questions. The best thing I like is that they gave phone number of other departments if they don't know the exact answer to my question. The Shipping company CEVA is good. They delivered it on time and they carefully brought my TV into my living room. (I read in one of the review that they have not handled the package well). I got Samsung Blu ray 1500 with $200 discount. Litrally free. I ordered HDMI 1.3 cable from SF planet. With my kids we watched Ratatoulli and Kung Fu Panda Blu ray movies. They are stunning...

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: There were a lot of TV deals out this thanksgiving. You could easily get a 50+ inch 1080p for what this model cost (or even 200-400 cheaper). However, the picture quality of this model leaves them all in the dust. Simply put, I don't think there are many tvs with a picture of this caliber out there. It is smooth, crisp, the colors are vibrant, and the blacks are deep. So while you probably know people that got a nice 52" plasma or lcd for 1000, those are also tvs with only a 10,000-15,000 contrast, no 120 mhz refresh rate, and frankly the picture might be big, but it is 1/2 as good as this one. It will just blow you away.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Aaron "Aaron"
Reviews.Content: The picture on this TV is amazing I haven't even watched regular programming.  Super fast shipping!

Reviews.Title: First 30 minute impression
Reviews.Author: M. R. Reynolds
Reviews.Content: I'll have more to say in a week or two about the 650.  This is my first, take it out of the box, impression.  The 650 was shipped from Dallas and arrived in Tulsa in exactly one week. The shipping carton bottom was clean.  No stickers were on the TV. The set appeared to be brand new. Delivery man put the batteries in the remote and quickly left.  I couldn't get my newly rented Cox Cable HDTV box with Monoprice HDMI cable to talk to the 650 so I connected the 650 straight to the cable outlet and did an automatic channel search.  The search took something like 15 minutes.  During the search the 650 found all the channels, then it did an automatic one at a time scrambled channel delete.  On Cox here in Tulsa the local HDTV broadcast channels are unscrambled.  Didn't see a single bad pixel or any of the other bad LCD stuff you read about.  In doing my first channel surf, after setting SD to 4:3, I immediately found that the words from the speakers at the bottom of the 650, on many channels, didn't exactly match the lips of the announcers.  Secondly some of the SD channels had bad picture quality and some of the SD channels (local FOX especially) had outstanding SD quality.  The HDTV picture quality ranged from OK to blow your socks off.  The blacks on my 650 are even blacker than black and I saw no motion blurs in the factory default setting. Glare, with the set turned on, is not an issue.  They say you should set 10 feet back from this 46" set.  I say 12 to 14 feet is better.  The 650 gets a first impression 1 star delete due to the voice sync issue but that may or may not be the 650's fault.  Picture quality is as expected or better.

Reviews.Title: 46 inches of Goodness!
Reviews.Author: G. Martinez "The Accomodator"
Reviews.Content: OK. Where do I start. I started seriously researching TVs about a month ago. I read many of these reviews and others. The good and the bad. I have had this TV for about a week and so far it has been amazing! The picture quality is awesome!! (HD)  I must say I am very happy with my purchase. Amazon had this television at least $400.00 cheaper the department stores during Black Friday week. This is the first time I have made such a big purchase ONLINE. I have no regrets other than waiting a week to receive my set. Pilot Air Freight scheduled an appointment by phone and delivered no problem.  Glare has not been an issue with my set and have a "S" Panel as well.So, now that I have replaced my 27' Tube from 15 years ago with a Samsung LCD I had to upgrade everything else. I also purchase a HT-A100 Samsung Home Theatre system that seems to work well for my space. I just have get used to the remotes and features.This is a GREAT TV. Don't hesitate to buy. AMAZON offers the best deal. The Price does tend to fluctuate. When I purchased it, it was $100.00 less that it was today. NO tax, NO Shipping, Free Blu-Ray Player was also a BONUS.HAPPY HOLIDAYS!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful TV
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: We got this TV after a Wii-mote got hurled into our 3 year old Sharp Aquos LCD.  We debated a lot between plasma and LCD for this new purchase (I like the depth and richness of plasma, my boyfriend likes LCD), as well as between the 550 and the 650 Samsung versions.  We ultimately ended up going for the 650 because of the 120hz technology, the super rich color (which I thought rivaled that of the Samsung plasmas), and the stylish red color frame.The picture is fantastic, after having fiddling with it for a while. We turn off the 120hz feature for TV watching because it makes the picture look like video, kind of flat, but turn it on for gaming, and also change the color settings for gaming and movie watching as well, and it looks amazing. The sound is ok (we have it going to surround, so rarely use just the TV sound), and it looks great, very sleek, with only a very subtle hint of red.The placement of the ports could also be a bit better, there is no standard composite video on the back, just the side, unless you take up one of the two component ports with composite.Overall, however, we love it, and would highly recommended it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung is the best.
Reviews.Author: Georgia J. Prosser
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is beautiful. Colors are true to life,and the menu is so simple to use if anything has to be changed or adjusted.  The price was reasonable also.

Reviews.Title: Most amazing tv I have ever seen
Reviews.Author: Allan Johnston "Amazon guy"
Reviews.Content: This TV is just flat out amazing!  I had looked at this one as well as the 46a750 and the 46a850 in my local stores.  I really couldn't see any difference in picture quality and I didn't need all the extra stuff on the later versions.  Besides, there were 433 reviews on Amazon that rated it 5 star, 24 months no interest with the Amazon store card and free white glove delivery as well.  Can't beat that deal !!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great price, great transaction
Reviews.Author: M. Tellatin
Reviews.Content: Fantastic TV with excellent picture quality.  I know some people are concerned about the touch of red but I don't even notice it.
