If I were to have any complaints about the TV it would be the remote.  The wheel to navigate around the menu can be annoying but that would be my only complaint.

Reviews.Title: Samsung
Reviews.Author: Janice Pappas
Reviews.Content: We were a bit concerned with the "touch of red" shown as the color of the frame, it looks black and doesn't cause any clash with our interiors.  The television itself has an absolutely beautiful picture and was well worth the investment.

Reviews.Title: Just about Perfect
Reviews.Author: A. J. Anthony
Reviews.Content: I have just recently purchased this TV after much research.  There is nothing that I can complain about this TV.  The TOC I barely notice unless I turn on all the lights in the room.  I haven't gotten use to the 120Hz as of yet but even the picture with it off is perfect.  The remote is the only problem I have with this TV but I just use my receiver's remote to get rid of the issues.  Also, Amazon's service and price were excellent with the TV delivered right on time.  Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Joe Cohen "Less is More."
Reviews.Content: The TV came 5 days after we ordered it. The delivery service was perfect and the TV is working great. The picture is excellent. There is only one thing - if you are going to uninstall the base stand in order to mount the TV on a stand from the back, you will find that the four screws used to attach the base mount are very hard to get out - the screws are deep in and since there is no angle, it is hard to tell when you have unscrewed the screws. So we had to use a kitchen magnet to get them out. That can be exhausting if you have just finished assembling a new mount for the TV. But the picture especially for movies compensates for everything, and the surround sound is also amazing. So highly recommend the TV but maybe Samsung can put some angle in these screw holes on the bottom or magnetize the screws and then it will all be perfect.But very happy with purchase, exceptional TV, especially with a nice mount from Costco.

Reviews.Title: WoW wa wee wa
Reviews.Author: Daniel W. Chaplain
Reviews.Content: gosh, i'm spoiled.  sometimes the shows are too clear.  can get a little scary, jp.  no, but can be a strain on the eye at night because it's so bright and clear, but you can always dim the picture.the remote is the only negative.  the "wheel" on it doesn't really even work .  and you have to point the remote right at the tv for it to work...

Reviews.Title: Samsung Ln46a650 46 in LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Gerald F. Davis
Reviews.Content: Very happy with Tv.m The picture is clear and bright. Would recommend to anyone looking for a LCD

Reviews.Title: wonderful tv
Reviews.Author: Frank L. Logue Jr. "aussie logue"
Reviews.Content: This tv has the best picture I have ever seen.  Service from Amazon was great and recieved tv in great shape.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650 HDTV w/Red Touch of Color
Reviews.Author: J. Heider
Reviews.Content: Seller: Amazon does a good job by informing customer of sale, shipping progress, delivery.Delivery: Company arranged time and date. Delivery personnel called befor e delivery, were on time and unpacked set also made other excellent suggestions. Nice service.TV Set: Excellent styling, picture, manual. Sound (speaker)occassionally flutters or sputters (overmodulating?) It may be the audio signal and not the set.Like the rotating base, very easy to view in any part of a large room. Picture quality is super: clear, crisp, vibrant colors.Red Touch of Color: Really haven't figured out its purpose. Viewer has to look for it. Haven't located in manual if red color is constant or operator controlled.After three weeks of use, would recommend set to potential buyer.

Reviews.Title: HOLY SCHNIKEES
Reviews.Author: Edward Droutsas
Reviews.Content: Just got the TV in yesterday and man I was just watching a bit of the movie Jarhead in HD on cinemax and the picture on this TV was nothing short of stunning.  Then I flipped over to Monday Night Footbal and again blown away.  Don't worry about Standard definition not looking as great, after extensive time looking at pretty much every TV that is currently out there, none provided a great standard def image. But the standard def on this set is fairly decent.As to those worried about glare issues, unless you place your tv opposite windows with no blinds or curtains you don't have to worry about lots of reflection. As with almost any TV if there is a strong light facing it (the sun) it will reflect light.All in all this TV is amazing. I couldn't be happier at the price I got it at ($1500 plus a free blu-ray player). Buy it and prepare for your eyes to bug out.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Superb Picture Quality!
Reviews.Author: Robert M
Reviews.Content: This set blows away every other TV including the overpriced Sony's.  The Touch of Color is VERY subtle, almost unnoticeable.  There is some glare but not enough to be of concern.  The colors are spot on! Blacks are a rich, deep, glossy ink black with good shadow detail.  Razor sharp images.  I just saw a friends Pioneer Plasma Elite Kuro Pro and this set can hold it's own against the Kuro.  The Kuro may have a little better shadow detail but it's not nearly as bright as this one. The Kuro has a little less screen glare but it was not that much better. And this is much cheaper than the Kuro.  Too bad these LCD's don't go much a above 52-55"; plasmas still reign at these large sizes.One suggestion: Turn down the sharpness to around 10.  The picture will actually improve with more detail visible.Summary: If a high quality picture is paramount to you, this LCD beats everything out there including those overpriced Sony's.Other notes: I avoided the 750 series due to halo effect and pealing bezel issues.  Also Amazon had it in my house in three business days!  This set included the latest firmware and had none of the picture anomalies that some folks have reported in the AVS forums.

Reviews.Title: BEST 46" LCD OUT THERE !
Reviews.Author: Anthony Strode
Reviews.Content: Got my Series 6 Samsung about 2 weeks ago. I was worried about issues such as clouding, flashlights, and random shut-offs but like the majority of the reviewers, I have had no problems. The picture quality is OUTSTANDING even right out of the box. The delivery was on time and the TV came in perfect condition. Even the box was in great shape. The clear screen glare is not an issue at all. In fact I think it makes the picture more vibrant and sharper. Even if you have a light right behind you, and your watching a movie, other than dark scenes I don't see any distracting reflections. If your on the fence about purchasing this set, DO IT! You wont be sorry.

Reviews.Title: Supperb LCD
Reviews.Author: W. Falk
Reviews.Content: Great LCD. Clear picture, good looking and easy to setup. Very good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: My first Samsung TV (ex Sony owner)
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Orrantia Ponce "ROP"
Reviews.Content: Simply amazing!, This is my first TV from Samsung and let me tell you i don't miss my old Sony one bit...The feature set, image quality, the whole design leaves you speechless.  This LCDTV is built to last, it feel like a solid quality product. The remote control, though it does lack a few things here and there (not a universal remote and lacks a sleep and pip button) feels solid and it is not one of those flimsy remotes you find in other brands.Even normal signal TV works decent on this set with its advance filters to take care of the problem.Another plus is the 120Hz processing, as SPORTS look like SPORTS!, I have seen lower quality Sony's (not the XBR) leave trails while watching soccer games but not this baby.Samsung has won me over as a customer with product and I am one of those guys who used to says "Samsung TV?" I can assure you it wont be the last.

Reviews.Title: Great TV & Monitor
Reviews.Author: Richard Bagge "I love my HTPC"
Reviews.Content: First, the shipping was early by days and excellent.This panel looks great. Looks is what counts.Sound is fine, but I always use my 5.1 for shows that matter.The device switch does take about 5 seconds.I use it as a monitor to show movies, read web pages, view hulu, etc.The 1080p looks great.  Using WinDVD 9 with the uplift of standard DVD looks excellent.I miss staring at panels at C***co and B****y.I like the clear screen, even with a little glare sometimes. I can reduce the glare.  I cannot make a mat screen clear.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Girish P. Nair "Girish"
Reviews.Content: Before making this purchase I was looking to buy either a Samsung or Sony LCD television. I am glad I went with Samsung, the colors are great, the contrast is great and the price is great. We all enjoy the TV and Movie experience. I also got a Samsung BD-P2500 to play DVD and Blu-Ray disks. I personally think that this TV beats the over priced cousin Sony. I picked this model instead of 750 and 850 because it was affordable and I didn't really care for some of the newer features. I would recommend 650 over 550 as the technical specs are better like 4ms response time.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Service
Reviews.Author: R. Buckingham
Reviews.Content: We have been trying to decide for a long time which HD TV to buy.  We decided to go with a Samsung after our daughter and son-in-law bought a Samsung.  Amazon had the best price and selection for what we wanted.  We were nervous about buying from mail order, but the white glove service was fantastic!  They arrived at our home when they said they would, they unpackaged the TV and made sure it worked.  They let me look it over for scratches and I didn't find a one.  I would not be afraid to buy from Amazon when White Glove service is offered.  Another great thing was the shipping was free.  The Television was very easy to set up, instructions were great.  I had it set up and working in about an hour.  The picture is great, it has lots of input options.  All in all this was a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!!!
Reviews.Author: N. Barham
Reviews.Content: I still can't get over the picture quality of this TV and it's been a month since I got it.  I am truly impressed!! I really don't have anything but good things to say about the TV.I have another Samsung TV, a 56" DLP 1080p TV that is a few years old now. Though it may be a few years old, it has been holding it's own in terms of video quality for quite some time. It always looked much better than my friend's TV's.  That time has now passed.  When I watched Planet Earth in HD on the old Samsung, I was very impressed then.  But now that I have the new TV, I decided to re-watch Planet Earth on the new TV.  WHAT A DIFFERENCE!!  I was shocked at the improvement. The color, the vibrancy, the whites, the blacks, the DETAIL and sharpness, the fluid motion with no jaggies. It almost brought a tear to my eye, that's how good it looked. It's got it all I am happy to report. Samsung really got it right with this TV.If you are on the fence about this TV like I was (before I bought it), I say buy it.  You won't be sorry you did.  It's a fantastic TV and I can do nothing but highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: I Couldn't Be Happier
Reviews.Author: Robert STL
Reviews.Content: I just got my 2nd one of these.  The first one I got in the 'best' retail store.  I later learned that retail stores sell them uncalibrated so I had to pay geek $400.00 to calibrate all the colors to be the best they can be.  If you buy from a non-retail outlet, they're already calibrated.As for the glossy screen complaints, I can't complain.  Any reflection produced is not something that glares at me....I sort of see through it without noticing it.I feel like I have the Cadillac of LCD TVs, so I bought a 2nd on from Amazon for another room.  The colors of HD and non-HD programs are magnificent.  Especially the sets of local news programs and game shows like Jeopardy that are broadcast in HD.You cannot beat the quality for this price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Kevin Delmotte
Reviews.Content: Have had this tv for about a month now, everything so far has been great. I have dish network without HD so far and the picture quality is excellent. My dvd player is only 480p but the picture is very clean and detailed, can't wait to see it at 1080p. I have no problem with this tv at all, did do the recommended update without a hitch. The black/red color of the bezel is a nice touch but not that big a selling point for me. Have read others do not like the remote with the swivel ring, it does not bother me too much as I use the satellite remote most of the time but have no problems using the tv's remote when needed. For anyone looking for a 46 lcd set, take a good look at this unit, I looked around for over 6 months before I bought this one, for the money you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: I love my new tv!!!
Reviews.Author: E Hewitt
Reviews.Content: I wanted to make sure and leave feedback on my new Samsung LN46A650.  I did my research on consumer reports, read all customer reviews, etc.  That's how I found out that amazon.com had it at the best price.  I was worried about making a big purchase like this online and also about having it shipped to my house.  The white glove delivery service was great- no problems whatsoever.  I love everything about the tv.  After reading all the reviews about it, I knew exactly what I was getting and what to expect.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price!
Reviews.Author: J. Cherrier
Reviews.Content: This TV is wonderful. Looks beautiful and has a defined picture. Wathing Blu-ray with the 120Hz on makes view high action sence more clear and earier to watch. The shipping was great arrived 3 days eariler than I though it would and in excellent condition.

Reviews.Title: samsung 46inch 650
Reviews.Author: Leslie R. Smith
Reviews.Content: Received my order in 5 days but it would have been delivered two days sooner had I been available for delivery.The delivery people couldn"t have been any better,they carried the TV into my living room,unpacked it,sat it on my TV stand,plugged it in and hooked up the HDMI cable and handed me the remote then said thank you.Good Job Amazon! The samsung was in perfect working order.I love it.Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of ColorBetter Get One.

Reviews.Title: Great TV picture and price
Reviews.Author: Scott Engelbrecht
Reviews.Content: This TV got a Consumer Reports recommended buy in the August 08 issue and I am very pleased.  The picture is great at 120Hz.

Reviews.Title: The best but won't empty your bank
Reviews.Author: Hiep Pham
Reviews.Content: Bought this two months ago from Circuit City. The picture is geogeous, sharp, crisp. Its 120Hz frame rate is all the difference, specially when you are watching sport, no fuzzing images. This is the feature I like the most. Samsung has established its reputation in electronics field. Recommend a buy.

Reviews.Title: Very nice picture
Reviews.Author: Rob C "Rob"
Reviews.Content: I was coming from a 53'' Hitachi rear projection tv. The colors are much richer on the Samsung and the picture is usually sharper. There are some times when the screen gets that slightly pixelated look, but not very much. I think the rich colors more than make up for it.The one knock I have is that when using a Samsung BluRay player with it, the sound is incredably low. Once I get my receiver back from the shop it won't matter, but in the meantime it is someimes hard to watch movies on because it is hard to hear. The tv volume is just fine though.Update 12/17/08The volume problem was with how the DVD player was set up. Our home theater has a subwoofer, so the speaker setup for the DVD player specified small for our front speakers. I changed the DVD speaker configuration to large and the volume when listening through the tv improved dramatically.Altough I do notice some video artifacts on the screen from time to time, such as some pixelation I am very happy with the picture. The colors seem much more vibrant than my old rear projection tv. I definitely would recommend this tv. As a side note, I would NOT recommend Samsung's Blu-Ray players. Mine has been nothing but trouble as far as picture and audio stuttering.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46-inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: J. A. Minch
Reviews.Content: First time I have ever purchased something this large and expensive from the internet.  No problem!  The Samsung HDTV is everything I had hoped.....even better.  Delivery was made on time, set up by the delivery person and worked great before he would leave.  Again no problem.  Price was less than anywhere I checked and I couldn't be happier.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Best HDTV
Reviews.Author: J. Schwartz "Jake"
Reviews.Content: This was our first HDTV purchase and we could not be happier.  The picture is amazing and sports are out of this world.  We love everything about the TV except for the remote's click wheel.  It lacks responsiveness but you get use to it.  Buy this TV, you will love it.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic picture and tons of options
Reviews.Author: J. Farr
Reviews.Content: I waited for this TV to come down quite a bit before making the leap.  It was totally worth it.  The screen is very sharp and can be extremely bright right out of the box, so be sure to calibrate it correctly.  The 15-year-old Sony VEGA that it replaced weighed nearly 200 pounds.  This thing is less than 50.  Very easy to move around.My only beef is that you can't use PiP to view from two separate sources (like a DVD and the cable box for example).  Also, it has some of the legacy connections on the side instead of the rear, so you may have some of your cables hanging in sight if you didn't buy them long enough.Overall an excellent buy.

Reviews.Title: Loving it!
Reviews.Author: Barb "Barb"
Reviews.Content: I was quite skeptical of making this type of purchase online.  It was a great experience plus the quality of the product is fabulous.  I did some research plus the amazon help person was very informative.I love this TV so much that I immediately ordered a second one.  All in all a very pleasant experience and I saved money to boot!Barbara

Reviews.Title: Even SD Looks Good!
Reviews.Author: R. Vartian
Reviews.Content: I was prepared for Standard DirecTV to look worse than my old Mits 35" tube.  This I have come to expect from viewing other HDTVs.Happy to discover that the SD picture quality is just fine on this Samsung!Of course the HD picture quality is superb.  On standard DVD, the picture is also excellent, but does vary, depending on the quality of the DVD transfer, etc.The only less than ideal issue on this unit is the on board speakers.  Most will use an external audio system and seems Samsung is assuming this.  For a streamlined look, there are no front firing speakers, so the whole cabinet resonates.  There actually appears to be more loudness behind the TV.Still, that doesn't keep me from giving five stars.  Great purchase!

Reviews.Title: A super-quality LCD HDTV solution
Reviews.Author: Dr. James Williamson
Reviews.Content: I was initially concerned that the "touch of color" would be distracting and unpleasant.  But I decided to embrace change, and hope that the Samsung marketeers had done their homework.  Within seconds of installation of my new LCD TV, I LIKED the subtle color in the bezel.  In fact, that color combined with the high-gloss frame and over-all style radiates a high-class look that would enhance the most beautiful rooms.  This display-quality of this panel is so excellent, that I regret not spending another $600 on the 52" version.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Quality
Reviews.Author: Quentin A. Forney
Reviews.Content: This item is totally awesome.  Once I hooked everything up to the HDMI on my cable I could not believe the clarity of the picture.  This was better than I expected and compared to the price at the local stores it made the purchase even better.  Would recommend this product to any one.  When it is time to purchase another TV I will be looking at a Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Purchase
Reviews.Author: J. Carroll "jimc"
Reviews.Content: After reading several opinions and reviews, we decided on the Samsung LN46A650. I was a little nervous about the delivery,but as a long time Amazon customer we decided to buy a big ticket item and it turned out to be a positive experience. Ordered the set on 9/13 and it was delivered 9/20, yes a Saturday. It was suppose to come between noon and 3:00pm and it came just after 3. Everything went smoothly. Only problem is that prices are dropping. TV took a while to figure out while setting up the cable box, but we absolutley enjoy it!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, price and service
Reviews.Author: William Weddle
Reviews.Content: After watching my 27" Zenith for the last 15 years I decided it was high time for a new TV. I entered my order for this TV on a Saturday night at a recent low of $1504 and selected the free shipping option, 4 days later on Wednesday I received an email from the shipper asking me to call to arrange delivery. I arranged for the folowing Saturday and the delivery showed up in the window they stated. I was very impressed with the 2 guys who set it up and they were gone in 5 minutes.I am very happy with the TV, the clarity of picture is outstanding, sound while not great is OK if you set up as custom/surround/auto volume on. I would give a 5 rating were it not for the lame PIP feature. I solved this by ordering a Scientific Atlanta 8300HD DVR from my cable Co that has a PIP feature. I have not had any of the power drop out problems that have been reported with the earlier versions.I also ordered the Samsung 1500DP blu-ray player and am very happy with this. Although I find the Anynet function too cumbersome, the features and picture output more than compensate for this.All in all I found buying from Amazon an easy experience.WW

Reviews.Title: Product couldn't be better
Reviews.Author: Sparky "Sparky"
Reviews.Content: I've read a lot of Negative Blogs about this TV. I have found them all to be non existant. I've enjoyed this LCD for a month now and have not encountered any problems or oddities. I say "Hats off to Samsung"

Reviews.Title: Amazing!!!
Reviews.Author: Loving Wife
Reviews.Content: We researched and reviewed several various brands of HDTVs before purchasing this Samsung 46in 120hz lcd tv.The reviews were all very positive.But, we were not prepared for the amazing, unbelievable picture quality! The viewing in standard 480p is amazing clarity.  but the 1080pis like being live in the same room with what ever you are viewing. Its as if you can reach into the screen and touch them. My husband absolutelyLOVES! this tv.

Reviews.Title: UPDATE:  Cr*pped out after only < 4 years
Reviews.Author: Steve in Abilene
Reviews.Content: UPDATE 1 Apr 2012:  After less than 4 years the screen started getting vertical lines that wouldn't go away and kept getting worse.  This set got very little use for the last 2.5 years, and this started happening after we started using it again to replace the smaller set in our home office.  After doing just a little research on Google, it appears that this is a relatively common issue with Samsung LCD TVs.  Personally, I don't believe that the repair cost would be worth it since the prices of LCDs have come down so much in the last 4 years, I will probably just buy a new one.  Yes, I am disappointed but not surprised.  Like the adage says, they simply don't make things like they used to.-----After doing serious research for our first LCD/HD TV by physically going to over 10 "big box" stores and reading countless articles, reviews, etc., I decided on this 46" Samsung 650 Series.  I wanted 120Hz, an outstanding picture, reduced glare and as many HDMI inputs as possible.  This TV had it all!  With a 3 year old in the house I also liked the glass covering the screen.  I don't know how much abuse it can take, but at least it is something "extra" to provide a little protection for the screen.  At first I though that the glass would increase the glare because we have the TV in a bright room but it didn't at all.  It actually has less glare than our older regular TV!Here is what I have hooked up (so far) and everything looks amazing:  Dish Network TurboHD, Playstation 3 (for Blue Ray discs which aer simply amazing on this set), a 5 disc HDMI DVD player and an older surround sound system.  Everything works and sounds great!  I didn't even hook up the surround until today because I loved the way that the TV speaker sounded.  I was actually surprised at how good you can make it sound.Why I bought from Amazon (and why I am REALLY GLAD that I did!):After comparing prices at retail outlets, this TV ranged from $1999 (on sale) to $2399.  That was simply too much for us so I was leaning toward the 40" which I could find for $1499 on sale.  This didn't include tax.  Then, when I decided to check online sources, I found the 46" here for a little under $1600 with no tax and free delivery.  That was perfect so I snatched it up!  One thing that I didn't know about the free shipping was that it included "White Glove" service which was extremely helpful.  "White Glove" means that the delivery service will bring it to you, take it out of the box, help you set it up and even make sure that it works with your setup.  This was great for me because it would have been almost impossible for me to mount this on the stand by myself.  Not having to transport, carry, or even unpack this big TV was worth at least another $150 in my book!  Another great savings from Amazon.Added note on delivery:  When I purchased the TV it said that delivery would take 14 days... I got it in 3... and I live 160 miles from anywhere.BOTTOM LINE:  It would be VERY hard to beat this TV and the service from Amazon.com.  If you are in the market for one of these, definitely buy it from here!

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD 1080p
Reviews.Author: T. Floyd
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research on this TV and competitors before I bought.  I chose it because of the features. (1080P, 120Mhz Auto Motion, 4 HDMI Inputs, Super Clear Panel, and 50,000:1 Contrast Ratio....to name a few)This TV has been Awesome so far.  It is simple to setup and the picture is great.  It looks good over my fireplace too.My only regret is that it looks a lot smaller in place..I should have went BIGGER!

Reviews.Title: Amazing Picture
Reviews.Author: R. Brigman "rynosc"
Reviews.Content: This is my first HDTV and believe me the picture is truly amazing. The color was perfect out of the box and the blacks are so rich. It's way better than a friend's less expensive Phillips. The 120hz definitely makes a difference watching HD football. Price was $200 less than Circuit City and they shipped it to my door. What more could a couch potato ask for?

Reviews.Title: WOW.....great picture....CRISP HD!!!!
Reviews.Author: C. Richardson "Scoop"
Reviews.Content: This is my first review and purchase of a Samsung LCD.  I bought the TV sight unseen based solely on the Amazon website and reviews by other purchasers.  That being said, when my TV arrived and I installed it on the wall with the Amazon recommended wall mount, BAM... AWESOME!!!  The picture is excellent and HD is incredible....worth every penny...and on that note, I saved about $400-$500 purchasing it through Amazon with FREE shipping.  Very happy with this TV and recommend it to all of my friends!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Picture, Excellent Price
Reviews.Author: M. J. Anderson
Reviews.Content: I did extensive research before deciding to purchase the Samsung LN46A50. I found that the Samsung met all the specifications of more expensive brands (Sony) with a much nicer price.The picture quality is excellent with over the air HD broadcasts, and blue-ray through the PS3 is, of course, eye popping.  Set-up was very easy.  Check out the reviews of this product on CNET and other AV sites for more specifics.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase I've ever made
Reviews.Author: Moonwalker
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. When trying to write a review for it, that really is the first and most definitive thing that comes to mind.I'm a gamer and I still don't trust plasmas not to burn in (or more specifically, I don't want to have to worry about it all the time), so I researched LCDs and after an exhaustive search found this to be the best one out there (especially in its price range).The touch of red is different, but we have it in a cherry wood entertainment center so it blends in well. Although my wife was very reluctant to go with it because of the color, she's warmed to it and we've never had a complaint from anyone who's come to see it.Contrast levels and refresh are top notch and the 120hz (while a matter of preference) really adds a certain pop to my DVDs and blu rays (although I will admit that I do appreciate the built-in option to turn it off because it really doesn't work well with everything).I haven't had any of the issues where the set randomly turns off yet, but even if you do, there's already a firmware upgrade to fix it so without any hesitation I recommend this TV as the best LCD in its price and size range.

Reviews.Title: Great Overall Product
Reviews.Author: A. Arnett
Reviews.Content: Great TV! It's one of the highest rated products for a reason.  No complaints what so ever.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: D. L. Green "Don"
Reviews.Content: Have had the Samsung LCD for over a month & very satisfied with all aspects.What surprised me the most was the delivery from Amazon & set-up of the television ! I was expecting a UPS guy to just drop a box off.  Instead a private delivery contractor came and even connected the TV & made sure everthing was working, before I signed.  The box & packaging materials were even taken away (was offered option to keep in case I needed to return).Ordering through Amazon was great !

Reviews.Title: Great TV but with a glossy screen
Reviews.Author: J. Seelye
Reviews.Content: We ordered this TV and got the free white glove shipping--a nice touch.  The picture is great and we love the features.  We use Direct TV, so we had them install an HD/DVR and we have about as good a deal for watching programs as we can imagine.  I plan to hook the TV into our network so we can view pictures without having to put them on a flash drive and plug them into the TV.  This is a terrific TV.We have only one complaint.  After looking at many models, we decided we wanted a matte finish on the screen.  We have our TV in a bright room with lots of windows.  Samsung used to tell more about the screen covering in last years models.  I assumed that this medium end TV would have a matte screen.  I was wrong--it is glossy.  The picture is so bright and the contrast is so good that we really don't see the reflections that are there.  Thanks Amazon and Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Totally Satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Hoosierdaddy "yomom"
Reviews.Content: Great product at a great price!  Only downfall is that Amazon has dropped their price daily on this, I purchased a month ago and  price has dropped on this almost $200.

Reviews.Title: Yes 30 Day Price Guarantee is Gone
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Yes the TV is very good. The audio is very good. The remote is deficient. If you wan't 7.1 surround sound I recomend a Pioneer amp and a thousand dollars worth of speakers plus a powered Velodyne subwoofer, obviously the two speaker / amp combinations can't be compared. Tonight I was advised by Amazon to return my LN46A650 and then to buy a new one instead of honoring the 30 day price guarantee. Thats alot of trouble for $30.90. My tv was purchased on 9/9/2008. I also really like the VMAA26 full motion mount.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture at an even beter price.
Reviews.Author: Michael W. Evering
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV based on 2 things, Price and quality. I am an electrician and install a lot of high end AV systems in houses. The 650 series really impressed me with its great hi def picture quality, but also with it's SD picture quality. Samsung did a great job with this TV. Also, Amazon had the absolute best price at the time. For me it was a no brainer!

Reviews.Title: Always Impressed with Samsung
Reviews.Author: R. Blackbourn "blackbz"
Reviews.Content: Great TV, crystal clear picture, great for gaming, football, and anything else you want to do with a TV...

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650 LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: First time buyer through Amazon, great experience and saved 25%. Only had the TV for a month, so far so good. Great picture, sound could be better. All in all very satisfied at a great price.

Reviews.Title: A fine Television
Reviews.Author: Jeremy J. Berg
Reviews.Content: My wife calls our new Samsung LN46A650 46" LCD TV "the other women". It has taken me 5+ years to finally finish our basement rec room. Throughout the construction phase I would continually research and study the current TV selection.Finally it came time for the purchase, to my surprise the average cost had dropped over $1000.00.I absorbed all the information I could by going to Best Buy, Sears and other local electronics stores. It became very clear to me in a very short time that the Samsung LN46A650 was the LCD TV for me.I had never bought anything of this dollar value over the net before,so I was a little reluctant.I happened to call Samsung directly with questions on the extended warranty and ask the person there if they had any problems with Amazon purchases. He told me that he personally had ordered 3 tv through Amazon.com and had fantastic luck.On hearing his confidence I ordered my TV on labor Day Monday. I received periodic updates on it's location. The following Monday I received a call from the carrier telling me it would be delivered by 5pm that night, which just happened to be the GREEN BAY PACKERS home opener against the vikings. I had the TV set and ready by 5:30 and the game started at 6:00. This is an absolutely wonderful TV, I could not be happier with the product or the service, and by the way I

Reviews.Title: This is an awesome tv
Reviews.Author: Researcher
Reviews.Content: I was always on the fence about buying an LCD TV.  My other one worked fine, but every time I would walk into a box store and see the clarity of an LCD, it was amazing.  So, I researched for months and for me it came down to Samsung and Sony.  This Samsung received just as high ratings as Sony and the price was less, so for me it was a no-brainer.  The Touch of Color was also appealing, since the color would go well with my tables, etc.It was very easy to set up and use.  The instructions were great, but I am still putting together my home theater, so I will have to reserve judgment on that until I am completed.I can honestly say that I have had to boot out some friends that just stand in front of the TV with their mouths open, the picture is just so crystal clear.

Reviews.Title: Simply stunning.
Reviews.Author: D. MOORE
Reviews.Content: I've owned a 40" Samsung for 6 months and this new 46" 120hZ model is a quantum leap.  And the best part? I got it on Amazon for $300 less than Best Buy with free shipping.In terms of quality, it's just what you would expect from Samsung.  They're one of the top two LCD brands in the world for a reason- and it really shows on this model.  The construction is solid, the menus intuitive, and most of all it's just a good looking unit.If you're worried about the "touch of red," the color is very subtle- almost unnoticeable in a darker room.All in all, this TV is the best deal on Amazon and I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing LCD
Reviews.Author: Z. Zhang
Reviews.Content: I love this LCD. It looks beautiful and delivers wonderful pictures/images! Buy it, and you will not regret!

Reviews.Title: Excellent, beautiful, perfect
Reviews.Author: G.R. "Stock Boss"
Reviews.Content: You couldn't ask for a better TV. This is a BUY BUY BUY. Best picture of all LCD TV's. Best LCD on the market, no question. I would highly suggest you pull the trigger and buy if you have been looking and researching as I did for months.

Reviews.Title: great product, great service
Reviews.Author: sab
Reviews.Content: I have had this tv for a couple of weeks but I'm still waiting for the satellite company to set up the HD service.  Even without HD the picture far exceeds my expectations (however, if you just want a larger screen go with something cheaper, not utilizing this tv's technology is silly).  Shipping is fast and easy, so I wish I would have waited to order this until about a week before the HD would be installed as the price on this tv has been dropping rapidly over the last month.Amazon customer service has been great as usual.

Reviews.Title: Awesome picture!

Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Content: Actually i haven't watched it much.  My husband loves it so much he has spent a lot of time playing video games, watching old tv shows, etc. on it.  it arrived safely and quickly.  very happy purchasing a tv online and through amazon.

Reviews.Title: My Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Bill Robertson "Believer"
Reviews.Content: I did research on several brands of TV's, such as going to retailers and visually comparing the picture quality, reviews, specifications, ratings,contrast, size for my area of placement. I took the measurements of W x H x D, then measured the space where I would be placing the TV.Then decided where I would purchase the product. I decided to purchase my Samsung TV from Amazon, which had a special on at the time which included free white glove delivery, bingo that delivery sold me.I have purchased many items over time, and I have always been satisfied with Amazons service. The main thing is to do research, don't let some salesman sell you something you may not like.

Reviews.Title: Samsung tv
Reviews.Author: ejb
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Samsung flatscreen tv on Monday and it was delivered within 4 days, uncartoned and in working condition when the delivery crew left. Product performs as advertised. Excellent delivery service by Amazon organization...and the price was lower than local mass merchants charge.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with TV & delivery - minor annoyance
Reviews.Author: Chicago Tors
Reviews.Content: As most have commented, I did some research prior to purchasing this set through Amazon.  I have not yet hooked it up to a HD signal or source yet, so I will reserve judgement until I do that.The set looks great and the non HD picture quality is good.Minor annoyance - there is a bit of glare (bright room),  Also, the controls that are on the front of the TV are almost impossible to see.  They are in the lower right hand corner (on/off, volume, channel, source).  I realize everyone is lazy and pretty much uses the remote, but when the kids hide it, you need to be able to go the old fashioned route and change things on the set.CEVA delivery was prompt and courteous.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: E. Milligan
Reviews.Content: This t.v. is everything I had hoped for.  Its clear, easy to use andI have no problem seeing it and hearing it.  I was pleased with the delivery and the driver who made sure it worked.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46A650
Reviews.Author: S. Moore
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the t.v. i purchased.  The delivery was very quick and the driver was helpful.  It was easy to setup, and I am glad that i purchased on the internet.

Reviews.Title: A nice slice of perfection
Reviews.Author: Cole Feeser "Audio / Videophile"
Reviews.Content: First, let me talk about Amazon themselves. They offered a great price on the TV when I ordered it and their shipping was fast. I ordered this TV on September 4th and it was delivered on the 9th. I was in class the day this monster came, but luckily I got my parents to check for damages and such.The first thing I did when I came home was hooked everything up and calibrated my inputs. Then I immediately started playing some PS3 games (Skate and GT:5P which BTW both look amazing). Then my cousin came over and we tried out some Wii and some HD late night talk shows.Then last night I watched my first Blu-Ray movie (Sunshine to be exact); By the end of the flick I had to pick my jaw up off the floor and get a mop to clean up the drool. I watched this flick with another cousin of mine who was on the fence about Blu-Ray, and well after this movie he was convinced of the true difference in Blu.Anyways to get down to specifics on the TV itself. The TV offers amazing PQ right out of the box, but if calibrated it looks even better. (I recommend checking the AVSforum.com calibration settings thread for this TV). I get local HD channels from Comcast and they look superb.I have my Wii hooked up via component to my receeiver (Onkyo TX-SR606 to be exact) and then I have HDMI from the receiver to the TV. I have my receiver pass the Wii signal untouched and this TV does an awesome job of upscaling the Wii. My one cousin said he noticed some slight blurring in the upscaled signal but I couldn't notice it.Now two of the big issues people (can sometimes) have about this TV are purple haze and clouding. Purple haze is when you see a slight purple colored haze over your blacks. I did some basic tests on my set and didn't seem to have any purple haze (most times people don't have this issue). The other issue people have is clouding or more specifically when light behind the screen bleeds through creating a clouding effect on parts of the screen. (Most common around edges but it can move towards the center) I can say that my set has hardly any clouding if any at all.This two issues can scare some people to a point that they may decide against this set. Well I can say do not be one of these people, because this TV is amazing and you'd be hard pressed to find a better series of TVs (Samsung's 9 series would really be the only thing better than the 6 series.)I can say that the remote and the on screen menus are easy to use / navigate. I've had no issues with this TV so far. I've even hooked my PC up to this TV. I use this hook up mainly for games and emulation.I've spent many hours doing research on this TV and am very pleased. I would recommend this TV to anyone. If you have any doubts or need further info beyond this review you can either contact me or go to AVSForum.comBasically, (for those that want the short version)PROS:+Amazing PQ on all sources.+Easy to navigate remote and OSD+Great bang for your buck+Minimal if any at all off angle viewing issues+Minimal if any at all clouding / purple haze (There is ways to control these two, but if they are really bad you could probably just send this TV back for a new one)+Extreme happiness and amazement, as in this TV will blow you away.CONS:-The TV may take a few seconds longer then normal to turn onAgain if you need a good place to get good advice I recommend AVSForum.com and although Amazon may say I'm not technically an owner of this product, well I am, it's just that I ordered it under my dad's account.Well now that I've added my two cents on this TV I am going to enjoy it some more.Tech NOTE: For those interested I have a(n)...Sony 80gb PS3 (the old one with PS2 BC, SACD Support, 4 USBs, and Media Card support)Onkyo TX-SR606 (amazing receiver for the price)Nintendo WiiBasic cable from Comcast with locals in HDCreative SR750 7.1 700 Watt surround system. (This system rocks for now, but I may upgrade next summer)This is all for now!

Reviews.Title: TV is amazing
Reviews.Author: NewHDguy
Reviews.Content: I read so many reviews on different LCD TV's I was about ready to go insane.  However no matter what site I went to, it appeared like most reviews of other TV's always came back to the a650 being the best bang for the buck right now.  My wife and I went to BB to take a look at it and wrote down the pricing for it.  I then came home and looked on Amazon and noticed it was $500 cheaper and had an average of 5 stars across 270+ reviews.  We obviously decided to purchase the TV through Amazon.The TV was purchases on Wednesday and arrived in Minneapolis MN on Friday of that week (a full week ahead of the estimated delivery date).  I got a call from CEVA/EAGLE/DASH Delivery here in Minneapolis and got the delivery all setup.  I was a little worried about the delivery as I had read some mixed reviews from people saying the "White glove" service sucked.  As for my experience, that statement couldn't be farther from the truth.  The delivery man called 30 mins before he was going to show up.  When he did show up he was super nice and seemed almost as excited about me getting the TV as I was.  He carried it in the house and took it out of the box, he even put down a little mat on my carpet in case the box was dirty.  We then set the TV up on my TV stand and got everything connected.  He then turned on the TV and went through all the setup with me and even went through each menu on the TV to show me what each menu did.  We then checked every input on the TV to very that each input worked.  We then checked for dead/stuck pixels.  He even went over how I should clean the screen on it so I don't scratch it or cause it to fog up.Conclusion - This TV has the most amazing picture I have ever seen and for those worried about the delivery service, at least in Minneapolis MN the service as beyond amazing.

Reviews.Title: Best Television I've ever watched
Reviews.Author: Eric Burns "Burns"
Reviews.Content: This Television by far is the most spectacular television I've ever watched.  It seems to take a normal signal and somehow makes it look like it is HD!  Being a big movie buff, this definitely adds greatness to the collection.  I finished watching Little Big Man a week ago on the television and the picture tricked a lot of my friends into thinking it was a modern movie!I had the choice to purchase this 46 inch television or get the 52 inch without all the additional color features and choosing the 46 inch with touch of color was a great decision.I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Li Zhang
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of ColorThis TV is outstanding! Picture quality is amazing. Great design. Five stars!

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Steele
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of ColorJust got my lcd a couple of days ago with highest of satisfaction. I spend 3 weeks reseaching and comparing samsung and sony online and visually. They matched up head to head except for price and design. Samsung blows sony away. I paid $1479(with $200 rebate) the beat deal I could find on the equal sony was $1990 with both at Amazon with free white glove delivery- which was also a great service and professional.I am not going into the details, but concure with the previous reviewer Simply Amazing, March 26, 2008Go for it. By the way even my conserative wife is amazed and was involved in the decison making process-a major deal. She still believes a good tv should be no more than $600.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Craig Lindley
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV now for about a month and I'm totally impressed with the picture quality. The Olympics were awesome in high def as received over the air. The only complaint I have is the control panel on the front of the TV is almost invisible and for that reason unusable. Oh well that is what a remote is for.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: 2unz
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for three months and am totally delighted with it. The other positive reviews reiterate the great picture and ease of use. If you're in the market for a HDTV, take a look at them in a local store. Every TV has it's pros and cons and none are perfect. If picture in picture (PIP) is a must have for you, then this TV may not be the one you want. It's picture is stunning,the best I've seen at an affordable price. For a great Blu-ray experience, watch Planet Earth...WOW, you'll be amazed. I mostly watch with an over the air antenna and get great local HDTV pictures with this TV. Just read the other reviews here, they really sum things up nicely. Oh yeah, I never thought I'd buy a TV from Amazon, but gave it a chance and glad I did.

Reviews.Title: My Best Choice ever!
Reviews.Author: M. Bartelt
Reviews.Content: I looked for months and months before deciding on the Samsung LN46A650.  It provides the best product and features for the best price.  I have owned it for about a month now and I have enjoyed every minute of it.  I have not had any issues with clouding or dead pixels.  At night with a perfectly dark room with no input to the TV you can just make out some irregularities from clouding, but even in the darkest of movies I have not been able to see any clouding.  It still impresses with the large viewing angles.  You are hard pressed to find a better TV for the cost.

Reviews.Title: Technical Precision
Reviews.Author: Mark J. Clifton "MJC"
Reviews.Content: It's rare to come across a product that proves quality and excellence can be accomplished for a great price. Everything about this TV seems well thought out from the display to its menu system. It was so easy to setup without the manual because it tells you a description as you highlight menu options. The display is breath taking, and let me tell you what a critic I am. These days I'm hard to impress. The motion technology is what really sets this TV apart. Its brightness is also amazing. I have an extremely bright room, and this TV has no problem with it.Incredible Job Samsung!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Product and Delivery
Reviews.Author: jwf
Reviews.Content: This television is simply amazing.  The 120Hz AutoMotion Plus feature is quite useful for HD programs.  With a BluRay player, certain movies look 3D with Auto Motion plus turned on.  Just pick your size.  The 750 is a worthwhile model if you need the better sound from the TV and interconnection features.  Amazon's white glove delivery service is stellar.  They delivered the product on a Saturday morning, unpacked everything.  Can't beat this deal.

Reviews.Title: Easy Breezy
Reviews.Author: DELTA HEALTH WORKS INC "Jim Adams"
Reviews.Content: No problems.  Unloaded it, set it up, had it running in an hour.  Acquiring channels is automated.  Almost everything is automated.  I haven't even changed to the cable companies HDTV box, and the picture is superb.  I can't say the same for my neighbors exactly same TV, only mine is 46" their's 40".  The quality is much better on mine.  I can't imagine anyone wanting to go higher than 46", by the way.  This is a HUGE TV.jim adamscleveland ms

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG HDTV 46"  1080P
Reviews.Author: Robert E. Busbee
Reviews.Content: THE TV HAS BEEN IN SERVICE FOR APPROXIMATELY 1 MONTH.  THE CLARITY OF PICTURE AND SOUND ARE GREAT, AND DVDS LOOK SUPER ON THE SCREEN. THE ACTION SCENES ARE CLEAR AND SMOOTH DUE TO THE 120HZ REFRESH RATE.THE PART I LIKE BEST ABOUT THE PURCHASE FROM AMAZON WAS THE FREE SHIPPING TO MY LIVING ROOM, NOT JUST TO MY FRONT DOOR, BUT TO MY LIVING ROOM, AND THE 24 MONTH NO INTEREST CREDIT CARD TRANSACTION.THE WHOLE PROCESS HAS BEEN A PLEASURE.  MY NEXT HDTV OR ELECTRONICS PURCHASE WILL BE THRU AMAZON.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy with My Purchase
Reviews.Author: Teresa J. Benson
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV and Amazon.Com made it so easy. We probably should have got a 40 or 42-inch.  It's a lot bigger in my den than I thought it would be but we just love it; great picture and easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: we love our samsung
Reviews.Author: M. Elrod
Reviews.Content: Have had this 46 in. Samsung for about 4 weeks now and we love it. The only thing is the tv sound could be a little better. I would recomend this set. It has a great picture. The blacks are so black and the whites so white it makes for great viewing.

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture, great price

Reviews.Content: I waited a long time to purchase a flat screen tv and did a lot of research in the meantime.  When I made the decision this was the only one that I would consider, and I have no regrets.  It's absolutely amazing and I haven't yet gotten it completely hooked up to high def.  The price was equally great, and with no shipping charges or taxes this was a no brainer purchase.

Reviews.Title: 46 Inch Samsung LN46A650
Reviews.Author: A. Cosner
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of ColorWe were out of town when the TV arrived in the city. Once the TV was in town, we were contacted several times by email and telephone to arrange a delivery time.The actual delivery took place at the arranged time, with competent, friendly promptness. He can't stop talking about how clear and bright the picture is.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG 46 INCH TV

Reviews.Content: WE LOVE THE TV AND HAS BEEN EXCELLENT. WE HAVE NOT HAD ANY PROBLEMS WITH T  V. THANKS

Reviews.Content: I researched a lot before I bought it. My initial choice was Toshiba Regza because it is cheaper but reviews were good too. Reviews.Title: Great TV!

Reviews.Title: Just got it today!!!

Reviews.Content: This is my first HDTV and the HD programs are amazing. I hope there will be a time soon when all chanels will be HD. Not bad at all.Are there any special settings with which the TV works best?I was looking at the 550 , but because of the 120 Hz I spent the xtra money. I think it was well worth it.

Reviews.Title: One of the Best LCD TV

Reviews.Content: I did lot of TV research for a year and finally decided to buy this TV. This is one of the best LCD TV and I am very happy with this buy. The picture is superb. A very good LCD TV.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV

Reviews.Content: Amazon delivery was 4 days earlier than the estimated shipping date.  Delivery people were very polite and tested the TV to make sure everything worked.  The TV has the most beautiful picture with HD signal and does SDTV signal well too.  I am glad I ordered from Amazon and would buy future tv's from here again.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product.

Reviews.Content: The product was delivered one week ahead of schedule. Delivery crew was very polite and helpful in setting up the unit.The images on this TV are very clear and colors are beautiful. I'm satisfied with the product I chose.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Tv

Reviews.Content: I just got this tv last week. It is awesome and the colors are very vivid. I love the touch of red. I am very happy with how easy everything came together.I did have a problem with Amazon's white glove delivery. But Amazom took care of the problem and gave me a credit on my account so what great customer service.I took the stand off to mount the tv to a new floating wall unit. That is the only problem I had. The four screws that mount the stand are very hard to remove. the tv is five stars to me.Samsung also gave ne three extra months warrenty for registering the tv online.

Reviews.Title: Samsung HD
Reviews.Author: Eileen Cabral
Reviews.Content: Excellent purchase Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of Color Delivery was excellent I am very pleased I bought my TV at Amazon

Reviews.Title: Super Fantastic
Reviews.Author: C. Hull "Gadget Freak"
Reviews.Content: I have had my new Samsung about 3 weeks now.  And have loved every minute of it.  The TV has tons of features that make it FAR better then the Vizio in the other room.  The Samsung is brighter, sharper, smoother, sounds better, and it looks great.  When switching sources, it shows the inputs that have something plugged into the port.  When I put in a DVD, the TV automatically switches to the DVD input.  You will not have any second thoughts after ordering this unit.  If there was enough room in the bedroom, I would get a second one for in there.

Reviews.Title: Five Star Samsung and Delivery
Reviews.Author: roadkill
Reviews.Content: I'll have to eat my words - some time ago I posted and criticized white glove delivery.  I take it back.  A glitch happened as CEVA does not deliver to my small podunk town 85 miles from Reno.  CEVA subbed it out and after they called, Sierra Air Express of Reno delivered on time and with care.  In the house unpacked and plugged in to assure it was working.  The driver was prompt, courteous and left the box at my request.  The Samsung is terrific and my wife is even getting to like it.  I still don't have total control of the proportion however.  My Direct TV control makes some changes but it seems I'm often fiddling with Stretch, Pillar Box and Crop.  Stretch is out of the question and crop causes much of the picture to be, well, cropped.  I lose the channel numbers on the left side with pillar box. Oh the frustrations of life!  Any suggestions??  I'm an old geezer and not up to speed on these newfangled things.

Reviews.Title: JOHN M
Reviews.Author: J. Montalto
Reviews.Content: Fantastic picture. Shipping was fast and easy. Trucking company set up the TV and made sure there was no damage and it was working properly before I accepted delivery. I would order again from amazon.

Reviews.Title: Another happy customer
Reviews.Author: Patrick Howe
Reviews.Content: Add me to the list of people extremely satisfied with both the T.V., Amazon, and the delivery service.  The t.v. looks even better than it did in the local best buy.  It really is a great set.  Amazon's prices cannot be beaten.  And my T.V. was delivered 4 days before the "estimated delivery" time I was given.  I am extremely happy with all aspects of this transaction.

Reviews.Title: Shipping was a breeze
Reviews.Author: Anthony S. Huber
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with the shipping agent that Amazon used.  They delivered the TV to the house and made sure it was working properly.  The HDTV is simply wonderful.  The colors are vibrant but realistic.  The picture is sharp.  The menues are easy to use and intuitive.  The wheel on the remote took a while to get used to and I still would prefer just directional buttons.  But that is a small quibble.  I could not be happier.  I was uneasy buying an item like a TV online.  But Amazon did a great job of providing valuable information.  Everything went very smoothly.  I recomment this product and buying items like an HDTV from Amazon.  The price was very competitive, also.

Reviews.Title: Owned this for 3 weeks now and love it
Reviews.Author: Kind of a Geeky Nerd
Reviews.Content: Previously had a samsung dlp rear projection tv this is a huge step up. The out of the box picture quality was amazing and after adjusting the settings with information obtained from avsforum.com it was superb. Games(360,PS3,Wii) and Movies look and play great on this system. The touch of colour is subtle and gives it a nice, almost mahogany style, finish. Without sales tax and with free delivery that amazon offer this TV is excellent value with a saving hundreds from the big box stores.

Reviews.Title: I Love It
Reviews.Author: Arvin Collins
Reviews.Content: After reseaching the Samsung LA46A650 forever, I finally pulled the trigger. Received my TV earlier than promised from Amazon.The picture on the TV is fantastic. Only negative is the glare issue that I knew about but this is not a deal killer. This was the first time I have purchased anything from Amazon.com and I couldn't be more pleased. My final concern was if I could hook up the TV myself and I did without a single cuss word. The reviews on this site helped me make my purchasing decision. I could not be more pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: J. Condori "jmeza"
Reviews.Content: this has to be the best tv in the martket, all six series from samsung are amazing, and you have to buy it at amazon, great delivery service also, best buy i ever made.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46 inch lcd with a touch of red
Reviews.Author: Nazlie Ward
Reviews.Content: This tv is magnificent!  the picture quality is awesome. The colors are beautiful and the clarity of the picture are unbelieveale.  I certainly recommend this purchase The price even dropped after I purchased it and Amazon processed my refund immediately.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Alan Simmons
Reviews.Content: The Tv picture is awesome, the features on the TV are amazing I highly recommend this set. I would recommend buying it from Amazon, as well.

Reviews.Title: Great television! Great Service!
Reviews.Author: Shopping Gal
Reviews.Content: I had been reading up on flat screen televisions for weeks.  I was torn between LCD vs Plasma. I visited the big box stores and looked at way too  many televisions!  Saw the TOC Samsung LCD and I was sold.  Not only was it a beautiful picture, it was a beautiful television set. The red bezel is stunning!I was torn over whether to purchase it from a Big Box Store or Amazon.  The Big Box actually matched Amazon's price and told me I could have the TV in a week. HOWEVER they also wanted to charge me a delivery fee, a set up fee, and kept pushing a calibration session (for a fee). All of a sudden their price match was a mis-match and I decided to go with Amazon. I ordered the set on Monday and it was in my house on Thursday!As for delivery from CEVA... very impressive service! As I said, I oredered the set on Monday and they called me on Weds offering a choice of delivery days--  Thurs or Friday.  I chose Thursday between 1:00 and 5:00  The delivery man was at my house by 2:00.  He was very polite and very helpful.  He brought the set inside my house, unpacked the box, put the set on the stand, and had me turn it on to make sure I had sound and picture. He offered to take the packing boxes away but I decided to keep them... just in case.Thank you Amazon for having great products in stock at great prices. And thank you CEVA for providing truly white glove service.

Reviews.Title: Best TV out there right now
Reviews.Author: Sammy "Sam"
Reviews.Content: Like everyone else dropping $ this big on a TV, I did tons of research.  Checked all the specs, read all the reviews.  This TV lives up to the hype.  I had 32" Olevia that went up to 1080i, and also a 50" high-end Samsung Plasma that does 1080i--up until now, the plasma was the best picture I've seen on a TV.  This LCD has NO noticeable motion blur and makes the 6 month old plasma look like a first generation HDTV.Even with regular 1080i Comcast cable, the picture is incredible.  I also got a PS3 to use as a Blu-Ray player and it's stunning.Red bezel, 4 HDMIs, 120hz...this is the best picture you can get anywhere near this price range.  Buy it now before football season starts.  We watched some preseason on it last night--best football picture I've seen.Amazon's white glove was great.  Ordered Sunday night, got a call Tuesday evening to schedule for Wednesday delivery.  Company called Wednesday morning because the truck had been delayed, they rescheduled for Thursday.  They showed up exactly on time, took the time to bring the TV in, unpack it, hook it up, and let me verify no dead pixels, etc.  4th day delivery?  Pretty good for an item this large that shipped from PA to Atl, GA.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: Dave Matthews "DMBfan"
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful television. Like most people I searched for the best value and best TV. The reviews and ratings of this TV are worthy and correct. The design of the Touch of Color is great and it looks really nice in my living room. HD is great, Blu Ray is even better. Standard channels look OK,  but I guess this is normal for an LCD.I wish Picture in Picture was actually useable, it seems worthless. The remote does not bother me, it's just a remote. The sound on the TV is really nice. A great buy from Amazon too.Shipping was very disapointing. It was free, I understand that but still. It was one guy who dragged my new 46" TV up the stairs leaving an ink trail from the box and a large scuff on the wall. Then I helped him lift it out of the box onto my stand. He made me turn it on and left. For a TV that size, there should have been 2 people, and a little care for my brand new TV and apartment.

Reviews.Title: amazing HDTV
Reviews.Author: Chad Dean
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LN46A650 is simply amazing.  I have it connected to PS3, Wii, HDTV cable set-top box and all look amazing...much better than on my previous HDTV which is about 2 years old.  Since I have a PS3, I didn't "need" the extra features of the 750 model since the PS3 is DLNA compliant and hooks up to my Media-Center PCs anyway.  If you have a PS3 then save the $$$ and get this model vs. the 750 series.  If you do not have a PS3, you may want to buy this model AND a PS3 for about the same price as the 750 series cost and get much better value for your money, especially since the PS3 is the highest rated blu-ray player at this time.  That is exactly what I did.Black levels are amazing, especially for an LCD.  Not only do HDTV signals look great on this TV, but analog signals look better too. I have not noticed any artifacts or motion blur, even during fast-paced action such as X-games, baseball, etc.  My parents have almost the exact same TV, except that theirs is a 2007 model....and this one looks noticeably better than theirs.  I attibute that to the improvements Samsung made for the 2008 model year.I actually like the red TOC around the edge of the frame, but for those that are wondering about it; it is barely noticable.  Not nearly as noticable as it is on the 750 series.It does a great job of upconverting to fill the screen with picture rather then leaving black bars on the sides like my previous HDTV did.  Blu-Ray discs played via the PS3 are wonderful on this set.  I never would have thought that blu-ray discs would have been all that much beter than standard DVDs but I was quickly proven wrong.My only complaints are that the PIP menu is not as easy to access as it should be and you cannot create custom names for the inputs.  IMO, if these two very minor issues were corrected then this would be a flawless TV.  I'm not going to let those two minor complaints lower my review though, just wanted everyone to be aware of this fact.  The custom named inputs are not that big of a deal for me because I play everything through a home theater system anyway.  A single button for PIP wold be nice though. Harmony remotes work with this set very well, emulating all the buttons on the original remote with very little custom programming needed to do so.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!!
Reviews.Author: C. Etheridge
Reviews.Content: I got this TV earlier this week and it has been amazing!!  The picture looks great and it is very user friendly.  I just wish i could afford another one!!  I would recommend this TV to anyone.  The service from Amazon was GREAT too!  The price on the TV went down shortly after I bought it so I emailed them and had a refund for the difference in less than a day.  I have gotten two refunds on it so far.  CEVA did a great job shipping it too.  The box was not damaged and they came in and set it up.  Overall a GREAT choice to buy this TV and an even better choice to buy it from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: The Wow is gone!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Really nice TV. I researched for quite some time and visited the local CC just to see some side by side comparisons.  The LN46A650 out shined the rest.  I am also using it as a PC monitor mostly for viewing "home" movies and pictures.  The monitor can easily be read from 12 feet away, so even browsing is not a problem from the couch.  Just a good all around product and Amazon delivery was excellent too.Update 8/29/2008The picture quality on this TV is excellent, but after 2 weeks the set would not turn on without first unplugging and plugging it back in again.  The problem continued to get progressively worse until it would not turn on for a very long time.  There are other complaints on the web about the same problem and a few youtube videos.  Really too bad.  We arrange for service through the Samsung website, but the tech was not going to come until after the Amazon 30 day return period, so back it is going.  Will try another brand.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with the TV and the delivery
Reviews.Author: Robert H. Laplaca
Reviews.Content: This Samsung HDTV has a fabulous HD picture and a wealth of adjustments. I wish the owners manual better explained the detailed picture settings and what to expect before making adjustments. The picture quality using a standard def cable box input is understandably soft and stretched out in 16:9 mode. But looking at the Blue Ray disc of Planet Earth is mesmerizing in its clarity and depth of color.I live in the St. Louis area and the white glove delivery service from CEVA was first rate - no damage to the box or the TV. The delivery people were courteous and took their time with the unboxing and placing the set on my entertainment center. Overall, a great purchase experience.

Reviews.Title: tv order
Reviews.Author: Bill S "Bill"
Reviews.Content: item was received in good shpe.  Truckers brought item right to where it was to be installed.  Very east to hook up and satisfied with the product.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product - bad shipping people
Reviews.Author: Shiva Kumar Maliyappanahalli "shiv"
Reviews.Content: The TV is awesome, the images are crystal clear. No doubt about the image quality. Best in kind.The product was shipped thru CEVA, The guys who came was very rude. The white glove policy says that the delivery guy has to place the product and check for proper working.  i didnt have cable hooked up and the only way to test the tv was to hook it up thru home theater. He was not ready to wait until i can hook it up. he said he cant wait until then.

Reviews.Title: Just Buy It
Reviews.Author: Larry L. Henthorn "llhenthorn"
Reviews.Content: After two weeks, I could not be happier.  As the subject line says, just buy it.After a LOT of looking, this line stood out from all the rest.  And, disregard negative comments about the remote and TOC--they are fine.

Reviews.Title: Completely Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Gpope "Gpope"
Reviews.Content: I can't be happier about this TV. The picture clarity is awesome and it looks great when watching in HD.  Also, although the delivery said I would receive the TV in a week and a half, it was actually delivered in a couple of days.  I would suggest this product to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: David Sampsel
Reviews.Content: This is the best TV I've seen in a long time, and it's at a great price!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46" LCD T V
Reviews.Author: William I. Hemphill
Reviews.Content: [[ASIN:B0014175E8 Samsung LN46A550 46-Inch 1080p LCD HDTV]Other reviewsindicating that the "Touch Of Red "is barely noticeable are correct. The performance is simply outstanding except for the slow response to the on off switch.( Not a real biggie).  The response to my order ( which included White Glove delivery) was timely, accurate and very satisfactory. If I had it all to do over, I would repeat the same thing again.

Reviews.Title: Simply Amazing
Reviews.Author: Tam Doan
Reviews.Content: After much research I finally made the decision to get this TV and it is one of the best purchases that I have made.  I watched movies on it often and the picture quality is just Amazing.  It is also great for gaming.

Reviews.Title: Best quality on the market.
Reviews.Author: Lee Lorenz "engineer"
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LN46A650 46 inch, 1080P, 120 Hz, LCD, HDTV with Red touch of color, in my opinion, is the best product on the market.  I couldn't be more pleased.

Reviews.Title: Just plain awesome
Reviews.Author: J. Pechacek
Reviews.Content: The best 46" under $3,000. Has the best picture I've seen on a LCD TV. Looks great for TV, HDTV, DVD, Blue Ray, PS3 and Wii, hell even turned off. I wouldn't choose any other TV. 100% satisfied. The wife and inlaws even love it. I also use it as a great moniter for my Lap Top. you won't be disappointed or feel ripped off.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Television
Reviews.Author: Brian D. Walker "walker7734"
Reviews.Content: Really have nothing bad to say.  The picture is gorgeous!  The sound is so so because of the speakers being on the bottom but if you have a surround sound system this won't matter. If you are looking for a great television for a great price this is the one you want.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650 - An excellent choice with great price.
Reviews.Author: M. Sachithanand "ms"
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN46A650 - An excellent choice with great price.I have been researching the technological advancements in Plasma and LCD TVs, including their market trends and customer responses. Based on my research I wanted to buy an LCD TV with a particular set of technical specs. I found all those technical aspects with Samsung's 6 and 7 series of big screen LCD TVs. With these features these LCD TVs qualifies as a real TV (not just a monitor like TV). Though I am a Sony's loyal customer, this Samsung TV purchase (my first Samsung brand product) has made me a fully satisfied Samsung customer. I am only 1 week into enjoying my TV. I hope this TV will perform consistently over the years to come.Amazon, with great customer service and good priced items, a sure place to shop. Since my TV purchase experience with Amazon, I have been doing a flurry of purchases through Amazon. Thanks Amazon for making me to share my experiences through your portal.

Reviews.Title: Spectacular panel, great menu, red frame? Not so bad.
Reviews.Author: 718tech
Reviews.Content: The picture quality on this TV is just spectacular with HD content, and very good even with standard def. But you have to adjust it - look for settings in AV forums and places like that, and tweak for your own room. Mainly, you want to turn off anything dynamic and turn the back light way down. the way it comes our of the box is way too bright and garish, so invest a bit of time in fine-tuning the settings and you'll be rewarded with a great picture. (The red frame is nearly black, so it's not too bad.)

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A650
Reviews.Author: Michael A. Kamienski
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent television and I highly recommend it for the picture clarity especially the high definition channels. It is easy to use and the shipping was excellent by Amazon.com and the shippers brought the television into the home and set it up. What great service and I could not have asked for more. Great Job Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV
Reviews.Author: Vincent Cooper
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN46A650 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of ColorIt was great right out of the box. The sound is so good that I don't use my surround sound. the colors are outstanding. The service was great. It came 2 days ahead of time. It dropped in price and amazon credited my account the next day after I called. I'm very pleased with this and all the things I purchased from Amazon.Vince Cooper

Reviews.Title: Great TV at an great price
Reviews.Author: M. Borgens
Reviews.Content: I love this TV.  It is the best picture I have seen, and the price just dropped to $1699.  I was recently in a TV store and could not find a TV that could compare to this picture.Additionally, I have it mounted on a Southwest wall with a slider and window next to it and have not experienced any troubles with the picture being washed out or any significant issues with glare.The viewing angle is very wide.  We just had friends over and everyone was saying they thought the TV was angled towards them.If you are thinking about hanging this TV on you wall and want the best wall mount for the best TV, look at the Premier AM3 wall mount.It was a tough trigger to pull, because I am very cheap, but I am glad I pulled this trigger.  I couldn't be happier with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Sports Viewing at it's Best!
Reviews.Author: Eric S. Turner "Sports Fan"
Reviews.Content: I made a mistake and reviewed the 52" version. LOL. My friend has this 46" tv and it is spectacular for sports. The refresh rate and response time mean no blurring. Car racing in high-def is a new experiencce. He also has a Wii gaming system that looks incredible on this tv. I will get one as soon as I can. Maybe the price will drop just a tad more. Maybe I'll just pull the trigger now! It's the best for the money.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Amazing!
Reviews.Author: J. Holtgreven
Reviews.Content: I have been nothing but impressed with the TV so far.  I was a little nervous buying the TV online from Amazon, but so far I havent had any issues.  Mind you it has only been 3 weeks since I received the TV, but so far so good.  The picture is amazing and the sound is pretty good.  I'm not a very picky person though.

Reviews.Title: Sansung 46" model 650 LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Robert P. Walker "Retieree"
Reviews.Content: At this point I have owned this TV for just about a month. I am not real technical so I relied on the reviews of others (I read everything I could find) and a visit to Circuit City to see this model TV in action and question the salesman. It's the most I have ever paid for a TV but it was cheaper than anywhere else and I got a credit of a $152 from Amazon because they advertised this set later for less then what I paid them within a 30 day period. At last check this set is still selling for more than I paid. With no shipping charge and no taxes to boot this was a great purchase. I am real happy about that! As for the quality of the picture, I am real happy about that as well. I ordered Direct TV and the HD picture is super.  We bought our last set 13 years ago (A SONY VEGA 32" Flat Screen - if it fell on you, it could kill ya ;^). Anyway, the only thing I ever done to this Sony was to clean the screen. I am hoping that this Samsung will give me the same kind of service.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic 46" HD LCD 120MHz Television
Reviews.Author: John K "Photo Guy"
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for three weeks now and I extremely happy with the set and the delivery service from Amazon.com. The tv was delivered with the White Glove Amazon service and everything was just as advertised. It arrived about 5 days ahead of the original schedule. The price was the best that I found anywhere, bar none. This was a fantastic deal for this tv. The picture is excellent, it has every feature and various inputs that anyone would want, the setup is as easy as plugging it in and being amazed. My first LCD and I am loving it. Connected it to an Onkyo surround sound home theater system and everything works as you would expect and demand. The Red Touch of Color makes it pleasant to look at when the tv is off. You won't go wrong with this LCD tv.

Reviews.Title: Great item, best price, no hassle
Reviews.Author: S. Gilbert
Reviews.Content: Shopped around locally, talked to TV repairman and it came down to Samsung or Sony for the best TV with the most bang for the buck. Don't be afraid to buy from Amazon. They helped me over the phone and made good suggestions. The delivery service was great - they came when they said they would, took the TV out of the box and set it up to make sure everything was working right. They even have a checklist they go through. I didn't have to lug it home and have someone help me carry it. Price was at least $250 less than my local electronic stores and I didn't have to hassle with a salesman pushing extended warranties. No tax and the savings added up to about $500.Large appliances, TV's, etc. this is the place to make the purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Brian C. Newman
